review: Thankfully, I squeeze the lotion out onto my hand first because I keep finding these glass like particles throughout my lotion. Pictures attached.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I used to use Physiogel lotion and cream both typesAnd recently was looking for a replacement just bc I wanted to try something new.Then found this! I heard a lot of good things about this brand already so it was an easy decision.I have acne-prone, sensitive, oily (but extremly dry on some areas on my face) skin, so it is hard to find products that are just right for me.This cream was delivered in a decent condition, the box was clean and with no damage, but one thing not really satisfying is the tube was not sealed.It has very creamy texture, not watery at all, as you can see in the pictures I‚Äôve attached.And the size of the product is actually bigger than I thought it would be-attached a picture of it next to Aveeno hand cream to compare the size.When I tried it on my face, there was no irritation at all, no burning or stinging feelings.It is not greasy at all, but still moisturizing enough that I can feel it right after one application.I am very satisfied with this purchase, and willing to buy another one after this.I‚Äôm so happy that I ordered it to use for the cold and dry weather we are having.I highly recommend this facial moisturizer for anybody who is looking for one that is not too overwhelming but still moisturizing enough :)

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I bought this because I have Rosacea subtype 2 (papular/pustule - so basically tiny, painful pimple-like bumps that DO NOT respond to any type of acne treatment). I still can't figure out if I have triggers & nothing seems to help when I have flares.  During these flares, my moisture barrier is non-existent and my skin becomes so dry that it peels & scales.  I bought this on a whim & cannot believe the difference in just a few days.  My cheeks are still a little rosy, but I have ZERO pustules & the broken capillaries seem to be gone as well.  It even got rid of the blackheads on my nose that I can NEVER get rid of.  If this continues to help then I'm a customer for life. The 1st pic is from a week ago & the 2nd is right now.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: There I was.It was a Tuesday, mid October, 2018. I‚Äôm pacing Walgreens skin care aisle, reading labels up & down. Sweaty & hormonal, pregnant & confused.There she was; the esthetician angel hired by Walgreens. She approaches me.‚ÄúHow can I help you?‚Äù I look at her, she looks at me. She must be in her 60s? But her skin looks flawless. (Seriously do pores just disappear at her age?) She doesn‚Äôt even have wrinkles, except for some beautifully placed smile lines.‚ÄúSure,‚Äù I mumble; clearly disheartened. ‚ÄúMy face is freaking out. I‚Äôve spent $100+ these last few months trying to fix it. I‚Äôve never had an issue-before this pregnancy- & I don‚Äôt know what‚Äôs wrong with my skin!‚Äù I continue to vent hormonally, ‚ÄúBreaking out, greasy one moment & dry & flaky the next-‚ÄúShe nods her head up & down as I speak, eyes shimmering in understanding behind her rimless glasses. She‚Äôs been here before.‚ÄúHave you tried La Roche moisturizer? It‚Äôs probiotic thermal water works miracles.‚ÄùI haven‚Äôt of course.My fairy godmother (for who else could this angel be?) hands me the unsuspecting bottle. $20 dollars? I scoff inwardly at the high price tag, not fully understanding yet what a gift this is.SPF or no spf? (It doesn‚Äôt matter I later find out, they both were made by the beautiful witches of the west & represent it.)It worked that very night. My face literally healed in 24 hours. (Read the back of the bottle. It does what it says)18 months later, I‚Äôm on my 5th bottle. My face is supple, even, and I barely wear makeup. (cc cream by it, & that‚Äôs it.)It‚Äôs magical. Whats in this bottle? Sorcery perhaps?‚ÄúANY SUFFICIENTLY ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY IS INDISTINGUISHABLE FROM MAGIC‚ÄùMy only wish is it came in a bigger bottle.*ive added a photo with myself wearing it cc cream, but you can see my face looks lovely. Thank you fairy god mother of science. THANK YOU

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I broke out immediately after using this product. I had white heads and red bumps all across my face.It claims to be for ‚Äùsensitive‚Äù skin but I guess that's not true. This product is no better than something from a drug store. Disgusting.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I wanted a moisturizer to use after the La Roche Posay cleanser because I really love that cleanser.This item is lighter than regular facial cream and a little thicker than a lotion and I think the texture and the light  scent are perfect for me.My face is easy  to get irritated If I start using a new facial product and recently I am using the Claims double serum so I need something to calm my skin down.And I think this moisturizer is a good choice.Mine came in a good condition .without the seal which I have seen them at Kohl's the same way.Just hope there will be less and less people that just order things then use them for a while then return .that might be how it happened that there were customers received almost empty bottles.I have experienced that .Received boots that have been worn with dirty soles...

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Since I moved to another type of climate, my face is pink and dry. Typically my face would be nice and oily, so I would never need moisturizer, but I guess that all changes, too, since I have been getting older. The problem is, and just like my 66-year-old mother, she gets oily skin. And there have been times where I have accumulated a couple pimples here and there, every so often from using this moisturizer.I mean, my skin looks a lot more radiant, but just watch out, because if you don‚Äôt have extremely dry skin, then it could pose problems on the pimple level.Edit:June 2019 I have been using this now for the past couple months, and I can say, I love the fact that it protects me from the sun, it also gives me a glow, during times when my skin is completely dry from using soaps to clean my face. However, I still have to avoid answering areas, as it has been giving me pimples. So I can definitely say if you are pimples or acne prone, you may want to find something else.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I am very happy that I found this product. I have been on the hunt for an oil free sunscreen that doubles as a moisturizer for a good portion of 5 years- and I am so happy that I landed on this one. It‚Äôs lightweight, no dominating smell, and truly moisturizes. It‚Äôs an exceptional product for the price. I have 30 year old, acne prone skin and this does not clog pores or cause breakouts- major plus. This bottle will definitely last the summer and probably longer.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I only used it for 3 days and it repaired my skin. The redness and pimples caused by another moisturizer are gone! I've never seen a product so efficient! Highly recommended!The only thing I hope the brand does is to seal their products, so the customers will feel safer using them.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: Just received this item. It was either sold before and used or they are ripping people off by not filling the tube. There was barely any lotion in the tube. Very disappointed. Probably can‚Äôt tell from picture but  there is no way there is 2.5 ounces of lotion in this tube

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I decided to try this sunscreen after reading good reviews. I normally use Boots No 7 day cream with SPF 30, but it is pricey and can make me look shiny so I wanted to try something else. When I received the Double Repair Face Moisturizer, the packaging was really beat up/janky looking (see photos) and I couldn't tell if someone had opened the tube already. I decided to give it a go anyway. The lotion itself was pleasant and absorbed nicely, but was not as moisturizing as Boots and just didn't impress me too much.

product_name: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Double Repair Face Moisturizer, Oil-Free Face Cream with Niacinamide
review: I‚Äôm on day two. My face burns slightly & I got a little rash on my face with pimples. Am sure it was the oxybenzone (I looked up the ingredient). I will return it and try the one that says oxybenzone free... simply because I really liked the moisturizing aspect of it.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Just want to let everyone know that the cerave lotion on the left is one I bought from cvs, and the one on the right is the large one from amazon, and you can clearly see that they put hyaluronic acid lower on the list for the amazon one, vs the cvs one. And just in case you don't know, ingredients for any products go in order from the greatest amounts first, and descend to lower amounts as you go down the list. The cvs one has hyaluronic acid much higher on the list, and the packaging looks completely different too! Like, why?? Does cerave make a cheaper version of their products for amazon, vs other retailers?? And that is just really annoying, aggravating, and upsetting to me. Why water it down to buy it for a cheaper price? No one wants that. Everyone wants to get what they pay for. For sure, the one from cvs was much pricier ($17) for the smaller bottle size, while the amazon one was like, $12 when I got it for the large, 19 oz one. But I just want to say that I KNOW what I'm paying for!! If its a cheaper price for a more watered down product, I'm not going to get it!! Just leave the products the way that they are. And I have to say that yes, the textures between them were NOTICEABLY different! The one from cvs was definitely more opaque and creamier, while as soon as I got the amazon one, I immediately immediately noticed, without a doubt, a more watery consistency. Um, barf. Never going to buy this product from amazon again because of how they're so blatantly cheating! I'll just put my money in something else

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: Before i get into my novel of a review, here‚Äôs the summary of what i think. I came across this while looking for a lotion that works best for Non-oily skin, a daily lotion, for sensitive-ish skin, i found the PERFECT one with this.I bought this about 2 weeks ago, was shipped in 2 days, & when i received it nothing was wrong with the packaging or bottle. Anyways, I started using this after i decided to switch from my Neutrogena Oil-Free Moisture which i had been using for about 6 months. I do not have naturally Oily Skin so it was too drying. But with maaaaany hours spent looking for a FACE lotion with good reviews I came across this and let me just say IT IS WORTH THE MONEY, I am in love! works for face and body which i was skeptical about at first but i do not regret my purchase at all and i highly highly reccomend anyone purchase this. My skin is a little sensitive mainly to perfumes (especially my face) & this is amazing!!! no breakouts, no rash, I will use this forever!

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free
review: My skin is relatively sensitive. Over the years I‚Äôve gone through a number of lotions, searching for one that keeps my skin hydrated without any side effects (breakouts, rashes, etc). I‚Äôve been using this daily moisturizer for a few weeks now and it‚Äôs worked out very well so far. I only have to apply once in the morning and my skin feels moisturized throughout the day. I guess that‚Äôs the hyaluronic acid doing it‚Äôs job.This lotion is lightweight and doesn‚Äôt leave me feeling greasy. It also doesn‚Äôt have much of a scent which I count as a plus. Best of all my skin isn‚Äôt breaking out or changing in any negative way.Although this product is touted as face and body lotion I have yet to use it on my face. That being said, it has worked very well for me as a go-to body lotion.

product_name: CeraVe Daily Moisturizing Lotion | 12 Ounce | Face & Body Lotion for Dry Skin with Hyaluronic Acid | Fragrance Free

I use this year round on my chest neck and face and I don't have any breakouts from it. I also love this because it's so easy to get and hardly ever out of stock. It's fragrance-free so it's good if you have sensitive skin and also my dermatologist recommended highly

review: Despite being open when I received it, I love this lotion. On the body it absorbs very quickly. On hands, less quickly. On face, even less quickly. But it's gentle, and truly not scented at all.  I love this stuff.

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube
review: My legs looks so much better! Only took 2 week's to see the difference! Much firm and smooth ! Smells Great! I use it after the shower every day!Very happy with this product!

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube
review: This stuff has really surprising results. My skin is noticeably softer and firmer after only a few days of use. My face is brighter, my hands are softer, and my cottage cheesiness is firmer.I have lost quite a bit of weight (50 pounds and counting) so my skin needs some tightening and toning - this stuff does just that. I also have extremely dry skin in the winter over my whole body and this helps with that as well.I use the ‚Äústronger‚Äù version of this lotion, the gel-cream (on the left in the picture), for my stomach, thighs, and butt. I then use the lotion (on the right) for my chest, arms, hands, and face/neck.Note: don‚Äôt think this alone is going to give you skin that you could bounce a quarter off of. You still need to do exercise to strengthen the muscle and tighten the skin. This works as a SUPPLEMENT to losing weight and cellulite that can result from that weight loss. Or, for aging skin to help appear younger.It also smells great, not too strong but still a delightful smell. Would definitely buy again and recommend.

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube
review: OMG it has the amazing scent and moisturize your skin at 4 your stomach legs and butt area working I only had a week and I see slight changes I'm happy with my results because I have a lot of cellulite in my legs so I was looking for something that helped and it really does I will be ordering again I should have ordered two so ladies get this don't get nothing else cuz it works I am a firm believer in it

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube
review: I never had stretch marks until I had my first baby. Photo attached is my before and after picture of applying twice a day for 2 months straight post labor. I used this gel along with applying coconut oil each day. Overall, my marks became lighter in color but still visible. Scent smells really good and does not make you feel ‚Äúoily‚Äù after applying so I did not feel gross putting on clothes right after. I would forget I had applied it within minutes. I will continue to use it to see if marks get better.

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming & Toning Body Gel-Cream - With Q10 For Normal Skin - Truly Yours , 6.7 oz. Tube

I used the whole thing, tried using a message roller like they say to get the blood going and help it get the skins natural elecity going but.. Nothing.. Happened. product_name: NIVEA Original Daily Moisture Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Normal To Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: Hi, it's Glamorous Gem, hope you all are having a fantastic day.Anyway, I just wanted to take a little time out of my day to say a couple of things about this lotion.I, unfortunately, switched to this lotion a couple of weeks ago because my Vaseline Advance Repair ran out and I refused to go to another store. This one had a great size and it was on sale so I got it just to try something new.Scent -The scent on this reminds me of deodorant and a cheap powder smelling one at that. I mean, I know they tried to make it smell like it had a clean and fresh scent, but it smells like I rolled in deodorant rather than taking a shower. It is not a pleasant smell at all.Richness and Lather -I bought this one because it says its richness would compare to the Essentially Enriched and it certainly does not. I mean, it does last after you take a shower that day, but not longer. Your skin starts to feel dry and rubbery after just a couple of hours.Overall Feel and Reapplying - Now, I have dry and sensitive skin. I loved Vaseline because it gives you all the moisture for an extended amount of time and its lotion was naturally hypoallergenic and this one does not compare to its claims.My skin was very dryer and worse than before when using this lotion. It has a watered down thickness that makes it messy to apply and it cakes upon reapplying. I felt like my skin was clogged up and dirty compared to fresh and clean with my previous lotion.I felt like it did absolutely nothing to my skin other than aggravate my skin irritations such as atopic dermatitis and eczema. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NOT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN SUFFERERS AT ALL.I agree with another consumer that this product has parabens and those that are more worse for your skin after extended use. Methylparaben and Ethylparaben are very harmful and aggravate tons of skin.I thought I could love this product, but sadly it was a miserable one and I wish I would have just gone somewhere else. It fits nowhere, but the trash. Maybe Nivea might make a better product in the future, but sadly they can consider this a fail and I will not purchase again.Note: This is not promotional content. I was not paid nor endorsed by this review. All reviews and words remain my own. All my reviews remain authentic, unbiased, and unique in nature. Thanks for reading ;)

product_name: Lubriderm Daily Moisture Hydrating Body and Hand Lotion with Vitamin B5, Non-Greasy, 24 fl. oz
review: Lubriderm is very high quality lotion, great for your face and your body.  Many lotions have strange ingredients in them that cause rashes or stinging on my face, or I cannot apply them anywhere near my eyes.  I have Rosacea, so must be very careful what creams and lotions I put on my face because many cause terrible reactions.  Lubriderm is a fantastic, soothing lotion that goes on easily, is not greasy, and keeps skin soft and smooth all day.  No scent, so no problems.  I no longer feel that I must buy expensive lotions for my face, because Lubriderm works great all over.  I am a Granny and live in Alaska with an outdoor lifestyle.  Nice to only need one lotion for all around smooth skin.  Love the convenience and price of Amazon shopping for Lubriderm.

product_name: Lubriderm Daily Moisture Hydrating Body and Hand Lotion with Vitamin B5, Non-Greasy, 24 fl. oz
review: LMAO. Totally my fault I guess, but wanted to leave this for others who may have not read the size details for this product like me. $6 for an ounce.. it seems smaller than even a travel size haha. product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: Bottom line is that it works. I'm very fair skinned, covered in scars, and can't tan naturally. I decided to test this lotion on one leg to see how it would develop, how long it took to develop, and what would take it off the skin.I saw results the day I put it on and it looked like a natural tan. I then tried different products to take it off to make sure I wouldn't look like a splotchy mess if I used makeup remover or face wash. The only product I found that will remove minimum about of the product is rubbing alcohol. So, makeup remover and Neutrogena exfoliating face wash is safe!!For the scars. My scars are HUGE. Naturally my scars will stay a shade lighter if I go into the sun. Same case with this lotion; so it looks natural. All my mini scars tanned along with my skin.Notes to equally as fair skinned people: if may clump up into little crystals you're probably rubbing too hard. Remember your underarms/ back of the arm, neck, and inside the bellybutton (guess who missed it). Wait till you go to bed to do the hands so you don't end up washing all of it off and your hands don't match your arms.I put the lotion on two days in a row and then waited about 2-3 days to put another layer on. I don't want to be super super tan just yet.Regardless, you will see a change!!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: I really liked this item. I was nervous about it since I am so fair. I have yet to meet a single person who has ben more fair than myself. People usually could ID me at a distance by my legs. I love my fair skin and I won‚Äôt go tanning as skin cancer runs in the family. But I really just wanted a nice glow. And this really did the trick. Looks like I‚Äôve been outside enjoying the weather. I just got the face moisturizer too and am excited to try.It moisturizes my legs well. I will say it does leave me feeling a bit of a residue and the smell is a little strong for my liking. But I‚Äôm not used to wearing anything scented. It‚Äôs not bad or overwhelming. Just kinda gets old.Firming I have get to see. Honestly I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôll do anything. Cellulite is what it is.Tanning part is great. Did streak and look a little patchy day one. But made sure I applied evenly. Did it two times a day for three days and already I look like a living creature and not the undead.Will say I forgot to apply to backs of my hands and my feet. Which is my fault but is great for comparison pictures. Overall am happy for the price and would recommend.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: I love this stuff used it for 2 days and have seen excellent results üòÅüòÅ I am so happy with this product and it smells AMAZING!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: amazing!! I got so dark in just a week. I bought another bottle already. Definitely worth every cent.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: Like the lotion, hate the packaging. As you can see, the blue shiny part peels off... and since you‚Äôre squeezing lotion into your hands while touching that part, it becomes an unavoidable mess.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: I LOVE this product. It's flattering on many skin types.. I have friends of all ages and skin tones who turn to this product and have all gotten positive results. The product says it's a gradual tan but I see immediate effects. There is minimum streaking, but make sure to put lotion on darker areas that you do not want to tan (such as knees) and make sure to wash your hands thoroughly after application. What I like most about this product is that it's not an orange tan, it's more of a natural bronze. The only thing I could think of to dislike is I'm not exactly sure if the "firming" aspect of this lotion actually works.. maybe it works different on everyone, but I haven't seen any immediate results.PROS: Great price, natural bronze color (not orange), compliments many skin tones, little to no streakingCONS: Not sure if the "firming" works as advertisedIf you have found this review helpful, please vote "yes" :)

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: The bottle seems to run out quickly if you're going for a full body tan, but you can't dney that it does the job! I don't enjoy the feeling of lotion on my skin, so sometimes I'm lazy and I let the tan fade away before regaining my tanning enthusiasm. During one such renewal, I accidentally went a little too enthusiastic during my hand-washing and was left with a hilariously white hand. For the sake of science, I'll include a pic. This will show you an example of one day's worth of tanning. (Also an example of what NOT to do.)

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: This is a slow but sure thing! The process can take up to a week to see a difference but in two weeks you will most definitely tell you are a couple of shades darker!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: I bought this item prepared for the worst orangey and streaky experience to be absolutely surprised. IT IS A GRADUAL TANNER! Meaning after one application you probably won't see a difference at all. I started noticing myself being a different shade after my 2nd day. It says that it takes about 7 days for a complete result and to see results only after a couple days made me super happy. It smells amazing, although if you use too much of it ,you do notice it has the smell of self tanner but I also applied the tanner to my whole body, so it could've just been me lol but it does smell better than a lot of other products I've tried. PLUS it helped tan away some of my stretch marks, which was nice. Overall, I'm now left with tanner skin and very happy to have the option of being tan in a safer way than laying out in the sun or going to a tanning salon. I have no orange or streaks and I applied it just as I would my regular body lotion. I recommend applying after showering because its a great moisturizer as well.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: This is my go to for when I‚Äôm coming out of spring like a blank piece of white paper and need some color for my cute dresses. I would say on the third day/use is when I achieved the natural sun kissed glow I was aiming for. I only use this on my legs, it‚Äôs not as firming as we would all like but that‚Äôs ok, no cream is. The smell when rubbing it on smells great. But The next day you definitely smell like a self tanner.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin
review: It works! The change happens subtlety which is nice especially for people like me who are trying this for the first time. I‚Äôve been using it for a few days now, less than a week. I like the results and hope to see a change in firmness over the next few weeks.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow +FIRMING Body Lotion, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Sunless Tanning Daily Moisturizer with Collagen and Elastin

review: This is a good product for Body, but didn't seem to work for face. It was recommended by our dermatologist. It does what it says, it is okay for sensitive. But it doesn't keep the skin moisturized for longer, you'll have to reapply. I think that's becaue of the lotion formula. product_name: Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types, Body and Face Lotion, Two 16 Fl Oz Bottles, plus 2-oz. Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser for Normal to Oily Skin (Combo Pack)
review: Cetaphil Moisturizing Lotion for All Skin Types is a good, general purpose moisturizer that will work well for most people. I have to pull out "the big guns" at certain times of the year because my skin goes beyond dry. Even so, this lotion brings me welcome relief on a daily basis. I have attached photos of before and after. The before shot shows the lotion in my hand. You can also see rough patches on the skin of my hand in the before shot.  In the after shot, the rough areas have smoothed out and the appearance of dry lines have minimized. That is pretty impressive for skin as rough as mine using such a light lotion as this. The skin cleanser is also a pleasure to use and conditions my skin just before I go to bed which then rejuvenates overnight the skin of my face.  This lotion should work out well for most people.

review: I live in AZ and sun protecting is super big. review: It protects against sunburns well. I have used this for a month now and I am outside for hours. Outside, in July, in Texas... So yeah, lots of sun and heat and sweat, yet this sunscreen did not fail. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is that it makes my face bright red the second I apply it and it stays red for an hour. It doesn't do that to the rest of my body where I apply it. Once the redness goes away after an hour, my skin is back to white. My advice is that if you have sensitive skin, try a different brand... Or if like me, I just put my makeup on over it to cover the redness up till it goes away.

product_name: Biore UV Aqua Rich Watery 85 g (1.7 times the normal product) Sunscreen SPF 50 + / PA ++++„ÄêLarge capacity„Äë
review: I have fair skin so I need to wear sunscreen. I wish I bought this sooner because I‚Äôve been using other brands for the longest time. Not anymore...the sunscreen formula is super light weight and fast absorbing! No white cast at all.I apply the sunscreen after my moisturizer and before my foundation. It works really well underneath makeup. The scent is a light citrus and it may bother some people with sensitive allergies. The color is also a paleish yellow.

product_name: Biore UV Aqua Rich Watery 85 g (1.7 times the normal product) Sunscreen SPF 50 + / PA ++++„ÄêLarge capacity„Äë
review: After starting  on Retin-A and scourging Reddit for the best face sunscreen, I finally bought Biore and I have no regrets! Past sunscreens I used were usually greasy, thick, hard to spread, and left a white cast ‚Äì not this one! It is very light and easy to spread. Since it is easy to spread, I have found that I can re-apply it even after I put make-up on; I re-apply it carefully and it doesn‚Äôt mess up my make-up too much. Also, it doesn‚Äôt even feel like I am using sunscreen when I have it on and I regularly use it under my make-up. It has a faint lemon-y scent, but it goes away within a few minutes. Right after applying it, the product may leave a slight shine on your skin, but that also disappears after a few minutes. In terms of protecting me from the sun, I can confirm I haven‚Äôt burned or gotten tanner when using it.Caveat: I have normal skin and I don‚Äôt break out easily, so I had no skin problems when I started it. Based off what I‚Äôve read on Reddit, this product has alcohol in it which helps the product dry quickly and feel light. So, it *may* not be ideal for you if you already have dry skin (because alcohol is drying).

product_name: Biore UV Aqua Rich Watery 85 g (1.7 times the normal product) Sunscreen SPF 50 + / PA ++++„ÄêLarge capacity„Äë
review: This is the best sunscreen I've ever used. Feels like NOTHING on your skin. Dries in a minute or less. If your skin is sensitive to products with high alcohol content, this could potentially be drying or cause breakouts, but YMMV.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free
review: After having tried both Cerave and Amlactin, which are not identical products, but seem like they're basically built to do the same thing, I can say that Cerave is the hand's down winner for a variety of reasons.  Despite the fact that it takes longer to see results, Cerave wins due to texture, scent, and overall feel.  I tried really hard to like Amlactin for over a year, but it feels and smells gross compared to Cerave.SKIN SMOOTHING POWER:  Cerave takes a little longer to see results, but there is less irritation.  With Amlactin, I would frequently get itchy, and sometimes get tiny irritated bumps, which were not acne, but could resemble bad skin if scratched.  If you have severe KP, you might want to try both, and even alternate them, but I could not be happier to ditch the Amlactin, so I'll take slow progress over gross feel and smell.SCENT:  Cerave is truly odorless.  In comparison, Amlactin smells sour, and the bad smell lingers for at least an hour or two depending on how much you use.  Not great if you need to use it on your face!  But Cerave has no scent whatsoever.  I can use it on my face and under makeup without issues.TEXTURE:  Cerave and Amlactin appear to have the same pudding-like texture, but Cerave is easier to apply, because it sinks in quicker.  Amlactin leaves skin greasy.  If you applied Amlactin to your feet, you wouldnt be able to walk across a hardwood floor for at least 15-20 minutes unless you put socks/slippers on.MOISTURIZING POWER:  Amlactin in the winner if you are looking for heavy moisture.  But Cerave is the winner if you want clean-feeling moisture.  After applying Cerave, my skin feels lightly hydrated, but then again I don't have extremely dry skin, just skin that fails to slough off nicely.  Since I am oily on my face, I prefer Cerave, because it doesnt make my face feel unpleasantly greasy.PRICE:  Both Amlactin and Cerave work out to be about the same price for the same amount of product.  They both range from $12-15 for an 8oz bottle, so if you can get either one for under $13, you are getting a decent price.BOTTOM LINE:  If moisture is your top priority, and you can stand the gross smell and feel, Amlactin is still worth checking out for KP sufferers.  But if you value clean moisture and a light feeling on the skin, and are willing to wait a little longer for results, Cerave is much, much easier to bear, in my opinion.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free

I wanted smooth skin, and I got it! lol. Very affordable. Quick results. Highly recommended. Periodt.

review: My toddler suddenly had a KP explosion all over his back, chest, belly and thighs. Enough where picking him up he felt gross. I got this CeraVe SA lotion after debating getting a cheaper version because those brands come with more, but decided to just shell out the extra few dollars. So glad I did!!! I am putting it on him once a day (before bed) and doing nothing else. We are on day 3 and he's back to how he was before. Just amazing what a difference after 3 applications.  Will definitely continue to use.

product_name: CeraVe SA Lotion for Rough & Bumpy Skin | 8 Ounce | Vitamin D, Hyaluronic Acid, Salicylic Acid & Lactic Acid Lotion | Fragrance Free

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I feel a little awkward posting a picture of myself after spending the day in hot and humid 75degree weather, mowing, gardening, and having a busy day of taking care of my grandfather... But, because I rely on people‚Äôs reviews, I have to give credit when credit is due...‚ù§Ô∏èI LOVE THIS MOISTURIZER‚ù§Ô∏èI‚Äôve NEVER been able to find a lotion that can moisturize my skin without it looking greasy, or a  ‚Äúnon greasy‚Äù lotion that I have to apply 1000 times a day..üî∏I have severely sundamaged skinüî∏I have deep visible poresüî∏I have very oily and very ‚Äúshiny‚Äù skinüî∏I have acne prone skinüî∏I have patches around my nose and eyelids that are always dryI HAVE SOME AWFUL SKIN and yea it sucks!üîπThis moisturizer has made my face feel so soft, gives it a GLOWüîπthe amount I use is 2-4 finger tips of moisturizer on my face after I wake up and before I go to sleepüåüFor those who want to know my skin care routine:üí•1st I clean my face with 2% Salicylic Acid acne washüí•2nd I use witch hazel for a toner to remove any left over residue (instead of astringent)üí•3rd I make my own sugar scrubs (they are random concoctions usually consisting of raw honey, aloe Vera jel, sugar, fresh squeezed ginger from a garlic squisher, baking soda, and/or oatmeal)üí•4th twice a week I use bentonite clay for a mask mixed with raw apple cider vinegar, honey, and activated charcoalüí•5th again use witch hazel toner to remove any clay residueüí•6th I use Vitamin C and hyaluronic acid serum for hydrationüí•7th I apply this moisturizerüí•8th I put rosehip or jojoba oil and tamanu oil over the moisturizerIt SOUNDS like a pain in the butt and a long process but it‚Äôs not!üåüI started using this lotion early May 2018 and it is now May 19, 2018 and I already see a differenceüåüI would definitely recommend CeraVe, seeing as how I‚Äôve been disappointed with so many products in the past and this is the 1st time in my life I‚Äôve ever seen my skin‚Äôs appearance improve

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I was suffering from itchy legs, a wintertime horrid problem, I mean a month of this was just too much. This stuff healed my dry skin in 2 days! Seriously, I haven't itched since, amazing, and not too much impresses me. Nor do I write many reviews. I now use it on my face, ears, elbows and feet. And if you wanted to compliment me on my legs, thanks, I know I've got good looking ones LOL. FYI it comes in a nice 19 Oz size, plenty without worrying about running out soon.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: there are 2 before and 2 after photos. I had started a new acne medicine and it was causing me so much texture and redness and overall drying my face out so I read the reviews and bought this. These photos were taken about a month apart, using this moisturizer 2-3 times a week, I find that I do not need to use it as often as a daily moisturizer, only when I am doing heavy exfoliants or after deep cleansing my skin. as you can see the texture is gone and the redness has gone down drastically, my face is no longer itchy and craving moisture. it is very thick so use sparingly. it is a very large container of it so it will last a long time! there is no scent and has not broken my skin out at all. it soothes my face, and will sink into your skin but no so much that your pores are clogged. no oily residue left on the skin once it absorbs either. I have incredibly sensitive skin as well and this has NEVER caused me any problems, only solved them

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: This is one of my two most favorite body moisturizers!I am a huge fan of Cerave and this product is truly off the charts in quality. With 3 ceramides, Hyaluronic Acid (HA), Petrolatum, and Dimethicone, my skin has never been so soft and healthy. And there are NO perfumes/fragrances for my sensitive skin!This is definitely a cream, versus a lotion. But it is not too thick. It applies easily to the skin and soaks in quickly, there is no cast.  It does briefly leave a rather slippery feel to the skin but that fades. I attribute that to the HA, which if you have used pure HA serum you know that feeling.I love this tub, 19 ounces of wonderful skin softening Cerave! You can not go wrong trying this product. I use it daily, it is even gentle enough to use on your face and neck.I recommend this product, can I give more than 5 stars?!If you find this review helpful please give it a 'yes' so I know!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs a great product however there was apparently an explosion on the way to my house.Update: After dropping off the explosion at the UPS store, I picked some up from Walgreens. It really DOES feel good and the moisture does stay on for a long time. I‚Äôm have acne prone skin, and it feels pretty good so far. It‚Äôs a little heavier than I‚Äôd like, but I haven‚Äôt found any light feeling moisturizers that actually do their job.Update #2: Ok so after a week or so worth‚Äôs of use...y‚Äôall. Apparently most moisturizers don‚Äôt work. I have acne prone combination skin and on other moisturizers, I would have oily and dry patches. Y‚Äôall! I have NORMAL SKIN NOW!!! Granted I am using other stuff as well, but I have not oily and not dry anymore!! AND my skin looks SO healthy now. I don‚Äôt think I could ever really say that before. Again, I‚Äôm using other stuff but wow. I am the world‚Äôs biggest skeptic when it comes to face stuff as having struggled most of my life with skin issues. Hopefully they‚Äôll package a little better but the actual product has worked amazingly well in only about a week and a half. The only reason it‚Äôs not given more stars is because it came damaged and I had to get it from somewhere else. I didn‚Äôt want to risk another potential explosion.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I use this on my face as a moisturizer and it‚Äôs incredibly lightweight. Dries quickly and I can apply makeup over it within minutes.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: Ive heard good things about CeraVe, but I haven't tried it until now it and I love it. I didn't expect the container to be this big, I can already tell you that it's money well spent. This moisturizer isn't exactly scentless, it's smells like milk on your face, but it's very light so it's not bad. What I love about this cream is how soft it makes my skin feel the next morning, and I have dry skin so most of the time my skin would be peeling off my face which is extremely uncomfortable. They also last pretty much the entire day. So I don't have to worry about my skin drying anymore when I'm outside. Definitely the best moisturizer I've used!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: There are moisturizing creams and there are lotions. I was looking for a cream, but I‚Äôm one of those people who read everything and check it out first. At first I thought I was looking at a popular product, but the ingredients convinced me this was a much better product.The selling point for me was ‚Äúhydration‚Äù, which is a big issue for skin health. Bought the jar, tried it out, and very happy with it. The cream is very smooth, non-greasy, and obviously formulated to deliver a better-than usual experience for general use. Surprisingly nice fragrance, too, rather than the iffy, chemical smells you get from some products. I have really dry skin and this cream has helped my skin quite a bit.I would seriously advise anyone looking for a better moisturizing cream to try this product.Pros:- Great for dry skin- Not greasy- Neutral/gentle smell- HydrationCons:- None so far

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: This is the best cream i have ever used! My skin has been so dried out due to hypo thyroid and this is the only thing i could find to ease it! Baby lotion didnt even help! My face is smooth again! And it works fast! This is a definate must have!!! And the jar is huge! My husband has even started getting into it! Lol he has psoriasis on his hands and he says it really helps with that! Definitely worth the price!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: If I could give this 50 ‚≠êÔ∏è stars I would. My husband and my son had extremely bad eczema. So bad that his pediatrician scheduled to meet with the dermatologist in July. We tried every product on the market literally. All the other products kept making his skin worse. My husband seen a commercial for this and told me to order it for our son. We have been using it for almost a week now and his skin has cleared up amazing. I wish I had before pictures but they weren‚Äôt really that clear so we attached pictures since using it. He does still try to itch but we stop him. This product is amazing!!!! We use it 2 times a day on him. If you haven‚Äôt you should try this product.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: The product is good but this time when I got it, it‚Äôs open because of shipping or?!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: I'm not sure what I expected, afterall this lotion is hyped up in the skincare community, but it exceeds all expectations. It's seriously the most amazing lotion ever. I use it at night, after a double wash and serums. My bf uses it after shaving. I even used it on my feet.  It soaks in so well, has almost no scent, doesn't clog my pores. It's seriously a holy grail product.  I barely use any and it covers my entire face. About a tsp size drop covers my body! Seriously. To put it on my face, I use my middle 3 fingers and just tap them parallel into the lotion (see image). I do that twice and it covers my entire face with a little left over for my hands. I will never wear another lotion.  Ever.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary
review: this stuff is amazing. I've been using it since early 2017 and I'll never use another face moisturizer again. it absorbs easily and isn't greasy, has no fragrance, provides long lasting moisture, and keeps your skin in great shape. plus I use it twice a day and a tub still lasts for a year!!! can't say enough good things about CeraVe!

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary

This area around my nose is what suffered the most. I'm really hoping this doesn't scar.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Normal to Dry Skin | 19 Ounce | Fragrance Free | Packaging May Vary

product_name: Jergens Original Scent Dry Skin Moisturizer, 21 Ounce Body Lotion, with HYDRALUCENCE blend and Cherry Almond Essence, for Long Lasting Skin Hydration (Packaging May Vary)
review: I grew up on Jergen's Lotion.  I've used it on and off as an adult as well...up until this past August.  Back in August 2015 I bought a 21-fl oz of, "Original Scent" with an Illuminating HYDRALUCENCE blend and Cherry Almond essence.  Shortly after using it, my body broke out in a rash.  My arms, neck, chest and legs were covered with tingling, itchy bumps.Thinking that it could be something else, I didn't use it again until just yesterday.  This time, I used it only on my hands and arms.  Again, I'm covered in the same tingling, itching bumps. The irritation is on both hands and both arms. The picture isn't a great representation of the irritation, but you can see some of it.When a product works, it shouldn't be changed.  I purposely chose the original scent as it's what I grew up on and had never had a problem with it. Apparently there have been some changes.  I'll never buy this brand of lotion again.Buyer beware. I've seen others post about their allergic reaction as well.  Test it before you buy it. This is NOT the original formula that anyone over 40-years of age grew up on.

review: im so sad!!! i love the scent, but all of a sudden i now have a terrible welping itchy hive reaction to their scent! why!? did someone decide it was okay to be cheap on scent? thats all im allergic to! so unhappy, i miss my lotion! bring back your quality jergens. i had to buy antihistamines bc of your low quality ingredients, you‚Äôre not what you used to be.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: --- and titanium dioxide is no angel either!! What horrible things to put in an acne fighting productSulphur products normally work Great on acneWHAT HAPPENEDI started using this as I was coming down from a bad breakout, I was going to a wedding in a few days which with my normal acne cycles and healing should've been gone by the wedding (with my normal sulphur drying lotion).  I ran out and saw this on sale.  It was my mistake to just assume they were essentially the same. They were except a few major ingredients! My skin kept getting more and more inflammed, deeper painful knobs were coming up.  I was wondering if I had eaten something.  It just wasn't stopping.  One night I was actually in hives down my chin to my neck!  Later I noticed that I was getting what looked to be just plain cysts..pure inflammation no whitehead or anything.  I was pulling my hair out like what is happening.  I decided to take a look at the ingredients in this imposter. Talc and titanium dioxide... Really!? Who does that? I quick washed it off and ordered Eradikate my normal drying lotion, express shipping.  I will NEVER do that again.  I haven't had breakouts this bad since I started using sulphur in my skincare routine.  This has been the worst in YEARS.  I had so much makeup on at that wedding.  I am going to have scars too.  So mad about this

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: All of the reviews on this product were SO mixed it seriously made me hesitate getting it because of how many things can apparently go wrong. So I flipped a coin lol and decided to purchase this item that I had high hopes for and I don‚Äôt regret it. Shipping was fast and came within 4-5 days. My lil jar came in a small bubble wrapped zip lock bag and was also surrounded by bubble wrap in the box it was shipped in, so it did not come broken like I feared. It did come shaken of course but just leaving it for a good hour or two did the trick :). When I finally tried the product it was amazing! I feared the results of some people where their acne or breakouts got worse but thankfully this did not happen to me. This product definitely reduced redness and helped push up the impurity to take it out effortlessly. Many were frustrated that this product came off in the night on their pillow but I will admit this product takes self control haha especially for a wiggly worm like myself. Depending on where I have the product I will only let myself sleep on one side or if I have it on varying spots I just stay on my back. When I did forget and moved everywhere causing it to come off the results weren‚Äôt as good as when I stayed still and allowed the product to do its thing. Overall I‚Äôm in love with this product and definitely will repurchase!! I‚Äôm glad I took the risk and if your someone wanting to get this product but aren‚Äôt sure,I recommend physically buying it to spend less if you get different results. With shipping this product is about 24 dollars sooo I‚Äôm also considering finding it at a local store haha.

product_name: Mario Badescu Drying Lotion, 1 Fl Oz
review: Seriously do not waste your money. This is  by far the worst product I've bought on amazon. it's been 2 weeks and the pimple I got this product for has not improved and I got 2 more, right next to them which is not usual on my skin. I'm 35 years and I only get one pimple a month and goes away very fast. This has just burned my skin but not improved AT ALL!!Luckily I bought this on an amazon lighting deal and only spent 11 plus tax. However, this is no magic as I read in some reviews.

review: It has been and will be our to go moisturizer. We have been using this for years now and does a great job. However, won‚Äôt suggest this for sun protection. Sunscreen is mandatory along with this too, especially in phoenix where we live.

review: I've used Oil of Olay every day since I was in my 20's. I'm now 57. People think I'm at least 15 years younger.

product_name: NIVEA Skin Firming Hydrating Body Lotion, 16.9 Fl. Oz (Pack of 3)
review: This stuff has really surprising results. My skin is noticeably softer and firmer after only a few days of use. My face is brighter, my hands are softer, and my cottage cheesiness is firmer.I have lost quite a bit of weight (50 pounds and counting) so my skin needs some tightening and toning - this stuff does just that. I also have extremely dry skin in the winter over my whole body and this helps with that as well.I use the ‚Äústronger‚Äù version of this lotion, the gel-cream (on the left in the picture), for my stomach, thighs, and butt. I then use the lotion (on the right) for my chest, arms, hands, and face/neck.It also smells great, not too strong but still a delightful smell. My only complaint, and reason for taking off one star, is that it does leave my skin sticky for an hour or so after application. Other reviewers didn‚Äôt seem to have that problem so I‚Äôm not sure why I do - I usually apply shortly after showering so I know my skin is clean, but still leaves it sticky. Even so, I would still recommend cuz the results are well worth it. P.S. the gel-cream does not leave any stickiness, it‚Äôs great!

review: I have been usin Q10 since years. I have used it in Germany years ago and I have been using it here I the US the last years. Usually buy it in store. Thought I would buy a pack in bulk but upon applying you can tell the difference right away - different consistency and that horrendous smell. Nivea has a very clean and distinctive smell and this is not it!! I mean it has the same smell for almost every product and believe me I have been using their face lotions, Q10 and regular lotions and deodorants as well as the typical lotion in the tin. This is NOT that lotion. It was sticky as heck on my hands and now I wonder which cheap product I applied to my skin and am furious. Returning due to false advertisement. I have also added pictures. The first one is the lotion of Amazon. Note the yellow circle- the Q10 isn't written in it, which i have never seen before. The second picture is the last bottle I bought in store. And no the size doesn't make a doffeeence, they all usually look the same. Don't put this on your skin. Believe the one star reviews.

The packaging does not match my last bottle, which I purchased from a local pharmacy. 5. The font on the Amazon bottle is different from the CeraVe logo, and is missing the trademark icon, which they put on EVERY instance where their name is used.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Face Wash | 16 Ounce | Daily Facial Cleanser for Dry Skin | Fragrance-Free
review: The sole purpose of me buying this was for makeup and oil removal without stripping my skin of moisture. It actually doesn‚Äôt strip anything not even what it‚Äôs supposed to strip away. Makeup was still left on my face even after washing it twice with this cleanser. This would be good for someone that doesn‚Äôt wear makeup, but I would still not recommend using it then because it seems like it will leave buildup on your face with time. That will then cause allergies in the long run. Might be better just to pick another cleanser that actually cleans instead of sitting on your face like a moisturizer.

review: Didn't purchase online (from local grocery store) and for a first time use, this product has given my skin a noticable softness and moisture. I usually get out of showers itchy and dry after I towel off bc of my eczema. 10/10

product_name: Cur√©l Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: This has just become my favorite body and hand cream. I have very dry and sensitive skin. In the winter, when I take off my skinny jeans, I can actually see tiny skin flakes all over the inside of my jeans - this is how dry my skin is. I have tried many body creams and I do like a few. The one that helped me get rid of all the comedones on my thigh is The Body Shop vitamin E body cream (I can't use any acid peel because of my sensitive skin). The one that helps instantly with cracking/peeling heels is L'occitane almond body lotion, but neither really stopped flaking of my leg skin. I have used Eucerin Intensive Repair and it does help, but I really hate the sticky texture and the smell is weird..it's not strong, but enough to repel me. This Curel hydra therapy not only stopped flaking of my leg skin, it also makes my skin feels so smooth. It is a lot lighter compared to the Eucerin Intensive Repair and rubs in very quickly. It is supposed to be applied when skin is still wet, but it takes longer to absorb if applied wet. I usually apply it after towel dry, and it still does the job. It has a very subtle orange smell (from orange peel I believe) which is delightful. I even decanted it into small bottles so I can carry it around to use as a hand cream. The bottle is smaller than what I expected. I use it every day after shower for my legs and arms (I apply quite generously), and it lasted about 1 month. I have just placed an order for the bigger size.

product_name: Cur√©l Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: I love this lotion.  Its not scented, which is an issue for some people but not me, I don't need it to be scented.  My skin gets super itchy in the winter (and I live in the upper midwest so its winter alot) and this almost gets rid of it completely.  Major noticeable difference.  Skin is more moisturized, much less itchy, and it doesn't feel greasy at all.

product_name: Cur√©l Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: This is good stuff! No heavy scent or thick hard to rub in goopey feel to it.  A lotion created to be put on when your skin is wet, it glides on easily and is absorbed fairly quickly without much of a sticky residue. It can be used on dry skin as well of course, but it really is best used when you are damp out of the shower when your skin's pores are open and ready to accept the lotion.This package contains (4) 12 ounce bottles, making each one around six dollars.  Initially that price seemed a tad spendy to me, until I saw how well it worked.The lotion left my skin feeling smooth and hydrated, and this lasted for several hours post shower. **Pat yourself dry after applying for the best results versus rubbing with a towel.** Certain areas (elbows and knees) appeared drier sooner than other areas, but a reapplication to dry skin took care of that problem. The lotion is very concentrated, so whether using it wet or dry I needed very little to get the desired effect.  I did avoid putting this on my face during the day as it appeared somewhat greasy and wasn't the look I was going for with my mineral based matte make-up.I did use it at night after washing my face in place of my usual nightly moisturizer and it worked well. Wherever it is used it seems to create a moisturizing layer to the skin that acts as a barrier of sorts. I noticed it most on my hands when after applying the lotion hours later washing my hands and having them feel moisturized while washing instead of dry afterwards. Definitely seems to work best with continued use, but even with one application it's noticable.Overall, I think this is an excellent product for the whole family. It's not too greasy or sticky going on, and it is absorbed quickly without being sucked up and forever gone as with some lotions. It left my skin looking healthier (see before and after photo on my hand) and had no icky scent. Definitely recommend it to everyone!

product_name: Cur√©l Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: I have used other in shower moisturizers, but this here is my first time using Curel hydratherapy. I got a tube as a sample from Crowdtap and so I wanted to give it a try and see how it worked compared to others that I have used. The moisturizer does not really have to much of a smell at all. Actually I do not think it has any smell at all. Even though there is no scent it worked extremely better than I thought, and that is fine with me. I do have really dry skin, so finding a good moisturizer is hard for me. So when I find a good one I try to stick with it! I have eczema so my skin changes with the season so I was really happy when getting a chance to try this out. Curel has some really great products so I just knew that this wet skin moisturizer would be nothing less then the best.I have been using for about a week now  everyday and I have noticed a difference in my skin and the way it feels. Fall is here and well going into winter and my skin changes almost for the worst. It gets very dry sometimes no matter how much moisturizer I use. It really just depends on the day and the heat. I use other great body washes that have kept my skin feeling wonderful after a shower but then I'd have to put on an additional moisturizer. When using this I noticed that it didn't take long to soak into my skin at all. Another major plus is that my  skin did'nt feel all extra sticky once dried which is AMAZING! My skin didn't feel heavy at all afterwards, I really like this and it has marked its spot in my skin care routine!‚ûΩ‚ûΩI RECEIVED THIS CUREL SAMPLE COMPLIMENTARY OF CROWDTAP TO TRY FOR TESTING PURPOSES AT A DISCOUNT, THIS DOES NOT IN ANYWAY AFFECT MY OPINION OF THE PRODUCT, ALL OPINIONS ABOVE ARE THAT OF MY OWN‚ûΩ‚ûΩ

product_name: Cur√©l Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: Applying lotion on wet skin is something I have done for years although the in-shower lotions, the ones that are to be applied and then rinsed off in the shower have largely left me unimpressed and often with a greasy shower to clean.But this product is simply to be used after showering while skin is still damp. Pat dry with a towel after applying. I found the lotion is quickly absorbed and the water promptly evaporated so there was very limited need to use the towel.A little goes a long way, so only a small amount is needed to adequately moisturize. And another attribute is the lack of detectable fragrance. What a relief not to juggle soap, shampoo and conditioner along with lotion. This also makes the product suitable for either gender.The product did not leave a greasy film or feel. Instead what remained was the impression of a slightly powdery finish and skin that looked noticeably hydrated. I kept a bottle on my desk and reapplied it to my hands periodically and that method was effective, as well.Note that the product has a long list of ingredients and since sensitivities to particular items are not uncommon it might be worth checking the specifics to at least eliminate known problem components.The pump mechanism has a large platform to depress which is more comfortable to use than the skinny spigots, and another user-friendly design, the bottle has ridges on either side to help create a sure-grip when hands are wet. Impressed.

product_name: Cur√©l Hydra Therapy, Itch Defense Moisturizer, 12 Fl Oz (Pack of 1) Wet Skin Lotion, with Advanced Ceramide Complex, Vitamin E, and Oatmeal Extract. Helps to Repair Moisture Barrier
review: We have a toddler that has eczema and lotion normally only aggravates the situation. This lotion is the only lotion that I found that does not aggravate the situation. I apply this lotion immediately after the bath and then use an anti-itch powder with menthol and eucalyptus. He does not itch after application and it also soothes the skin.  Itching is a big part of why his skin would not heal. His skin is clear and it seems to work well. The lotion is unscented and absorbs quickly and easily.  It was not the only thing I have done but it did not hurt like other products.  Since this is the case, I would recommend giving this lotion a try.

review: I bought this cream because in the winter months, I found that after getting home, the skin on my face would be very dry and scaley. So I decided to get some cream to help with that. I've had this cream for about 2 weeks now and I really love it. I am a college student so i'm constantly running around outside from building to building and living in new york it gets pretty cold.For a man such as myself, I've undermined the importance of daily skin care for a long time but recently I've gone further to protect my skin, because why not keep your skin healthy and lively. Whether you think so or not, having healthy skin will improve your daily quality of life. People are sure to notice the difference, and will definitely improve your self esteem. Bright, Soft, Healthy skin is good all year round!.This cream smells amazing!. Me and my mother both use this, and we both love it. just a small dab of it is enough for both my arms, hands and my face. I have definitely felt the difference on my skin after using this the past two weeks. My face feels much softer and looks better. It lasts all day and has become part of my daily routine before leaving the house. The bottle is bigger than i expected so i'm sure it will last me a couple months of use. I will be sure to update this review when it has run out and how my skin is doing after a couple of months.Overall I would definitely recommend this cream to anyone, man or woman, to include in your daily skin care, or even as a gift to a friend. The smell is not too strong but does smell good when i put it on in the morning, and keeps my face nice and hydrated all day.

review: I bought this due to my past acne regime not working. I‚Äôve always had normal skin, which gave me the ability to pretty much use any product without breaking me out or causing irritation. However, after having my son I noticed a change in my skin. A lot of my acne is along my jawline, which could be due to hormonal changes. Once I bought this cleanser and paired it with the moisturizer, my skin was seeing results. These photos are within a few days of using the products. I‚Äôm glad I switched up my routine and gave these products a chance. My acne is slowly but surely clearing up!!

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: It lasts FOREVER! My pimples and blackheads are at a MINIMUM. I haven't seen any pimples on my face in weeks. It is unscented so its perfect for sensitive skin.

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: To make the long story short, this is great for dry, sensitive skin, and it really helps clear acne!Full review:I've had acne since I was 10, and back in the summer of 2016, I was prescribed birth control and a few months of Retin-A cream. Retin-A cream can be really harsh, so I initially only used it for my body acne and not my face. Eventually I started using a tiny amount a few times a week to help my remaining facial acne as the birth control continued to clear it and to help smooth some wrinkles and maybe fade my acne scars. However, I was still using St. Ives apricot scrub with salicylic acid and some roc retinol cream a few nights a week also. Add in some time in the sun with no sunblock, and I ended up with a terribly burned face. This, along with the dryness from a Colorado fall/early winter made my skin extremely dry and painful. I couldn't even apply moisturizer without it burning. Needless to say, I had to stop using any face wash. The dryness also started to make my skin break out, and I couldn't treat it with anything. After desperately googling remedies for my dry skin and forming acne, I started using a mixture of tea tree, argan, jojoba, rose hip, and sometimes castor oil on my face along with frequent honey masks. This fixed my dry skin, which store bought moisturizers for extremely dry skin couldn't do, but I still had terrible acne, like the worst I've ever had in my life. I started using a bar of Cerave moisturizing soap because it was on clearance at walmart for like $1 and I'd heard of people using it for acne. This helped to make my face feel cleaner, but it didn't really help my acne. I knew I needed something that could exfoliate my skin, but there was no way I was going to use something as harsh as the St. Ives scrub again. I decided to try this because I did like the Cerave bar soap even though it didn't help my acne, and this has at least some salycilic acid for exfoliation. When I first used it, I didn't think it was really going to help my acne because the consistency is so smooth and it doesn't seem like it could really exfoliate. However, after 1-2 weeks, I started to notice my skin clearing up. Slowly but surely, this face wash helped to almost completely clear my skin. I had also started taking my birth control more regularly, added a probiotic supplement, and started using vitamin c on my face, so I can't say this is the only thing that helped my acne, but it certainly contributed a lot. I also eventually started using an electric face brush to help exfoliate, and I think that could've helped. I still get acne around my period, and because I'm a college senior, so I'm always super stressed, don't get enough sleep, and don't always eat right. Also, you can't tell from the pictures, but I have quite a few blackheads on my nose. The face wash has helped clear some of those and make them smaller, but I have yet to find a product that actually completely gets rid of them, and I've tried many. Even with the blackheads, my skin is so much better now. This face wash saved my skin, and I think it's worth every penny!Pictures:Picture 1- The right side is a picture from February 14, 2017 without any makeup after starting my oil treatment. The left side is from April 7, 2017 with makeup, but you can still see how awful my skin was. I didn't start using the face wash until around the end of April.Picture 2- The left part is from July 7, 2017, and the two on the right are both from July 17, 2017. I am wearing makeup in all of these pictures, but you can tell that my skin had improved significantly. Few pimples, but lots of acne scars from the breakout.Picture 3- Both were taken August 21, 2017 with make up. Once again you can see I don't have many pimples, just terrible acne scars.Picture 4- The left part was taken December 12, 2017. I was testing a BB cream, so it is cover the bottom half of my face, but you can see that my skin looks pretty clear. The top right side was taken December 13 with the BB cream on my entire face. The bottom right picture was taken today with no makeup. As I said previously, I still get pimples from stress and periods, but they are usually small and mild instead of the giant lumps I was getting before, and they go away really quickly using cosrx pimple patches (definitely check those out) and vitamin c serum. Also, please note that I do have freckles, so most of the spots on my face are just freckles or dark marks from old acne I am still trying to get rid of. Sorry for the long review, and all the pictures with makeup (I didn't take many without makeup when my skin was that bad), but I hope it helped!

product_name: CeraVe Salicylic Acid Cleanser | 8 Ounce | Renewing Exfoliating Face Wash with Vitamin D for Rough and Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I‚Äôve been working to combat my T-zone acne for several of years now. This has been a game changer for me; As before my skin was inflamed (red and the pores left open and exposed to crap in the air) 24/7. And I‚Äôve gone through a lot of other brands to try to treat it! It‚Äôs been 1 week since I‚Äôve been using this: twice daily and using with the SA cream! I‚Äôm posting the ‚Äúbefore and after‚Äù photo so the photo can speak for itself! Again, this is only 7 days between photos, so it‚Äôs still in progress but I already love it! From my experience, the SA wash and cream causes a *very mild* ‚Äúburning‚Äù sensation or itch but I has to be patient. It wasn‚Äôt too bothersome and it became better over time for me. The results are paying off for me so I will continue using! There are no smell that I can pick up on this and it feels clean! The SA cream if you use after the wash is thick but I use it sparingly. Good luck to you guys. My skin was complicated and I hope it works for you guys like it did for me.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: Not sure what's up with this batch or formulation but I had an absolutely horrible allergic reaction. My face broke out in a bright red, burning rash. My 5 year old daughter screamed when I put it on her hands: "It burns! It burns!". Something has either changed with the ingredients or the lotion itself has been sourced from an under-evaluated/regulated/monitored producer or SOMETHING has gone grossly awry as I've used this product for years with my family and never have I ever had any issues. Returning the 2pk/ 8oz'ers pronto!

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: A good, heavier body moisturizer. Cetaphil's current packaging shows it is the "middle" of their lineup.Here in the mid-Atlantic (with our humid summers), I use it mostly during winter cold snaps, and use Cetaphil's lighter "All Skin Types" most of the time. Those of you living in dry climates might find it useful year around. The ingredient list is similar to that lighter lotion, but swaps the avocado oil for macadamia nut oil, and adds shea butter.The lotion is moderately heavy, you can feel it on your skin (likely the shea butter), and if you wash your hands too soon, you'll notice the slickness. I'm not a fan of this weight of lotion normally since it gets on things, and I don't want to pet my cats with it on my hands. But if you're suffering from dry skin or chapping, this is the way to go. And it's not particularly heavy or greasy compared to other heavier lotions I've tried.The odorless is worth extra praise. Manufacturers today seem to fill most products with cloying, overwhelming scents. As a typical male, I'm not really interested in my lotion (or me) smelling like cheap perfume. Worse, many synthetic scent compounds are implicated as health hazards. So an unscented lotion is the only way to go for me. Kudos for Cetaphil doing that across their product line.The packaging changes occasionally (including since last year), but the ingredients seem to stay the same. The current product photo here isn't the new packaging, so I've included a pic of it here.This is my go-to lotion during excessively dry spells. Recommended.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Advance Ultra Hydrating Lotion With Shea Butter For Dry, Sensitive Skin, 16 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: This is marketed for sensitive skin, but I would not recommend. I broke out in hives all over my neck and face.

For some reason my skin does get kinda red affer application but it calms down after an hour. I like that it almost doesn't have a scent.
