product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: My wife had been buying a facial moisturizer from another brand that I had been using which I liked since it was scent free and seemed to disappear on your face and not leave you with that shiny look. It was not cheap but it did the job. Well they decided to reformulate it and put it in a smaller tube and although they said it was scent free still, It now seemed to have a more flowery oder which I did not care for. So I began searching for a new one and it lead me to this product. Been using it for about 3 months now and I would have to say I really like it. Has no odor, does not leave you with that shiny look and keeps my face nice and hydrated. Love the dispenser with its pump top. 3 pumps and I have the perfect amount for me. This should help the bottle last longer as each use is consistent. Seems to last awhile as well and the price is pretty good when comparing it to what I was using. Also I have had no issues with any kind of skin breakouts so it seems to be pretty friendly to that. Just a really nice gentle all around facial moisturizer. Attached picture gives you idea of the size of this product. Highly recommend this one. If you found this review helpful please clink the button below to let me know as I do my best to write honest reviews of items I actually purchase and use. Thanks.

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I have been using this product daily for almost a year. I have sensitive skin combination skin and really can only wash my face with water. I‚Äôd like to point out I don‚Äôt wear foundation and am not wearing any in this photo. I‚Äôve always had a hard time finding a moisturizer that wasn‚Äôt too oily but actually worked and didn‚Äôt break my skin out. This does not clog pores, does make my face oily and my skin has never been smoother. I use to get tiny little numbs in my face from irritation due to other products. Haven‚Äôt had any issues whatsoever with this product and would definitely recommend!!!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I was using a really expensive face lotion because I was experiencing some really stubborn acne and was recommended that brand by a friend and it made my acne SO MUCH WORSE! My whole forehead broke out in tiny bumps and after a week I was red and blotchy and my face was worse than before! I ordered this and I‚Äôve only been using it for about 5 days and already it is completely cleared up and my face is back to being smooth and almost completely acne free again! This stuff is AWESOME! I have to use sensitive skin stuff in everything from detergent to sunscreen and this definitely makes my list of must have products for my sensitive skin. It has an awesome little pump that locks and unlocks into place and doesn‚Äôt feel oily or greasy, and it absorbs into skin fast and leaves it looking healthy and moisturized.Also a bonus! For some reason Snapchat thought the bottle was a face so I was able to face swap with the bottle! 10/10 would reccomend!

product_name: Neutrogena Oil-Free Facial Moisturizer, Sensitive Skin, 4 Fl Oz
review: I‚Äôm a 21 yr old female and have incredibly oily skin and seeing as this product is OIL FREE and CLAIMS to leave your skin matte without ANY OIL OR SHINE, i thought it would be a miracle product! It came quick and the packaging was nice and i love the pump bottle but when it comes down to what it‚Äôs supposed to do, it‚Äôs garbage. I applied after showering and a half hour later it looked like a dumped a bucket of grease on my face. When i ran my finger over my face there was a line of oil that i picked up on my finger!!! Not kidding! This is trash. The pictures don‚Äôt even do justice

It has an SPF of 30 and did not clog my pores as some sunscreens do.  I didn‚Äôt have any irritation or breakouts.  I will continue to use this lotion as it works well, provides protection from the sun and is affordable.

product_name: CeraVe Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 | 1.7 Ounce | Light-Weight Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid | Packaging May Vary
review: Pump Dispenser stopped working after only 3 uses‚ùóÔ∏èAaargh! Return window had already closed I like the light weight feel  of it so I will just cut open the tube and put in a baggie to use the rest but what a hassle!

product_name: CeraVe Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 | 1.7 Ounce | Light-Weight Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid | Packaging May Vary
review: I was looking for a healthy moisturizer with Spf. This one has a great super light weight texture, it's totally transparent and most importantly, doesn't crumble under makeup. The only thing I disagree on is the statement that it has a matte finish - it doesn't make your skin more matte, it just doesn't add extra shine to it.---update---After using it for a few days I've noticed the make up I'm applying on top of it turns a bit darker, than it would on bare skin. That's a shame!Also, it's not very moisturizing.

product_name: CeraVe Face Moisturizer with SPF 30 | 1.7 Ounce | Light-Weight Face Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid | Packaging May Vary
review: I LOVE this face lotion - it's great for my [very] oily skin because it's so light and mattifying yet provides SPF 30. For anyone with greasy skin who is looking for a great product with spf they can wear under their makeup every day without looking like their face is dripping wet by noon (due to oiliness), PLEASE GIVE THIS LOTION A TRY! You won't regret it. Make sure you purchase the "Ultra Light Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin" in the 1.7 oz bottle. CeraVe makes a myriad of face lotions and this one is absolutely incredible. Living (and aging) in Southern California, I've been on a 10 year-long mission to find the perfect balance of a non-greasy face lotion with great SPF coverage that I can use daily, either alone or under makeup. I was randomly given a sample of this and I cannot put into words how amazed I was after the first day of use. I still need my oil blotters throughout the day, but my face doesn't feel like it has a 1-inch layer of Crisco on its surface after being at work for less than an hour.Also, a heads-up to anyone scrolling through these reviews: I've noticed some 1-star comments, however after seeing the specific bottle size and product name at the top of each comment, I soon came to realize that about half of the comments for this product (the "Ultra Light Moisturizer for Normal to Oily Skin SPf 30" are erroneously referring to various other CeraVe face lotions - many are referring to the "CeraVe AM face lotion" or the "CeraVe PM face lotion," both of which come in a 3 oz bottle and shouldn't be confused with the "Ultra Light Moisturizer for Normal to Oily skin, 30 SPF - 1.7 oz bottle" lotion. It's kind of a bummer because this product would probably have a much higher star rating if so many folks hadn't written poor reviews for the wrong items on this product's page. So if you're trying to get a good understanding of THIS product, please disregard all of the reviews for the "CeraVe AM (or PM) Lotion, 3-oz," since those are both completely different face moisturizers from what this comment section is supposed to be about. I even saw photos of the wrong lotion type in the section where people are supposed to post pictures of the product being reviewed. I'm including a picture of the CORRECT product; hopefully that will help lessen any confusion. Sorry for the rant but I just wanted to point this problem out - I was surprised to see any poor reviews and then realized the customers writing about bad experiences were often complaining about a totally different lotion than the product at hand.I have tried (and been disappointed by) so many SPF face lotions - expensive brands, inexpensive brands, and everything in between. Once I found this heavenly product, I was truly elated. It's great for oily skin and feels so light and nourishing - my skin always feels smooth and soft after applying it.It's also much less expensive on Amazon - I was at CVS last night and they are charging about $7 more per bottle. I love Amazon and I love this product. Protecting your skin from the sun on a daily basis is very important and should be a priority for everyone. This is a wonderful, high-quality SPF moisturizer and you should definitely give it a try. Your skin will thank you!

product_name: Moisturizing Lotion HP - Protective Moisturiser: Protects skin from Pollution, Dryness, Metals. Proven Effectiveness. Safe & Pure Formulation. Sensitive, Irritated (Eczema, Acne.), Reactive skin
review: I was a bit surprised at the size of the bottle when it came. I should have known since it's just under 7 oz, but it was a bit smaller than expected.There are some really nice aspects of this. I love that it only has 13 ingredients, no parabens, silicone, or frangrance. Many skin products cause me to break out in tiny little bumps, and I am allergic to gold. I'm also being tested for other metal allergies (although I tested negative for nickel and cobalt already). I'm not sure how this is supposed to protect from metal irritants, but it certainly can't hurt. I also like that it is made in France.There is no scent (which I prefer since fragrances are highly allergenic). The lotion itself is a bit thin and oily. It certainly isn't a "dry" lotion. It rubs in well though and does not leave me feeling greasy or looking shiny. It makes my skin feel soft and doesn't just disappear into my skin like some thinner lotions do. I usually prefer thicker lotions for really dry skin. I think this is a great daily lotion for hydration and protection though.The instructions do say to shake before use. I received a discount on my purchase in exchange for trying the product and leaving an honest review. I'm a very loyal customer to brands that I like, and I don't usually like a lot of different skin products since I do tend to break out and have reactions. So far I really like this though. I just have to keep it away from my husband who would use it up and then balk at the cost of a new bottle. I will update my review if anything happens to change my opinion.update: I have been going through allergy testing to figure out why my forehead is always covered with small red bumps. So far I don't have a positive diagnosis, but I'm leaning toward it being from tocopheryl acetate which is basically vitamin E made in a lab. Vitamin E is very good for the skin so it is used in many skin products. Unfortunately, it gets mixed with acetic acid (the same acid that's in vinegar) in order to make it cheaper and longer lasting. The result is no longer good for skin as it can produce sensitizing and irritation as well as encouraging the carcinogenic effects of UV rays. After recognizing that this ingredient may be my problem, I've been reading through all of the products in my bathroom and was dismayed to find it listed in this lotion. This lotion has very limited ingredients and was specially formulated for those with sensitive skin. I just wish they had stuck with real, pure vitamin E. If you don't have problems with this ingredient then you'll probably love this lotion. If you might already be sensitive to it or have contact dermatitis of unknown origins then just be aware of it in case you have any reactions. Otherwise, I definitely think it's worth a try.update2: After seeking advice from a doctor, dermatologist, and allergist, I finally found a really good dermatologist that seems to know more than the others. She thinks that all of my little bumps are due to the fact that I use facial moisturizer at all. Apparently my oil glands do their job just fine without any additional moisturizing. Certain products (such as sunscreens) that contain moisturizing or oily ingredients can make it worse. On her advice, I have quit using moisturizer on my face. The bumps haven't gone away, but they aren't as noticeable and haven't flared up either.I'm not convinced that this is the problem or at least not the only problem because I get little bumps on the top of my arms after using certain lotions on my arms too, and they're dry. I never used the skintifique lotion on my face, but I have used it on my arms without a reaction.

product_name: Alaffia - Everyday Shea Body Lotion, Normal to Very Dry Skin, Moisturizing Support for Hydrated, Soft, and Supple Skin with Shea Butter and Lemongrass, Fair Trade, Lavender, 32 Ounces
review: This product is INCREDIBLE. I love having unscented lotion on hand. I don't usually want to put anything fragranced on until I decide to wear perfume. It doesn't mess with the scent either. So I have been using raw unrefined shea for some time now. Making little recipes, using it for lip balm or alone on my body. And this lotion absolutely has shea in it. The consistency, the smell, it is legit. It smells like nothing, like it should. It has a hint of nutiness from the Shea. But I personally like that. It isn't greasy at all like raw Shea alone can be. The size for the price is incredible, I was paying $12 for half the size before of a different unscented product. This is it!! I had no issues with the pump or leaking. Don't let that ruin this for you bc even if you can just put it in a new bottle it is that good.

product_name: Alaffia - Everyday Shea Body Lotion, Normal to Very Dry Skin, Moisturizing Support for Hydrated, Soft, and Supple Skin with Shea Butter and Lemongrass, Fair Trade, Lavender, 32 Ounces

That does not speak for the product itself but cost cutting measures when shipping so I'm not letting it effect my review.Scent is light, natural. Reminds me of a light chai tea or vanilla milk scent when applied. Absorbs quickly and leaves skin feeling moisturized but not oily.

product_name: Alaffia - Everyday Shea Body Lotion, Normal to Very Dry Skin, Moisturizing Support for Hydrated, Soft, and Supple Skin with Shea Butter and Lemongrass, Fair Trade, Lavender, 32 Ounces
review: not sure if I will buy from this seller.  The cap was loose, not damage.  I feel the seller did not check to see if the cap was on tight before shipping it.  Probably will look for different seller.Product itself us great.

product_name: Alaffia - Everyday Shea Body Lotion, Normal to Very Dry Skin, Moisturizing Support for Hydrated, Soft, and Supple Skin with Shea Butter and Lemongrass, Fair Trade, Lavender, 32 Ounces
review: I have dry skin, and this product helps combat it. It is very difficult to find products that are truly unscented, but Alaffia achieved this! Many companies add essential oils to cover up the scent of products such as shea butter that has a naturally, light nutty scent to it, and I appreciate that Alaffia shies away from doing this. The lotion itself is thick and creamy, and a little goes a long way. My entire family, including my 5-year-old used this.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream 1.89 oz (Pack of 6)
review: I was SO happy to find this CeraVe Moisturizing Cream in purse-sized (1.89 fluid ounces each) tubes, as it is my very favorite moisturizing cream. It's great for dry skin and keeps working for a long time, keeping my hands soft and moisturized. It's the same amazing stuff I have at home that I buy in the 19-ounce plastic pump jars. This is a great moisturizer, especially for our winter months with the heater going all the time, drying our skin. With this three-pack, there is one for my husband's car, my car, AND my purse!

product_name: Onsen Natural Smoothing Body Lotion with Organic Hydrating Botanicals for Normal to Dry Skin, Daily Nourishing Body Moisturizer, Packed with Healing Minerals for Healthy Skin, Non-Greasy, 6.8 fl. oz
review: I'm in NYC.  The weather is FREEZING, I wash my hands a lot during the day (shouldn't we all lol) and they dry up constantly.  Honestly this cream prevents my hands from cracking.  Also, I love the smell...it reminds me of vacation.

product_name: Onsen Natural Smoothing Body Lotion with Organic Hydrating Botanicals for Normal to Dry Skin, Daily Nourishing Body Moisturizer, Packed with Healing Minerals for Healthy Skin, Non-Greasy, 6.8 fl. oz
review: This is just great stuff. I love it. Sometimes the fragrance that lotions have are just distasteful to me. I like the no fragrance and it goes on just like silk. Try some, you won't be disappointed.  I was a little concerned when I found the tube of lotion just loose in a padded envelope but it made it ok.

review: I love it! I did give it 4 starts bc i hate that you have to wash it off after... but it smells great ( very light  scent ) gentle enough to use on my whole family  toddler included ! A tiny bit goes a long way! It's very hydrating .

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: Came damaged.

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: 1/16/17 UPDATE:  Initially, no issues with using it in the shower, as we wash out our shower after each use anyway. However, after using this for a few months now, it has damaged the floor of our shower.  We have river rock with sea glass for our floor that has been sealed very well with top of the line sealer, and the off white grout has turned a veiny dark brown where I stand to apply the lotion.  We're now on week 2 of daily degreaser scrubbing and it's slowly coming up.  As for how the product feels, I like it, but it's not worth the damage that it's causing to our shower.  Sad to say, I won't buy this again.  I also have a very unhappy husband right now.  Not worth it at all.  Updating from 5 stars to 1, I might give it 5 again if I start showering in the yard, but it'll probably kill our grass.ORIGINAL REVIEW: I think I went through way too much the first time I used it. It's thickness is that of lotion. I think I was expecting more of a soap/lotion combo. Learning curve though, no biggie. A little does go a long way. I loved how this made my skin feel afterwards and the scent is beautiful! I'll be buying this again.Use hot water when rinsing out the shower, cold will leave it slippery. This is no biggie for us as we rinse the shower after every use anyway. No issues there as far as I'm concerned.My skin feels great! Thank you!

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: Good

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: While I first thought this was the most gimmicky product out there, I'll admit I tried it because I hate touching lotion. It's greasy and usually smells like cupcakes or some other weirdness. And this is from a woman lol. I want to smell nice, but not overtly like a baked good. Just sayin. This has a pleasing fragrance but goes away fairly quickly and doesn't overpower your shampoo/conditioner/body wash once you get out of the shower. It makes your skin moist without having to put lotion on and then lay on a towel for 10 mins while it dries before ya put clothesOn. Win! The only con is that it does leave an oily residue on the bottom of tub. I usually just squirt some pump foaming soap on floor and kinda run around and rinse before I get out and it solves the problem.

product_name: NIVEA Nourishing In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 fl. oz. Bottle
review: this works really well for me, i received it as a sample, but ended up buying some. I love how it makes my skin feel. I have used it out of the shower also (sparingly) and it seems to work great either way. The scent is light.. it smells almost exactly like regular nivea lotion.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Body Lotion with Vitamin E | 13.5 Fl Oz
review: I ordered this product because it is listed as fragrance free. However the product I received was not fragrance free. I checked the ingredients list on the 2nd picture to double check and it also has fragrance listed in the ingredients. This item is either mislabeled or I received the wrong thing.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Body Lotion with Vitamin E | 13.5 Fl Oz
review: What I liked about this product is (Just my personal views be respectful please)1. I have moderate to severe eczema and even tho this isn't the crazy expensive stuff people with my condition are used to it helps cool the burn when I don't have anything. Doesn't help the itching at all tho.2. The scent is really good as well it's texture is completely different if u have tried the raw form they have . That one smells good but lingers way to long lol. This is just right.3. Probably my favorite thing about the Palmer's brand . The fact that it gets rid of scars and tones skin. review: This product burned my face. It is the only new skincare item I've added to my regimen. The picture above is 36hrs later...After multiple cold water compresses, Advil and Benadryl for the reaction and inflammation.I'm not sure how clear it is in the picture, but my under eye /cheek area is still so irritated and swollen that you can see a visible crease/line above that area.

This cream does not blend into the skin. Really bad.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: ¬†I have been liking the product they got but the last one I received from amazon the pump did not work, even though i must have pumped like 100 times and still no lotion coming out. I checked the inside and looks like it only goes up half way and stuck there. Had to use the old lotion‚Äôs top to use for the new one.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: First of all, I have tan skin. When I applied this product I was scared that it would leave a white film over my face but it didn‚Äôt. I DID HAVE TO WORK WITH IT THOUGH. Applying it initially does leave white streaks. Although, I learned that if I apply it on regularly and let it sit on my face for a few minutes, I could blend out those white streaks. I look crazy at first but it is blend-able. I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs good for a sunscreen to be blended out, so that is up to your interpretation. Also, I have no idea if this technique would work on darker skin than mine.Secondly, I have dry and sensitive skin. On my skin it looks ‚Äúoily‚Äù or ‚Äúshiny‚Äù or maybe even ‚Äúdewy‚Äù, but I don‚Äôt mind because I rarely see my skin dewy. Also, my skin just sucks it right up after 15-20 minutes. I don‚Äôt mind this product and I would buy it again because it does make my skin feel super moisturized.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: I love this moisturizer because it goes on smoothly and doesn‚Äôt leave a greasy or oily feeling behind! It made my skin soft and I don‚Äôt need to use a separate sunscreen so I‚Äôm quite satisfied with it. It came dermatologist recommended and it‚Äôs perfect for the winter time when my skin gets dry! The only thing I don‚Äôt like is it sometimes peels off when I apply it first under my makeup and I think it‚Äôs because of the sunscreen that‚Äôs in it. However it does moisturize pretty well and doesn‚Äôt burn when applied to dry skin or sensitive under eyes area

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free

Will be returning this and going back to the daily moisturizing product.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: I have been using the Cerave ultra-light facial moisturizer on a daily basis. I just ran out and made the mistake of ordering this to replace it. It is not the same (my mistake) and made me breakout like crazy after just two days of using it in the AM. I do get occasional cystic acne on my chin or cheeks but I have never had a product make me breakout this way. I will not be using this on my face again. The picture is from Tuesday. I received the product on Sunday and started using it Monday.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: Wowwww!!!For the last year I was using Cetaphil (oil control) moisturizer with spf and it would do a decent job in terms of moisturizing and sun protection it seemed like it only exasperated the oil on my face and come 5pm end of the work day you could see your reflection in my face.I was so blown away by the cereve cleansing water and night cream I figured I needed to ditch the ceraphil day moisturizer with spf and try the am moisturizer with spf. Right away I noticed it‚Äôs wayyyyyy less oily and has more of matte finish. It controls oil throughout the day and it‚Äôs wonderful. If you have dry skin though you may find it‚Äôs a little too lightweight. After using the cleaning water, day cream and night cream I‚Äôve noticed drastic improvements in my skin and with this NC summer heat humidity these are the only products touching my face and I have had zero breakouts or issues.Cereve makes incredible products and is worth every penny seriously! If you have oily or combination skin these products are super lightweight and won‚Äôt clog your pores or break you out and if you live in the south you need products like this. Use the entire line though you‚Äôll notice even better results.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion AM SPF 30 | 3 Ounce | Daily Face Moisturizer with SPF | Fragrance Free
review: I had high hopes for this. I‚Äôm starting to use Retin A and needed a good sunblock. I go to work at 5:30 am so I was planning to just use this on the weekends, and use something else for when I leave work. Anyways- first day I felt it was ok. I was rubbing it in nice and good- or so I thought, until i started to feel it balling up under my fingertips. So you can‚Äôt really rub it in good. It‚Äôs kiie you have to quickly slather it on and that‚Äôs it. Now, after only 2 uses I have a rash on my face and neck. You can kinda see in ge picture that there are just bumps all over my face. So my skin is too sensitive for this. This is the only new thing I added to my facecare regimen. I do like the Cera Ve PM lotion.

You get what you pay for. I couldn't sleep the first night I used it and had to get up and wipe it off. I tried again another night and had to take a shower.It's extremely greasy on my skin. It didn't absorb well at all. I now use it sparingly on the soles of my feet then jump into socks so I can't feel it.It wasn't a good purchase for me. It's spring now so if I haven't found someone to gift it to I'll try it again next winter God spare life.Stay safe y'all! üò∑

product_name: OGX Extra Creamy + Coconut Miracle Oil Ultra Moisture Lotion, 19.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
review: I have very dry, ash skin (always have).  Winters in the tundra have always been rough.  Originally this body wash was purchased accidentally  (someone didnt close the Amazon app before letting little fingers play on my phone).  We happen to be low so I thought, "Why Not?"This wash didn't miraculously transformed my old ashiness into the supple skin of a 20-yo, but i did find that after a few days my skin would soak in more moisturizer  (same brand I always use), and after a week that dry itchy feeling had gone.  After a month there is a slight but noticeable change to the look of my skin.  My husband has noticed a dramatic change to the way my skin feels.If you are in the market for a moisturizing wash that changes your skin for the better after each wash--- I strongly recommend this OEX Body wash.If you like this review--dont hesitate to hit the "like" button.

review: Nivea is the only lotion I use and this specific one, is THE BEST out of their entire line. One, the lotion smells great. It's not a strong overwhelming scent. Two, it hydrates your skin. It smooths your skin and makes it soft, and leaves it hydrated all day. One time I made the mistake of purchasing the dark blue bottle (almond oil) and the formula was way too rich and greasy. This one is perfect. I love it. I use it on my entire body, face included.

review: Excelente producto la mejor calidad ! Muy feliz con mi compra y sus vendedor. Gracias.
