product_name: NIVEA Cocoa Butter In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 oz. Bottle
review: Makes your skin so soft

product_name: NIVEA Cocoa Butter In-Shower Body Lotion - Non-Sticky For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 13.5 oz. Bottle
review: The Nivea In-Shower Cocoa Butter Body Lotion is mean to be used in the shower and RINSED OFF while in the shower.  It is not meant to be used as a typical body lotion.  Personally, I like the fragrance and the results! Especially with Fall and Winter on the way, this will definitely help!  The only reason for my 4 stars versus 5 is that it does leave the shower somewhat slippery. Just let the water run for an extra minute once you get out and all is fine. My husband is disabled, so this is important to us. Many won't notice the difference, but we have enough balance issues in our house. So better to be safe.  Definitely not a negative about the product, just an extra FYI for when you make the purchase!  I will purchase again!

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Futur-e Day Face Moisturizer with SPF 15 Lotion with Vitamin E for Normal to Dry Skin 4 fl. oz.
review: I've been using this moisturizer since I was in my late twenties. I'm over forty now & look ten years younger. I get compliments all the time about how young I look. I do other things to like avoid the sun, use retinol & hylauronic acid products, but this lotion has been a staple. Using this in combination with good skin care practices has kept me looking great. Love this stuff! (The picture has no filter or skin perfecting cheats except regular light foundation.)

product_name: L'Oreal Paris Futur-e Day Face Moisturizer with SPF 15 Lotion with Vitamin E for Normal to Dry Skin 4 fl. oz.
review: I am not allergic to anything that I know of but this moisturizer made my face burn like crazy until I washed it off. I thought it might have been a one-time thing so I stupidly tried it again and this time it gave me an even worse reaction and left this rash on my face, pictured. I did test it on my hand before using it but I guess my face skin is way more sensitive. Not saying it's a bad product because maybe I just have some unknown allergy but still I am definitely surprised and frustrated about how awful this has been for my skin.

product_name: Remedy Dermatology Series Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 12 Oz, Unscented Lotion, Paraben Free, Lotion for Sensitive Skin, White
review: This product arrived about five days after the day it was supposed to be delivered. Once I opened the box, the pump was off. I‚Äôm still unsure if it‚Äôs broken or just a special way the ship the pump with the bottle? I can‚Äôt get the pump attached back to the bottle, so I‚Äôm pretty sure it may have been damaged during shipping. The lotion doesn‚Äôt smell good, but it is very moisturizing and doesn‚Äôt burn my sensitive skin!

product_name: Remedy Dermatology Series Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 12 Oz, Unscented Lotion, Paraben Free, Lotion for Sensitive Skin, White
review: I am really impressed with this Remedy Dermatology Series Moisturizing Body Lotion for Dry Skin, which not only is thick and creamy feeling upon pumping it out of the bottle onto your hands, but it absorbs quickly and almost without a trace of any negative "after feel" like so many lotions for very dry skin. This has no greasy, waxy or plasticky afterfeel, but just leaves my hands surprisingly soft and moist, as you would hope any lotion would (but they don't, usually). I have very dry hands that have micro cracks in them if I look closely. I also have sensitive skin, so I can't just use any lotion, since I sometimes get a rash. This particular lotion by Remedy seems to be one of those few lotions that really works for me, and I'm quite pleased with the results that not only last quite a while (next hand wash), but also seems to be improving my skin overall over time.  I'd definitely recommend this for your dry hands (or feet).

product_name: Remedy Dermatology Series Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 12 Oz, Unscented Lotion, Paraben Free, Lotion for Sensitive Skin, White
review: This remedy body lotion formula is very thick and allergen-free and fragrance-free. There are no parabens, phthalates or sulfates and it is PH balanced. The ingredient list is long and if possessing sensitivities it may be wise to peruse before use. And, although there is no fragrance added it does have a scent from the components in use which to me smells like isopropyl alcohol.The pump mechanism is easy to operate just turn the spout counterclockwise to unlock and clockwise to lock. The pump can be partially depressed so a controlled amount can be released which avoids product waste. The product does not leave a sticky residue and is quickly absorbed.

product_name: Lubriderm Daily Moisture Body Lotion for Sensitive, Dry Skin, Enriched with Vitamin B5, Dye and Lanolin Free, Unscented and Non-Greasy, 16 fl. oz (Pack of 6)
review: How do you get out the last 1 or 2 ounces that always remains at the bottom? See my photo.¬†6" Large Plastic Funnel (32 Oz.) *Great Quality*I like the "sensitive skin" better than the "fragrance free," because the latter goes rancid sometimes. I've never had the "sensitive skin" Lubriderm go rancid.

product_name: Lubriderm Dermatologist Daily Moisture Lotion for Normal to Dry Skin 3 Pack Value Pack
review: Great for everyday use with a scent that is nice but doesn't linger after the lotion is absorbed. No sticky patroleum feeling after either. Not as watery or thin as Vaseline or Suave. This is not for dry patches or calloused hands.My only pet peeve about thr larger bottles is the pump head falling off/being loose. It is very easy to reattach but annoying. Of course with any lotion, you have to unscrew the lid and shake to get the last bits out.

product_name: Lubriderm Men's 3-In-1 Lotion Enriched with Soothing Aloe for Body and Face, Non-Greasy Post Shave Moisturizer with Light Fragrance, 16 fl. oz
review: Good for me. soaks in and has a subtle masculine scent. Wont replace your favorite cologne or after shave but it is a quality lotion. I use on face and whole body. Three star because at the end of the life of the bottle, it leaves so much in the bottom - unused that is a lot of hassle to get out. The pumper will not pump out the last inch ( what that converts to % wise I have no clue ). Check out the photo of the cut away that displays in full view what is left inside. I did this so others could see the waste / hassle before they decided to buy or not.Hey Lubriderm ! Improve the pumper.

product_name: Lubriderm Men's 3-In-1 Lotion Enriched with Soothing Aloe for Body and Face, Non-Greasy Post Shave Moisturizer with Light Fragrance, 16 fl. oz
review: Great on my nuts

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: This is fantastic hydration for 60 & over skin. Neutrogena products have been recommended to me as an effective an affordable alternative to the high priced skin care lines. (I also use rose water mist in combination with this). Very light, goes on smoothly and absorbs quickly.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I went from very dry, flaky angry skin to soft and supple in about 1 week. I noticed a change instantly. My acne has even started clearing up. Keep in mind I also added vitamin E oil serum to my skincare routine at the same time. I highly recommend. The product is a great consistency, is cooling/calming, light, and has a pleasant smell.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I ordered this product due to the ranting and raving of many people saying how great it is. I was looking for a nice moisturizer and thought I would give it a try. Please be aware that i do not suffer with any excessive acne. My skin in combination and i only get the monthly  breakouts on my forehead Around " that time of the month". After using this product the first day, my skin felt nice  and supple, just like what everyone else was saying.after my second day, i noticed a rash. It looked likea heat rash and i figured it was from the recent summer weather. However the following day it broke out into white heads all over my face, in places i have never experienced a break out. I dont have sensitive skin and this has never happened to me before with any other products. I camnot give this product 1 star because it indeed did hydrate my skin, however i now have to find another product to clear up this acne and then find a second one to moisturize( my initial reason for purchase. Be careful!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: So soft and quick absorbance. Smells good. It‚Äôs not heavy, greasy or sticky. I like it. It‚Äôs like high end products.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: My dermatologist recommended Neutrogena Hydro Boost as a way to slow down wrinkles that were starting to form on my forehead and cheekbones. I'm 57 and wish I had known about this product sooner to help me slow down the eye wrinkles (which came first)... but after using this now for about 6 months, I love what it's doing to add moisture and smooth out my skin on the rest of my face. This absorbs in and isn't a greasy layer sitting on top of my face like a lot of other moisturizers. It feels refreshing too, almost like I've cleaned and moisturized in one swoop and it's my go to blast of coolness for my face on a hot day.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: After reading several rave reviews on cosmo, refinery, youtube, and other beauty websites I just HAD to try this moisturizer. I definitely get why it gets such great reviews. It's very lightweight, the scent isn't overpowering, and it's decently priced. HOWEVER...my one caveat is the packaging. It's 2019!!! Why on earth would I want to spend 20$ on a moisturizer that I have to dunk my fingers into? It's not very eco-friendly or hygienic. While I wash my hands almost excessively it's still just not convenient to be dipping my fingers in the same pot over and over again. But if you are looking for a good moisturizer that's a dupe for Tatcha water cream or Ginzing this is your guy!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I had bought the face mask version of this product and was impressed at the amazing hydration it gave my face. In an attempt to reduce plastic waste, I bought this jar of the moisturizing product instead and I‚Äôm so glad I did! I had some sort of rash develop in my face a couple of weeks ago (before using this product) and everything I tried was making it more flaky, itchy, and irritated. This has been the first product to actually help hydrate the area without irritation. This is bringing youth & moisture back to my face.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: Got this product having already bought it once in Walgreens and used it for months, the one the photo shows. The box came damaged with the outer seal broken, with text in what appears to be German, with a printed sticker on the back of box with the english translation, the product did not have description of having hyaluronic acid on the container, i know it is supposed to be color less, this one was blueish, its supposed to be fragrance free and this one has a lot of fragrance. Does not have a serial number or code on bottom as the ones I buy in the store do. Looks like an outdated version of what is now this product. I do love the true product this picture shows, its a great product but for some reason I got a mistaken or outdated version of what the product really is, did not even dare to put it on my face so I asked for a refund and sent it back. As you can see in the pictures, the presentation is not even the same

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: The package was torn and there was no inner seal or cover within the jar which I found odd, was expecting one.This was such a let down! I really wanted to like this product but as soon as I got it and opened the jar, a strong fragrance emerged. I was very wary because I know fragrances aren't good for the skin but because of all the hype I figured it must still be good.I used it for about 4 days now and I'm currently breaking out. When I first put it on I also felt a burning sensation on my skin and I really didn't like it but I tried to give this product a chance.I'll stick to my pure hyaluronic acid which is also cheaper and more for your $. In the past I have used Neutrogena (for sunscreen) and they were decent, but they dropped the ball on this one for me.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: YES x 100!My face is super oily and sensitive, especially to scents. I‚Äôve tried it all! For the past year I use cetaphil face wash and moisturizer, but the moisturizer was just not hydrating my skin enough during these cold months.The texture of this feels a little thicker than cetaphil so I thought oh man this is a bust‚ÄîI was wrong! I put it on and instantly my face felt so hydrated! Then I thought, I wonder if it‚Äôll leave a sticky or thick feeling‚ÄîNOPE! I‚Äôll probably have to reapply at some point today‚ÄîNOOOOPE! Hours later, Is my face shiny yet?? NOPE! AAAAH‚ÄîMAZING!LEGIT! It‚Äôs not like me to spend $10+ on face products‚Äîbut I am SO HAPPY I did! This stuff is awesome! I apply it after I wash my face/shower, a swipe on my cheek bones, forehead, chin and it lasts me ALL DAY! All day! With this, my face doesn‚Äôt get oily throughout the day AND when I wake the next morning, my face is so soft and smooth af! FREAKING love this!If you have an annoyingly oily, sensitive face BUY THIS! My face will freak tf out with scented products‚ÄîIdk wth people are talking about a scent. There‚Äôs non and there‚Äôs definitely no negative reaction going on with my super sensitive skin.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: i usually order this product on amazon and for the first time it came in this different package. i want to try it but i‚Äôm worried it will break me out. the product it self, from the times i‚Äôve used it before was great helped me out with my oily skin. now i‚Äôm just worried if i use it the product something will go wrong.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: This stuff feels sooo good on my skin. It soaks right in and doesn't leave any sticky residue - I can put my makeup on quickly after applying. A little bit goes a long way.It definitely is scented, but the smell isn't too obnoxious. It's also gentle enough to use around my eyes without any irritation.I did notice some improvement in the texture of my skin, but I wouldn't consider this a heavy moisturizer. I've almost used it up and the fine lines around my eyes are the same after consistent use.I've enjoyed using this,  and I might keep some around to use to prep my skin before applying makeup, but it's not enough by itself. I'm 32 and I may just need more from my moisturizer at this age. This would probably be perfect for someone in their teens and 20's.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: My new holy grail product!! This along with the Hydro Boost cleanser and the moisturizing tint foundation makes my skin clear, soft, moisturized and glowing! I‚Äôm 41 and I‚Äôve tried a ton of products trying to get my skin back in balance. Ive always had combo skin but I had developed these angry red bumps on my face that would constantly have dried flaky skin on them. Nothing I tried could get the bumps to calm down and go away and get rid of the dry flaky areas. Only been using this combo of products for 5 days now and my skin is so happy and looks flawless! I will continue to buy and recommend! My photo has no filter and all I‚Äôm wearing is the Hyro Boost moisturizing tint in natural ivory with my regular highlighter powder, some blush and mascara! I have very little makeup on and my face feels fresh and not cakey at all!

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I‚Äôd say this makes my skin feel better than my 55 dollar Clinique moisturizer, however, it has a bunch of additives I‚Äôm not fond of. Such as coloring for a blind tint, glycerin, and a strong fragrance additive. To sum up my experience with this product, I would say it is a good alternative to a high-end moisturizer on the grounds that it gives amazing results. However, it would not be a good product for those with a green-skin care routine.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: This is the second time I have ordered this product on Amazon and it might be the last. I'm not sure why but what I received looks different from before. Not only does the packaging look different but the gel itself is different. The original one had and off white translucent cream but the new one I received is now a blue translucent cream and it has a strong fragrance that the original did not have as it is suppose to be fragrance free. Idk what Amazon is stocking but I am unpleased and will be asking for a refund

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I loved how refreshing this Neutrogena Hydro Boost moisturizer feels on my face, but once that initial feeling goes away, my skin feels so dry. I started applying larger amounts, but it doesn't seem to help. I tend to apply this product 3-4x a day instead of once with the "all day" hydration this product tends to promote. I've resorted back to using my Jergens lotion instead because that seems to help my skin stay hydrated a bit more.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I‚Äôve only tried the lip treatment and moisturizer and they are great. But you do not get much for the money. This is something I would be more likely to buy for $10-$15 Not $20. Honestly I clearly didn‚Äôt read closely because I thought it was a full size moisturizer plus the other items to try out. So for the price is why it gets 4 stars

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I BELIEVE THIS IS A FAKE PRODUCT. Says it‚Äôs produced in the USA but it‚Äôs all in another language. The product photos also do not match the packaging that I received.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I love how smoothly it glides on. You only need two pea sized drops to cover face and neck. There‚Äôs not that much though and I use it up in 2 weeks. So plan on paying $40/mos for it. It gives great evening Coverage and in a very tiny amount is light enough to go on before makeup. I love it. <3Use it in conjunction with Olay regenerist under eyes and on crows feet. This tends to dry me out as it plumps my skin so this neutrogena Works like a charm.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Hyaluronic Acid Hydrating Water Gel Daily Face Moisturizer for Dry Skin, Oil-Free, Fragrance-Free, Non-Comedogenic & Dye-Free Face Lotion, 1.7 fl. oz
review: I love this product. I use it every morning first thing after I wash my face. It has a very pleasant and light smell. I also like its consistency. It feels fresh and moistures my skin very well. I‚Äôve been buying and using it since last year and am very satisfied with the results. I totally recommend it.

product_name: Aveeno Skin Relief 24-Hour Moisturizing Lotion for Sensitive Skin with Natural Shea Butter & Triple Oat Complex, Unscented Therapeutic Lotion for Extra Dry, Itchy Skin, 12 fl. oz
review: This product is awesome for restoring skin conditions like eczema or relief from dry damaged skin.

product_name: Aveeno Skin Relief 24-Hour Moisturizing Lotion for Sensitive Skin with Natural Shea Butter & Triple Oat Complex, Unscented Therapeutic Lotion for Extra Dry, Itchy Skin, 12 fl. oz
review: Perfect for people with Sensitive skin

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I received a sample of this via the Loreal website and instantly fell in love with it! Perfect timing cause I was looking to switch to a lighter weight moisturizer for summer and couldn't decide on one. This is like a hybrid of Cream and water. It's pumps out as a runny, Thin cream that speaks so effortlessly into your face leaving it plumper glowing, so soft, and more youthful looking. It did come with a coupon but it's even more expensive at retail stores. Amazon is by the far the cheapest I found it for. A little of this (one pump), goes a LONG way so this size bottle will last a significant amount of time. Will definitely get my money's worth. I highly recommend this!

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Upon receiving the items I have read a geek reviews stating it was running and was the original product. But to my surprise I received the product in a box and the consistency of the moisturizer was thick when pumped. After smoothing the product all over it became transparent and also gave it a little manly smell, but not too over powering, the scent is quite pleasant. After the application my skin felt cool, hydrated and glowy. It didn‚Äôt give my skin a tacky or sticky feeing.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Amazing at this price!

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: I love this product! First of all the bottle is just pretty and looks fancy and makes me smile when I see it on my bathroom counter. I usually keep things out of sight but this I leave out. I have normal to dry skin but lately with spending more time outside and in the pool my skin has been drier. I was shocked that one little pump actually covered my whole face. It is completely clear and is effortlessly and quickly absorbed into my skin. It has a light fragrance that reminds me of the ocean which I think is perfect but it goes away pretty quickly if you don't like fragrances. It immediately makes my skin glow and that luminous look lasts all day. I've been using it about two weeks now and my skin is hydrated, looks great and I think my pores even look smaller. It's wonderful not having to rub in moisturizer to have it absorb into my skin or end up with too much that won't rub in or white marks that don't blend in. I only wish it had an SPF. I will definitely be buying more! I received a free sample through BzzAgent.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: This product is amazing, the bottle is a little bigger than expected but it's not huge. My skin is a combination of oily and dry and this works great. I was using the Clinique moisture surge for a long time but that got pricey. This gives me really similar results. The only down side is that the bottle is made of glass and that makes me a little nervous to travel with it

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Texture-wise not too different from most drugstore gel moisturizers, and the scent is pretty strong but not unpleasant. Hopefully just my luck, but I'm curious how this bottle passed quality control with this speck of what looks like goldfish poop in the bottle.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Just received today. Have purchased before. As it is Winter, needed the dry skin formula ASAP.  I love this product & would/will buy again.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Product I received on the left, sample of the product in the right. They don't look or smell the same. I'm disappointed in this purchase.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: Hydra "Genious"...one would think that this gel is so smart that it would know how to and how much to moisturize the skin, okay perhaps not the gel itself but the makers of it when they made the formulation...no, not the genius in any way.This gel is just terrible. It resembles a sticky water and it feels the same way when it dries. It does not moisturize in any way and I have oily T-zone and really just need the moderate moisture on my cheeks. My nose was peeling from dryness and regardless how much of this gel I used it made no difference whatsoever. I have not tried the Dry Skin version of this so maybe that one would have worked better for me, but this one is just awful.I really liked the glass packaging and the pump dispenser on this gel. It's a generous size as well and I wouldn't mind paying the store price had it actually been effective. Unless your face is extremely oily it may work for you, but even oily faces need some degree of moisture to keep it balanced. This is just plain water. I would not recommended this gel, especially not to people with any degree of dryness.

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: NO FILTER ON PICS, I have semi oily skin/non sensitive skin, product broke me out first time I tried (took 3 days to get use to it, i never moisturized because i thought I‚Äôd get more oily), product feels like ur rubbing hand sanitizer ( without burn),  I‚Äôve been using for 4 months 2x a Day bottle half way empty ( one pump goes a longs way) I really like it gives me smooth skin and a nice skin glow/shine, also smooths out crows feet, light scent of citrus, will continue to use. I DO NOT RECOMEND TO PPL WITH DRY SKIN!

product_name: Hyaluronic Acid Moisturizer for Face, L'Oreal Paris Skincare Hydra Genius Daily Liquid Care Oil-Free Face Moisturizer for Normal to Dry Skin with Aloe Water and Hyaluronic, 3.04 fl. oz.
review: This product is for üåùmorning and üåönight time use, it absorbs really fast in the skin so it doesn't leave it greasy or wet. I bought the normal to dry skin, they also have two other ones for oily skin and super dry skin. I really recommend this as a primer before using your makeup because I find that it leaves my makeup looking more smoother & flawless it doesn't feel sticky at all.üôÇüëçüèº Wonderful product smells really fresh and the skin feel smooth,,,I recommend this,give it a try. ‚ù§Ô∏èI love L'Oreal products they always giving us something new &  fresh.üôåüèºHappy  Amazon carrying  this new product awesome.‚≠êÔ∏è

product_name: Ordinary People
review: This is the story of hollywood that is difficult yet true. It's from source material and characters that breed empathy and respect to the viewer as if it where a spiritual experience. Death and the dinner and the challenge of social conventions to help with fear and a lost paradise that may not exist. Self importance is not in the ego. It's in the actions of motion. This story is a treasure of the human spirit.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Soothing Oat, Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing & Fragrance-Free Intense Body Moisturizer, 18 fl. oz
review: I have dry and sensitive skin. Since creams for dry skin usually turns out to be very rich, I was looking for more of a ‚Äûlightweight‚Äú lotion for my everyday use. Searching Amazon, I found this lotion and decided to give it a shot. Applying this lotion over my whole body leaves my skin smooth and moisture without an oily film all day.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Soothing Oat, Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing & Fragrance-Free Intense Body Moisturizer, 18 fl. oz
review: I believe this is a good product. But I got the product with leaking problem. I think it's nozzle need something for shipping.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Soothing Oat, Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing & Fragrance-Free Intense Body Moisturizer, 18 fl. oz
review: Product was delivered with bottom of lotion bottle completely smashed. Outside box wasn‚Äôt damaged, but lotion was everywhere!

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Soothing Oat, Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing & Fragrance-Free Intense Body Moisturizer, 18 fl. oz
review: Good price, Always used, smells clear.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Soothing Oat, Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing & Fragrance-Free Intense Body Moisturizer, 18 fl. oz
review: This is a light-weight moisturizer.  It doesn't really feel as though it sinks in deep to the skin so probably isn't best for very dry, chapped skin but is good for everyday moisturizing.  As shown, it comes in a bag to prevent leakage (which I appreciated).  I pictured it next to a can of pop (or soda, depending on where you live) so you can see how large the bottle is.  The description on the bottle states it dries to a powder-like feel but I don't find that at all.  There is a light sweet scent, but it is not overpowering.  It is made in Canada and NOT cruelty-free, if either of those makes an impact on your purchasing decision.

product_name: Aveeno Sheer Hydration Daily Moisturizing Lotion for Dry Skin with Soothing Oat, Lightweight, Fast-Absorbing & Fragrance-Free Intense Body Moisturizer, 18 fl. oz
review: I have been using Aveeno fragrance free lotion for years for my sensitive skin. The lotion I have been buying does not have the blue ribbon on it like this one that says 'SHEER HYDRATION' - I thought that they maybe just updated the look of the bottle so I ordered this. It was not fragrance free and stings my sensitive skin. The bottle I have been using looks the same with the vanilla container, green ribbon that reads 'daily moisturizing lotion', and fragrance free label. I will not be buying this one with the blue ribbon. I hope this helps you if you have sensitive skin like me and have been using the other Aveeno fragrance free lotion like me. I am attaching an image of the one I use that doesn't hurt my skin, and is truly fragrance free.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: Love it! For the streaky patchy folks... apply when still really wet, the second you turn off the shower, apply more than it says, and quickly all over until you honestly feel pretty slimy. Then, towel off and wash your hands with soap. Great, even color from the first use. Almost no scent whatsoever, but light and pleasant if you sniff your skin directly.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I used this product after 2 showers before giving up completely.  It‚Äôs so patchy.  Makes me look bruised instead of bronzed.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: You know, at first this worked out nicely. I used it in different increments to see if I could find a good pattern. One day I applied it so lightly that two days later I applied again, and basically looked as though I were a giraffe. It spotted strangely. I had also changed exfoliators during that time to one that left my skin feeling smoother and looking fresh and new. So I went back to my old exfoliator and my skin still looked spotted. I thought I was applying it too often/not enough/too thin/too thick, etc. I tried so many different ways. I guess at times it allows me to go outside without being ashamed of my pale, pale legs. One time, the following day I dripped some water on my leg from my water bottle as I was walking. The next time I was seated, I looked down and saw a streak running the length of my leg. It stayed for the next 5 days at least, though I showered/bathed daily. I don't apply it to my elbows, knees, ankles, or tops of my feet because it sticks WAY too well to those areas.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: Good, not great. Super convenient to use in the shower and on wet skin, I haven‚Äôt seen the color run on towels or sheets as they claim which is also good, however it‚Äôs very tough to get a smooth tan, I keep getting spots and it looks like ‚Äúrun off‚Äù like maybe I wasn‚Äôt dry enough? I‚Äôve used it twice now but don‚Äôt want to be too tan, I‚Äôm very fair, so will try again in a few days. Not as bad on upper body as lower body. Also pro- it really doesn‚Äôt smell bad at all!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: Be careful, even though it‚Äôs a gradual tanner, it still streaks!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I tried consecutive applications for about a 5-6 days in a row and didn't notice much coloration. I've very fair. Usually the lightest or second lightest foundation shade. I didn't want to go overboard so I only applied the recommended amount and patted myself dry (no rubbing). I waited about 30-40 minutes after my shower and would then go to bed. I'd postulate that it got rubbed off in the sheets, but there weren't any strange marks or indentations on my body so I guess this product just doesn't work on me. I won't buy it again, but I did like the light moisturize it provided.UPDATE: I gave this product another go and used more than the recommended amount. That gave me noticeable color within 3 uses. Since I'm quite fair, it was quite bold and bronze but not orange or jaundice. This applied really well to my upper body with no streak issues. It's horrible on my legs and I'm not talking about the knee or ankle area. Right down the center of my leg, it's incredibly streaky. I follow all the directions including exfoliating first and still got horrible result. I will try to even it out and see how it goes but I don't understand why it would apply well on the arms and not the legs.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I really tried what everyone else said, but I do believe that everyone‚Äôs skin react different to it. This is absolutely the most patchy thing ever. And if you ever run into something while your moisturizer haven‚Äôt dried, don‚Äôt bother, it will guarantee looking patchy.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I love the Jergens natural glow lotion. I've always had really nice even results so I decided to give this a try because I'm lazy and I figured this would be easy to maintain. BIG BIG BIG MISTAKE. I used it ONCE and I have blotchy streaky orange EVERYWHERE. I assumed this would be like the lotion in that it wouldn't be an instant tanner and gradually give me a glow. Well not even 24hrs later I have dark orange blotches on my legs. There are also streaks on my legs where it looks like droplets and marks from my fingers where I worked it in. I'm going to be spending the next few days trying to exfoliate this all off!!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I really like how once I‚Äôm through with my shower, before drying off, I just rub this all over my body, then get out of the shower and pay myself dry. There is absolutely no transfer to clothes or my towel, which is great. The color of this self-tanner is natural looking as well‚Äîdoesn‚Äôt leave you skin looking orange whatsoever. I recommend you exfoliate before applying this, (or any) self-tanner, especially your knees, ankles, and elbows. It goes on white, then develops during the rest of the day. It‚Äôs also incredibly moisturizing was well! The scent is actually quite nice as well. Make sure you wash your hands after application as well! Try this out! You won‚Äôt regret it!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I'm a fairer skinned woman and I'm really into being tan in the Spring/Summer. Even though I'm only 26 I still try to take care of myself when it comes to the sun, especially my face.I had been eyeing this stuff for a few months. Back in April I had gone tanning in a tanning bed a handful times at my gym. I had a wedding to go to in the beginning of May and being pale with a red dress & white heels is a no no. Every time I set foot into a tanning bed I always feel guilty because of the dangers of tanning beds. I only go a few times before the summer starts otherwise it isn't a usual habit of mine but the guilt is still there lol. I've always wanted to try a spray tan but I work in a swimming pool year round and I've always been nervous about the color bleeding out into the pool.Anyway, after I had attended the wedding I went to, I had stopped going tanning for about three or three and a half weeks. At this point I wasn't really that tan anymore, especially my skin being dried out from the water. I saw this stuff again at my local Walmart. I've been wanting to try it so I finally took the plunge. I have to say I've only used it twice, but I'm pleasantly surprised how well it works and how good it looks. I've tried a few self tanners in the past. I tried Hempz a few years back and it made me look super orange and streaky after three or four times. I tried another Jergen's lotion and it was so so. This is my holy grail! I live for moisturizers because of my dry skin due to the pool. I don't look orange, the color doesn't run in the pool, it doesn't transfer onto my clothes, it's not streaky or messy to apply, and there's no weird smell. It actually smells pretty decent. I love this stuff and the color not running is huge for me since most days I'm wet in a pool.The last time I had went tanning was three weeks ago which could possibly make this review a little biased, but I really notice a big difference when my tan from going tanning had faded.I'd definitely purchase this stuff again. I haven't tried putting it on my face. I'm not sure if you're supposed to, but for my body it's great so far! I'm actually going to try and use this more as opposed to laying out in the sun this summer.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: This lotion works well and fast. Gives a good natural, even color. I am a very pale girl, and I have a hard time tanning naturally because I always burn, and skin cancer runs in my family so this is a great alternative. It adds about 10 mins to my time in the bathroom, but I believe it is well worth it. I prefer to use it at night because it makes you feel wet and sticky for a little while after you apply it. However, I have been using it right before I sleep every night and it hasn‚Äôt transferred to my sheets at all. I would recommend this product and will be buying again. The first two pictures are before, and the last one is after only 4 days. I am very impressed.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I‚Äôm only giving this one star because, for the first two weeks, it worked great. It went on easily and I liked the way it felt after a shower. As time wore on, with continued use, it started to make spots all over. It‚Äôs like the lotion created layers and even with proper care, began to peel off in little splotches. This morning it looks so bad! It actually wouldn‚Äôt exfoliate with a loofah in the shower so I‚Äôm literally having to scrub it off with paper towels! :( üò¶

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I thought this would give the same subtle results as the Jergens glow that I put on dry skin. It was a mess, but I didn't realize how much of a mess until seeing my orange splotchy arms in the mirror the next day. Also, the washing of my hands throughout the day left my hands completely pale.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I've been using this since last summer and I love it! At first it was kinda streaky but now that I've got the hang of it, I really don't have any problems. I'll put it on right after my skin has been dried with a towel and I even get in bed right after and wake up with no splotchiness. I use it every other day. I'm pretty fair skinned, always burn in the sun, and this is as dark as I can get, which I'm fine with! This is a really good product for the price. I just need a good face tanner to match!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: It does streak, it does smell, and honestly it's a little wierd to stand wet in the shower putting lotion on without toweling off. Didn't like it.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: This stuff is awful. I'm really stunned by the reviews. I used it last night after a shower and did exactly as directed and woke up unnaturally tan and streaky. I look ridiculous and it doesn't just come off. There is no gradual natural look. Its apply and the next day you look uneven and orange. The picture doesn't even do it justice. Im going out with family for breakfast and will be completely covered so i don't have to explain why i look so ridiculous lol. Not some huge deal. Those is just life with self tanners. They don't work! And the smell is strong. Not good.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I‚Äôm pretty fair skin. I‚Äôm 31 and bought the medium tan and I honestly love it. It‚Äôs not a DRAMATIC and fake looking tan, it‚Äôs more natural with a glow which is what I wanted. It‚Äôs very easy to use and soooooo much cleaner than the lotion. Buying another :)

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I just received this product and on the second time I used it it fell on its lid and the lid came off spilling a copious amount of product onto the floor. The lid is not a screw-on type lid (it's only a half-twist on to tighten it) and I lost at least a couple of ounces in a not-so-generous container of 7.5 ounces.I called Amazon and they replaced it. No problem there... but the manufacturer should consider a pump bottle and giving us more ounces per bottle.I have used Jergens Natural Glow Daily Moisturizer products in their other formulas and I liked them. The color comes up well and stays on for several days without repeating the application with adequate moisture delivered.This version, while convenient to use in the shower, does not seem to add much color BUT the moisturization is great and lasts longer than the others. I'm hoping with continued use the color will build up better.There is NO color transfer to my bath towel when I blot dry my skin as promised on the instructions.UPDATE 6/30/17: I DID NOT FIND THAT THE COLOR DEVELOPS MUCH AT ALL. While do not use it every day, I had to use the other formula, Jergens Natural Glow Daily Moisturizer, Medium to Tan to get more color. I also did not experience lasting moisturization for more than one day. So, I will not be reordering this product.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: I normally do NOT post pictures with a review, but I had to this time to conteract all of the patchy, streaky photos. I bought this from Walgreens on a whim, then I came to see reviews on Amazon, and they nearly scared me from trying this product. The only person pictured without the streaks is the advice I followed and it worked perfectly. Do follow the directions on the bottle. I just exfoliated simply with a lufa. When I turned the shower off, I rubbed the water on my skin like I would lotion so the water would be more evenly distributed. I put on slightly more than the recommended amount until I felt a creamy texture on my skin instead of watery. I started above and below my knees and above and below my elbows before rubbing on those areas. I immediately patted dry with my towel. I rubbed over my feet, knees, elbows, and wrists with my towel. Then I used a little baby powder on those areas especially where tanner tends to over soak. I could tell a difference in color almost immediately and within an hour I was a few shades darker than my natural skin tone. I have zero streaks and patches. Nothing has rubbed off on towels or clothes. No spots have washed off my hands, yet, and I wash my hands a lot! I am thrilled with the results!

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow In-shower Moisturizer, Fair to Medium Skin Tone, 7.5 Ounce Wet Skin Lotion, Locks in Hydration with Gradual, Flawless Color
review: So I got this at target and figured I'd try it. I'm that gross kinda pale where you can see my veins and I'm going to Vegas in a month. I figured I'd see if I could get away with this.So it does give you a subtle glow, but you have to be really careful you dont sweat after application, which is hard to do after a shower (I get shower sweats sometimes). If you do you will get a streak like I have. You have to get an exfloiater brush as well to make sure it doesn't build up around knees, ankles, elbows, ect.It also does still smell. That self tanning smell that's a little like corn chips. It is slightly less than their other lotion, but it is still clearly there.So, IMO, this stuff works just like the other dry skin lotion, except it's a bit more of a hassle. It really depends on what you need out of a tanning lotion.If you want just a bit of color and a little less of a smell, with the added bonus of being an "in shower" lotion; this is for you.If you want a self tanner, but are too scared to try the ones with the gloves, just do their normal tanning lotion. It's a lot simpler, even if it smells just a bit stronger. I'll probably end up using that instead of this for Vegas, as I'll have sunscreen on anyway and that will cover the smell.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I found this product really improved both the look and feel of the skin on my thighs/calves. I have attached before and after pictures after going through one tub of the product over 1 month, December 5th through 06Jan. I'm in the midwest and humidity is very low. I haven't had success with exfoliating or other lotions, so I'm very happy with this product and will continue using it. The first four photos are before, and the latter 4 are after. Photos were taken with the same camera in the same room with the same lighting for science!Photos are right thigh, left thigh, left thigh, left calf - right thigh, left thigh, right calf, left calf.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: OMG. I had a serious psoriasis outbreak and I was beside myself with pain & itching.  I read that salicylic acid helps psoriasis. I searched on Amazon for different creams and purchased this while on travel.  The cream has a nice texture and it is not too greasy and does not stain. It did not burn or tingle after I applied it. Within 24 hours my psoriasis started to heal up & the itch subsided. I was shocked that all my red spots and plaques completely healed up within 48 hours. I will use this creme 4 for the rest of my life, I highly highly recommend trying this creme if you suffer from psoriasis. The results will astound you. And I have tried many creams including prescription creams that the mayo clinic prescribed for me. Unbelievable as it sounds this cream worked the best for me. Check out my before and after pictures. I just wish I had stock in this company or had an ownership interest because this cream is going to make them a fortune.  Also if you are a psoriasis sufferer no matter what cream you put on you, you must be careful not to scratch. Where ever you scratch you will spread the psoriasis. So wash your  hands  each time you apply cream  to a different area of your body. If you do not you will spread the psoriasis. I know because I‚Äôve had it now for year ( mine was brought on by Exemestane (Aromasin)  and I have studied psoriasis extensively. I am a nurse and I understand the importance of contact and spreading of skin diseases. I hope that my review will help psoriasis sufferers everywhere because until I discovered that salicylic acid can help  psoriasis and then discovered this cream that has the perfect formulation, I was miserable. I was crying in pain and worried that it would spread to my face. And it had started on my face but this  wonderful cream cleared it up.  I just can‚Äôt say enough good things about this cream.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I have been suffering from KP bumps and ingrown hairs for a really long time ( over a decade now). I have tried so many things to get rid of these bumps. A little background into my personal situation is that I have a milk chocolate skin tone and it is generally very silky smooth. My skins main issue beside the KP is that my skin is very sensitive and prone to dryness ( I have read that KP and ingrown hairs are common in those who have sensitive skin since KP is a overproduction of keritin to protect the skin [is the guess] but it is genetic and usually rarely goes away for most [ contrary to popular belief]). So I have had these bumps for so long and I have tried exfoliates and moisturizers but in vain. My problem areas are the backs of my arms especially around the elbows,the front of my thighs and the most severe place is the bottom half of my legs around the knee area. My main issue was to smooth the bumpy texture of these bumps. I always used shower puffs and Aveeno ( as my general daily moisturizer I still use it) and most recently Goldbond for Rough and Bumpy Skin. The Goldbond moisterizer was a 6/10 because it really aided the bumps on my thighs and the back of my arm but did nothing for my most severe location by my knees. After I waxed again ingrown hairs arrived on my thighs and the Goldbond did nothing so I decided to find a new solution.  I always used Cerave products but the price on this lotion really had me holding back from trying it but I finally did and I am so glad I did. I have been using to for only a month now but within the first few days there was a noticeable change and the bumps are all smoothed out. Unlike other moisturizers like the Goldbond it does not peel off and for a thick lotion it absorbs quickly into the skin. I use it every day, after I shower I just stand for about 5 minutes to make sure it fully absorbs and I thought I would never feel my silky smooth skin on my legs again but I finally did! I paired the Cerave with exfoliation for maximum results  used Earth Therapeutics Hydro Exfoliating glove as well and Gigi no bumps body scrub and both of them left my skin sooooo soft after showering but the Cerave just got rid of the rest of the bumps. I strongly recommend this for anyone suffering from KP and ingrown hairs! Especially if you have a bump issue. I am dark skin so the appearance of KP bumps discoloration is not to noticeable on my skin but I did notice a little fade in discoloration but not a whole lot so far after 2 weeks or so all my bumps smoothed and only time will tell if the discoloration will go away signifcantly. Overall a 10/10! 5 stars! I can't believe it works! I recommend it to anyone but remember to exfoliate as well for best results. Hope this long review helps someone.UPDATE 2/6/2017: ( The picture is from the beginning of 2017. After using the product for a few months after purchasing it in 2015, this was my results and they have been consistant since [throughout the rest of 2015-2016 and now 2017].) After using this product for about almost two years now it has worked very well! I regret not taking before shots because I assumed like all the other products I tried that it would not work or do anything, so there was no point! Ugh! I regret it! This product still works for me and I am happy my skin has not adjusted to it. My routine is the same,an exfoliating glove, dove soap, my GiGi scrub and Aveeno lotion that is fragrance free. I was about once a month because I generally am not harry and I exfoliate before and after my waxes and I use this to moisturize for about a week after my wax. I also use it randomly, especially when cold even if it has been weeks since I waxed. My bumps are still visible, but has lightened only slightly. I have darker skin so they do not show up anyways. Like I said before my texture and the feel of the bumps was my concern and still is. This product has left my skin soooo smooth I feel like I never had KP bumps! My final verdict is that this is perfect for smoothing those bumps, but if you are concern with discoloration this will help but you will need something extra. However, this is still great for those with dry, KP and ingrown hair prone skin. Hope I helped :)

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I‚Äôve been working to combat my T-zone acne for several of years now. This has been a game changer for me; As before my skin was inflamed (red and the pores left open and exposed to crap in the air) 24/7. And I‚Äôve gone through a lot of other brands to try to treat it! It‚Äôs been 1 week since I‚Äôve been using this: twice daily and using with the SA wash! I‚Äôm posting the ‚Äúbefore and after‚Äù photo so the photo can speak for itself! Again, this is only 7 days between photos, so it‚Äôs still in progress but I already love it! From my experience, the SA wash and cream causes a *very mild* ‚Äúburning‚Äù sensation or itch but I has to be patient. It wasn‚Äôt too bothersome and it became better over time for me. The results are paying off for me so I will continue using! There are no smell that I can pick up on this and it feels clean! The SA cream if you use after the wash is thick but I use it sparingly. Good luck to you guys. My skin was complicated and I hope it works for you guys like it did for me.OK UPDATE- I think it‚Äôs about 3 weeks now and as I‚Äôm using this (and my skin is continuing to clear up), and as I am starting to put a little dent into the jar... as I rub the cream into my face, I‚Äôm noticing sharp little shards of solid pieces!!! It almost looks like fiber glass. Not sure what it is and it does poke into my skin and I am wondering if that‚Äôs what I was feeling (mild burning, or even micro cuts... so the product can ‚Äúexfoliate‚Äù that I mentioned on my first review during 1st week of use). Ok I don‚Äôt mind exfoliating HOWEVER what if I accidentally get some of the dried shards I to my eyes? That stuff doesn‚Äôt dissolve at all or quickly. I‚Äôve been going alto us with my face moistened with shards sparkling on my face too. It‚Äôs noticeable when I‚Äôm in bright lighting. I don‚Äôt know if I like it anymore. :(

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I stumbled upon this product while I was trying to find something to help with the keratosis pilaris I had on my arms. I used this twice a day, once in the morning and once before bed, every day for two months. Pros: I instantly felt a difference with the moisture levels on my skin. I have constantly battled overly dry skin (in conjunction with keratosis pilaris) all my life and no other product has worked or lasts as long throughout the day as this. As a whole, the texture of my skin has shown significant and noticable improvement. I also really liked the smell. It isn't made with fragrance but the smell is nice and neutral, yet unique and pleasant. Cons: I was hoping this was going to help with the red dots on my skin. There is a slight difference in the amount/area of skin the dots span but I'm disappointed that the before and after of two months is not nearly as drastic or as noticable as I was hoping. I have also noticed that I have started to get tiny white heads on my arms. No big deal, but still not something I'm thrilled about. The two first pictures are before, the last two pictures are after I have been using this for two months. Would I buy this product again? Probably but only until I can find something else that takes care of the red dots. If you're looking for a moisturizer that WORKS buy this. If you are looking for a treatment for keratosis pilaris, save your money.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I have been using this for a month.  I wasn't super consistent with doing it twice a day but the results are amazing!  I've been diagnosed with psoriasis recently but my legs and arms have always felt bumpy.  I had no idea I could make my skin as smooth as it is now.  My arms and legs are silky even if I don't shave.  Those tiny bumps are gone and my skin affected by psoriasis is getting better.  So worth the buy!!!

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I‚Äôve recently started getting bumps on my upper arms. I‚Äôve tried regular lotions and they don‚Äôt help. I did a little research and heard about Cerave products and how they might do the trick. Well, I‚Äôve used this lotion every day, twice a day for almost a month and NOTHING! My arms still look horrible as you can see and I hate wearing tank tops or tshirts because I‚Äôm embarrassed. Don‚Äôt waste your money on this lotion, it doesn't help with keratosis pilaris.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: So I‚Äôve been struggling with KP for a long long long long long time and I‚Äôve honestly gave up trying all of these products to make it ‚Äúgo away‚Äù until last summer my arms became very rough and the bumps became much more pigmented. Yeah. I know. I should‚Äôve used sunscreen, but I didn‚Äôt. So I decided to give this a shot because the Internet said they highly recommend it. BOOOOOOOY, I‚Äôm shook. It didn‚Äôt happen over night, but after 3 months of consistently exfoliating every night and using this lotion twice a day, you can honestly see a significant difference. Peep the pictures. Especially with the texture of my skin. Now visually, it‚Äôs still there, but not as bad as before. I really recommend giving this a try. It works. Slowly, but surely. If you‚Äôre curious about the product it is a bit thick applying it on and a little sticky afterwards, but it eventually soaks into your skin and you can kind of feel it throughout the day on your skin, but don‚Äôt let that discourage your purchase. That‚Äôs just your skin letting you know it‚Äôs still moisturized and protected by this amazing lotion.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I have had problems with oily/dry, red and flaky skin since I was in middle school. This was only made worse by showering and traditional dermatologist prescription products. Over the years I have tried a plethora of expensive prescription strength dermatitis and psoriasis creams ointments etc etc. Any product that is standard fair I‚Äôve likely tried it from steroid cream to elidel and so on. I was frequently insecure about my skin throughout those years. The photo that doesn‚Äôt show my forehead is me in 2013. The next photo is me 2/7/20. The last photo is one I took 20 minutes ago 2/26/20. They speak for themselves. Very greatful.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I usually don't write reviews esp when so many are already there, but for this I had to. Being a thick cream, I applied it at night after bath on areas that are really bumpy,  feel not so smooth, dry, due to hair removal, and in general prone to bumps and acne like , white head type formation. The next morning, the skin is soft, moisturized and feels softer.  In just 1 night so I'm sure regular use shall improve the texture further more. Totally buying this again. Really impressed.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: . I bought it as a moisturizer for my arms and legs. I should have read the whole product review. It says not for use on large areas of skin. It also leaves a residue on your skin.

product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: It came in busted. Aside from that, it should be fine. I assume it wasn‚Äôt busted for long. I will come back if it doesn‚Äôt seem to take effect.

review: im not sure if this is authentic or not, picture that has the darker blue lid is the one that i got from walmart, the lighter one is from amazon plus the one that i ordered from has no inner lid, scared that it might be a return and someone had used it before. def returning this item

review: My teenage daughter and I both use this. I use this on my elbows, where I tend to get rough and bumpy skin. I also use it on certain places on my legs, where I get ingrown hairs from shaving. product_name: Cerave SA Cream | 19 oz | Renewing Salicylic Acid Body Cream for Rough & Bumpy Skin | Fragrance Free
review: Thick and creamy moisturizer that I am using on my dry feet. I like to run around barefoot in the summer and my feet can get dry and rough. This moisturizer has salicylic acid in it so it helps to exfoliate as well as moisturize. Really love this.

product_name: Alaffia - Everyday Shea Body Lotion, Normal to Very Dry Skin, Moisturizing Support for Hydrated, Soft, and Supple Skin with Shea Butter and Lemongrass, Fair Trade, Unscented, 32 Ounces
review: This product is INCREDIBLE. I love having unscented lotion on hand. I don't usually want to put anything fragranced on until I decide to wear perfume. It doesn't mess with the scent either. So I have been using raw unrefined shea for some time now. Making little recipes, using it for lip balm or alone on my body. And this lotion absolutely has shea in it. The consistency, the smell, it is legit. It smells like nothing, like it should. It has a hint of nutiness from the Shea. But I personally like that. It isn't greasy at all like raw Shea alone can be. The size for the price is incredible, I was paying $12 for half the size before of a different unscented product. This is it!! I had no issues with the pump or leaking. Don't let that ruin this for you bc even if you can just put it in a new bottle it is that good.

product_name: Alaffia - Everyday Shea Body Lotion, Normal to Very Dry Skin, Moisturizing Support for Hydrated, Soft, and Supple Skin with Shea Butter and Lemongrass, Fair Trade, Unscented, 32 Ounces

product_name: Alaffia - Everyday Shea Body Lotion, Normal to Very Dry Skin, Moisturizing Support for Hydrated, Soft, and Supple Skin with Shea Butter and Lemongrass, Fair Trade, Unscented, 32 Ounces
review: I have dry skin, and this product helps combat it. It is very difficult to find products that are truly unscented, but Alaffia achieved this! Many companies add essential oils to cover up the scent of products such as shea butter that has a naturally, light nutty scent to it, and I appreciate that Alaffia shies away from doing this. The lotion itself is thick and creamy, and a little goes a long way. My entire family, including my 5-year-old used this.

It was Dr. recommended for eczema and unfortunately her skin could not handle it and broke out into a horrible rash for days all over her body.  It was itching her and she just kept screaming it was really awful .  I would not use This cream, especially on children or babies!!

review: This is the best lotion I have ever used and that means a lot. It is soft and silky, does not leave heavy oily residule. It has a very fine scent not over powering at all. I wish that the scent was a little bit more, but its purpose is to soften the skin. I have very dry hands and this lotion takes the hardness away....instently and last for hours. I swim often and after showering at the gym I immediately put on this lotion.  I have ordered a bunch because I want to make sure I have enough and do not run out.This is the best ever.  I do not intend to use any other because I am so glad I have finally found the lotiin the does exactly as it is advertised. It feels like putting silky water on each time.

product_name: CeraVe Night Cream for Face | 1.7 Ounce | Skin Renewing Night Cream with Hyaluronic Acid & Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: I have been using this miracle pot since last year.Let's start off with the moisturizing quality of CeRave  Night Cream; the pictures I uploaded show me facing the front of my living room window with natural lighting. There is a little bit of "shine" on the sides of my forehead (where I tend to apply some highlighting makeup anyway), but to wake up to this kind of glow on my face first thing in the morning? You BET I took a selfie and sent it to any friend who cared! When I smiled, there is no resistance on my face, meaning my skin is WELL-moisturized! I mention this because for some of my other regular face cream (even when it isn't for night time) the moisture would be gone by morning. And that's another thing I wanted to mention to you all: THIS CREAM goes a long way even with a very small amount that you apply on your fingers-- all the better, too, because the formula works to keep your face moisturized and healing all through the night. And what I mean by "healing" is restoring the balance of the moisture on your face to a supple condition. Because CeRave night cream has Hyaluronic acid which gives it that precise effect since hyaluronic acid pulls in moisture from your environment.For sensitive skin, I have no true review for it because my skin is not sensitive. I have oily skin but tend to suffer from overdrying. For me this occurs because I like to wash my face in the morning as well as in the night time (which is regular for many people, especially those that wear makeup). For my skin type, I've found that CeRave works very well with it. I really appreciate their AM moisturizer with the SPF because it has no oil in it, so it goes on without the "greasy" feel.The reason why I'm giving this product  A 5-STAR rating for its scent is because THERE IS ABSOLUTELY NO SCENT! WHAT? YES, PLEASE! It is not always okay to rely on a moisturizer that is scented because it takes other formulas to be added into it, which may then irritate the skin. CeRave did a great job leaving this unscented, I love it. The only things I could wish for when it comes to this product is a bigger size, maybe, since this pot DOES feel a little small when holding it in your hand. But for the amount of benefits your skin will get from this, and like I said, a little goes a long way-- it can actually last a long time. For me it lasts a good 3-4 months.And you know what? If you use it regularly (if you have skin like mine), you'll start to notice that your skin is "happy". You'll notice by the way it is supple and has a subtle glow.

product_name: Cetaphil Fragrance Free Moisturizing Lotion, 16 Fluid Ounce
review: I have sensitive skin, thought this was a lotion for sensitive skin! I was also recommended this lotion for healing tattoos. biggest mistake ever. I had a healing tattoo on my forearm...thought I was having a reaction to the ink. Not likely, because I've been going to the same guy for years, he used the same ink for years. I am also covered in tattoos, my chest and my arms. The only difference was I used Cetaphil lotion instead of tattoo goo. It immediately gave me a rash, and felt like somebody threw lighter fluid on my arm and set it on fire. In the picture you can see the hives. I was between sessions for a cover-up / and waiting to get the color added. Thankfully, antihistamines and cortisone cream calmed it down (took 2 weeks to go away completely)Come to find out, Cetaphil has avocado oil in it! I'm allergic to avocados! Usually people who are allergic to avocados, have a birch pollen allergy (Myself). I advise people with sensitive skin to be careful, there are some ingredients and these supposedly hypoallergenic lotions that still cause reactions. Coconut oil, avocado oil shea butter all of those can be allergens.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 19 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I love this cleanser! It‚Äôs very rich feeling and doesn‚Äôt require a whole lot. It‚Äôs a huge size 19oz it‚Äôs a great value compared to what you would pay for a 1/4 of the size in store and it‚Äôs good for sensitive skin. Doesn‚Äôt leave an oily or greasy feeling behind

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 19 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I‚Äôve NEVER had sensitive skin. I‚Äôve once in a blue moon even turned red from a product. product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 19 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free
review: This large bottle is great for my whole family to use. This facial cleanser is fragrance-free and gentle enough for sensitive skin. It foams up really well when mixed with water. It cleans completely, even removing makeup. It rinses off cleanly, without overly drying out skin. My daughter has very oily skin, and this cleanser leaves her face feeling refreshed. My skin type is more combination, with dry spots. This cleanser is gentle enough for me to use too. It cleanses without stripping my skin of its natural oils.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 19 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free
review: The Good: This is a foaming cleanser that doesn't feel stripping to my skin. I love using this during the summer when my skin is oilier and it helps to control any breakouts before they get out of control. This bottle will last me for 6 months easy because I don't use it every day.The Bad: It's not a cleanser I would use on the daily during winter. I prefer to alternate it with the Cerave hydrating cleanser on the days when my skin feels like it needs a bit more gentle cleansing, which is most days.The Bottom Line: I love this cleanser and will continue to use it.  Whenever friends and family ask me for recommendations (because they know I'm a skincare junkie), I always point them towards the Cerave line, in particular the cleansers and moisturizers. They're just great, affordable skincare that do exactly what you need them to do and don't break the bank. Definitely recommend.

product_name: CeraVe Foaming Facial Cleanser | 19 Fl Oz | Daily Face Wash for Oily Skin | Fragrance Free
review: I have used CeraVe products like the lotion and cream when recommended by my dermatologist. I do have skin issues and therefore am prone to rashes or breakouts. I have typically used only herbal face washes over the last few years due to my mix texture and sensitive skin. However since CeraVe is so highly regarded by dermatologist I wanted to try it out because of an oily T-zone but dry around my cheeks and mouth area. So far the foam face wash is very good because it has a light feel and a gentle wash is all I need. There is no scent, however I do feel the the foam is doing a very good job of cleaning it without drying it out. Its only been a week since I started using it, but so far I've not had any rashes or breakouts. üëç
