product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: This is the holy grail. This is THE STUFF. I'm in my late 20's and I was diagnosed with "pre-rosacea" - a mild redness to my cheeks and jawline, but none of the other symptoms such as acne. My skin looked and felt chronically dry to the point of itching no matter what I used. My skin was like, perpetually chapped. I tried everything: dandruff shampoo (for the selenium), zinc/sulphur soap (anti-bacterial), sea buckthorn oil, primrose oil, hemp oil, maracuja oil (anti-inflammatory), and azelaic acid (finacea). Nothing worked and if anything they all just exacerbated the problem.Enter niacinamide aka B3 aka the miracle ingredient that not only has anti-aging properties but, as it turns out, the ability to "address skin discolorations". Yeeeeah, you can side-eye that description if you want, I too am tired of reading about how blahblah ingredient calms redness or is an anti-inflammatory (anti-inflammatory for me=run for the hills because you're about to get a big old dose of RED)  But no, niacinamide has bigger plans than that. It is a 'cell communicating' ingredient that basically tells your well-meaning but crappier skin cells "hey, wake up and behave like you care a little". You know how when you first wake up your skin is clear and beautiful and ohmygod I-am-having-the-best-skin day ever, til you actually stand up and start moving around and then BAM it's like you ran hot water on your face except it never goes away? This product actually somehow maintains that morning skin for me, all the time. Additionally the texture has improved and it finally feels hydrated. So yeah, I recommend this product.I plan on adding vit C to my routine soon (for anti-aging) which could go either way with my skin. I have high hopes. I'll update here for any other rosaceans who are determined to find an anti-aging solution!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: This broke me out so badly! Every morning I woke up with new whiteheads! How is this labeled ‚Äúnon pore clogging‚Äù when it obviously clogs pores to an extent where I started getting whiteheads? If you‚Äôre using this product and experiencing little whiteheads don‚Äôt ignore! It‚Äôs not your hormones! it‚Äôs this lotion!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I almost never review products but this one was so bad that I feel like I need to warn others. I do not have sensitive skin, I've never had this issue before. This lotion made my skin so dry (after only 2-3 uses my skin has been peeling so badly), it had aggravated my acne, and worst of all, it made my eyelids and undereye area swell insanely badly. Moreover, I have tried other products from this brand because it is pretty popular and supposed to be great for dry skin. None of their products have worked for me and usually make my skin dryer, but this is the first time that I've had such a terrible reaction to one of their products.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I want to preface with the fact that I don‚Äôt have sensitive skin nor have ever had an allergic reaction to any skin products I‚Äôve used, and wanted to try a moisturizer to help with my oily skin. I‚Äôve heard decent reviews on this one and wanted to try it, and I started using it about a week ago each night. The first day was good, but the second night my skin started to burn. I thought I was exfoliating too much and that‚Äôs why my skin was hurting, so I kept using the moisturizer for the next couple of nights. My skin is now peeling off and puffy under my eyes and around my nose, and it BURNS (kind of like a sunburn) whenever I put any kind of face products on it to try and re-moisturize my skin. It might be an allergic reaction, but going through the reviews, I see that a couple of people have had this same reaction to this product. It‚Äôs burned my skin, dried it out and completely puffed up and reddened my face (especially around my eyes). I do not recommend this one!! Especially if you have sensitive skin!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: I have been using this product for almost 2 years now. I just started using it with my dermatologist recommended the brand to me and I bought the a.m. and the p.m. to start myself off with. After a while I discovered the different face washes and the daily moisturizing lotion. After a while I transitioned to use the daily moisturizing lotion almost all the time instead of the a.m. and p.m. because I can find a cheaper sunscreen then the a.m. and the daily moisturizing works wonderfully with only putting the p.m. in a few Target area spots that I have trouble with.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: Immediately after applying Retin-A to my face I applied this night moisturizer.  Instantaneously I broke out in hives all around my neck line.To make sure this was not an aberration I reapplied this moisturizer without any Retin-A two nights later and the exact same thing happened.  See pictures attached.when I contacted Amazon customer service today about this egregious problem I had approximately an hour and a half of my time wasted, being circulated among three different supervisors who were of absolutely no help and asked me all sorts of repetitive, superfluous questions, culminating in one "team leader", a Dalton R, who instead of making this situation right hid behind Amazon's no return policy.when I specifically asked him what my options were besides being screwed over out of $13, he flat-out bluntly said that that was my only option.  This dude needs to be fired ASAP!do not use this product as it may not even be an OEM CeraVe product, as others have noted with its other line of products sold by Amazon such as the night cream.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: What has Cerave done?! I have probably used 100s of this product over MANY years. all of the sudden it smells like chemicals.... What gives?! All previous lots were fine but new lots (two different lot #s) I have received in October 2019 and November 2019 have the smell. I have noted ingredients changed (without warning) see attached picture. I havent yet evaluated what these ingredients are and whether the changes were positive (health/safety/benefits) or negative (i.e. cost savings) and I dont know which new ingredient might be the culprit for the smell or whether its not an ingredient issue but production issue. I have reached out to Cerave and all they offered me was a coupon which is a joke.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Packaging May Vary
review: The ABSOLUTE BEST moisturizer on the planet.  I found this thanks to Paula Begoun, cosmetic / skincare guru (CHECK HER OUT!) when I needed a moisturizer for my acne-prone yet dry, sensitive skin.  I also needed something I could purchase locally without spending an arm and a leg (I am NOT the dept. store / whole entire skincare line/ fancy product type).  It's not as cheap as some options but I'll tell you what, it's money VERY well spent.  This, along with clean and clear's foaming wash for sens. skin and a washcloth (don't underestimate it's power) comprises my entire skincare routine and I couldn't be happier.  I have hardly had a blemish since and I don't suffer from dryness like I used to.  Need I say more?I use it once a day, when I wash my face at night (either in the shower or at the sink) and it goes on super smooth and absorbs well.  Sometimes, esp. when the weather's really dry, I use it in the morning too (so go ahead and disregard that PM in the title - I think it's just because it doesn't have a sunscreen component).  I also appreciate that it works so well that my skin no longer feels 'tight' and painful after a shower pre-moisturizer - that to me is a sign it's working at a deeper level.  No stinging, no residue, just healthy skin.  Plus, while the best price is usually thru Subscribe and Save I like that if I'm ever in a pickle (ie -out of town) I can find it at a local drugstore and remain on a regimen that works so well for me.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream | 1.89 Ounce | Travel Size Face and Body Moisturizer for Dry Skin (Pack of 2)
review: I was SO happy to find this CeraVe Moisturizing Cream in purse-sized (1.89 fluid ounces each) tubes, as it is my very favorite moisturizing cream. It's great for dry skin and keeps working for a long time, keeping my hands soft and moisturized. It's the same amazing stuff I have at home that I buy in the 19-ounce plastic pump jars. This is a great moisturizer, especially for our winter months with the heater going all the time, drying our skin. With this three-pack, there is one for my husband's car, my car, AND my purse!

product_name: Lubriderm Men's 3-In-1 Unscented Lotion Enriched with Soothing Aloe for Body and Face, Non-Greasy Post Shave Moisturizer, Fragrance-Free, 16 fl. oz
review: I needed a good lotion that didn't irritate my skin, or leave it feeling oily & filmy.  Because, you see, there's a problem I have with a lot of the moisturizing products I've tried over the years.And it doesn't matter what area of my body is in need of moisturizing, if it irritates me in one area, chances are it does anywhere else as well.  (I've written a review for Zyrtec Allergy Medicine that elucidates on how well of a job Zyrtec keeps the allergy symptoms, under control.)The problem I had with a lot of the body lotion products I tried was they had scents & fragrances that made my symptoms flare up, and this lotion is singularly, without scent, fragrance, or odor.  And I wear cologne, which doesn't bother my allergies whatsoever, so go figure.I'd strongly recommend this lotion if you have the same issues I have with strong fragrances bothering you and setting off your allergies.  It's a good value for what the price is, and I'd definitely say it's worth every penny.

product_name: Lubriderm Men's 3-In-1 Unscented Lotion Enriched with Soothing Aloe for Body and Face, Non-Greasy Post Shave Moisturizer, Fragrance-Free, 16 fl. oz

review: This NOVA LUCIA HAWAIIAN ALOE VERA FACE MOISTURIZER (Night Cream, Sunburn Relief, Dry Skin & Wrinkle Hydration; Pure Aloe Vera Juice; 8 oz.) is a fragrance-free, thick lotion that goes on transparently and is invisible after application.  Although the cream makes my skin feel slightly greasy to the touch, I don‚Äôt notice it at all unless I touch my skin.The lotion made my slightly sunburned face feel better, and it made my dry hands feel smoother.  It does NOT irritate my sensitive skin.  In short, I like this product! product_name: Hawaiian Aloe Vera Face Moisturizer Night Cream Sunburn Relief Face Cream Eczema Cream Lotion For Dry Skin & Wrinkle Cream For Women Compare With Aloe Vera Gel 100 Percent Pure Aloe Vera Juice 8 oz
review: Great for my dry skin.

product_name: Hawaiian Aloe Vera Face Moisturizer Night Cream Sunburn Relief Face Cream Eczema Cream Lotion For Dry Skin & Wrinkle Cream For Women Compare With Aloe Vera Gel 100 Percent Pure Aloe Vera Juice 8 oz
review: ¬†When it comes to skincare, I am huge on the quality and types of ingredients. The first ingredient listed is normally the bulk of what it has in it. The last ingredient having the smallest trace. The first ingredient in this is aloe and all the ingredients that follow (like sunflower seed oil, cocoa & shea butters, macadamia nut oil, avocado oil, coconut oil, and of course aloe just to name a few) are natural and good for you. Upon applying this, I did not notice a fragrant smell at all. If anything, it was a bit more of a slight earthy (like a really light cocoa) smell but it went away almost immediately after application. I loved that once it was applied, it literally didn‚Äôt smell like anything. I was able to spray my favorite perfume after without having to worry about the smells not mixing well together.Back to the application, a little bit went a really long way and spread across my skin with absolute ease. I work in the healthcare industry and am constantly washing my hands (they are in constant need of moisture). It left my skin feeling quenched and super soft to the touch without that greasy feeling I have gotten from other balms. This also seamed to have placed a moisture barrier as even after washing my hands after application, my hands still felt very hydrated. I appreciate that they included additional information in its packaging showing what other products they have to offer as this is the first time I have ever heard of and used anything from this brand. They are a very (everything) friendly brand with great ingredients and I honestly can not think of one negative.I definitely recommend giving this a try for yourself. I will be purchasing more of this when it runs out.

review: After working out my pores would always be clogged and I‚Äôd get these annoying little pimples.  This lotion cleared them up within days!!! It smells great too and has a cooling feeling which is even better after a good workout!!! Seriously try this stuff

product_name: TreeActiv Acne Eliminating Body Lotion 8 fl oz, Clears Body, Back, Butt and Shoulder Acne, Anti-Acne Moisturizer, Prevents Future Breakouts, Green Tea and Honey Scent
review: This is an amazing product. The lotion makes my skin smooth and has a wonderful smell too.

product_name: TreeActiv Acne Eliminating Body Lotion 8 fl oz, Clears Body, Back, Butt and Shoulder Acne, Anti-Acne Moisturizer, Prevents Future Breakouts, Green Tea and Honey Scent
review: This is kind of stupid, but- as soon as I unwrapped it from its packaging the whole pump fell apart. I can‚Äôt even put it back together, and the pump is basically completely useless. For $30 you would think a product wouldn‚Äôt fall apart. It has menthol in it (which I don‚Äôt mind) so beware buyers that don‚Äôt like menthol. It‚Äôs somewhat cooling on the skin.

product_name: TreeActiv Acne Eliminating Body Lotion 8 fl oz, Clears Body, Back, Butt and Shoulder Acne, Anti-Acne Moisturizer, Prevents Future Breakouts, Green Tea and Honey Scent

product_name: TreeActiv Acne Eliminating Body Lotion 8 fl oz, Clears Body, Back, Butt and Shoulder Acne, Anti-Acne Moisturizer, Prevents Future Breakouts, Green Tea and Honey Scent
review: "I like how you guys put real ingredients in this lotion. I can recognize things and know what I'm putting on my body. I feel like it is actually working.  I will give it 5 stars! But still will need to see the results with time."

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I absolutely love this product! I have combination skin and wanted a lightweight moisturizer to use in the mornings after washing my face. I live in Louisiana in an extremely humid environment and during the summer months, you can literally sweat all 24 hours of the day. Most moisturizers would leave me feeling sticky and like I was smothering my pores. This Aveeno has worked perfectly. It goes on smooth and leaves my skin feeling soft and moisturized without feeling wet or sticky. The smell is also absolutely amazing, especially for the morning. It is a clean fresh scent that adds a nice pep to my morning routine! I will definitely continue to purchase this product!

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I always use this as my face lotion for years. I am mid 30s with dry skin.  I bought it on Amazon because it was way cheaper then at CVS.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: This bottle came fat and full of my favorite facial moisturizer EVER. It reduces redness and breakouts, feels soft, and moisturized my skin without any oiliness. I recommend this lotion to everyone, even if you don't have breakouts, it'll even out your skin like a miracle moisturizer from heaven.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: This is not original product.. the front of the bottle  is different than advertised ..

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: It never leaves my skin dry or irritated. I was once given this product by a friend and after that it feels amazing. Especially after using any mask it makes my face feels so soft and smooth!!!

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz

I'd recommend consulting a dermatologist and determining what kind of skin you have before purchasing any lotions. I've attached a couple of photos of the item size.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz

review: Have been using this for a while now and have had very little acne and well-moistened skin with no reactions. Its my go-to after showering and I even started using it on my latest tattoo after my A&D ointment was out and it seems to be fine for that purpose as a non-scented and general purpose moisturizer.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: It's a soothing moisturizer that helps fight light breakouts. Not the strongest for serious acne conditions.

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I have been using this aveeno for a while, I won't change it for anything. It has been working well for me.Now that I can get it on Amazon-next day deliver, I'm in heaven!UPDATE....Now! March 2019 did not like the way my item was packaged, I hope it was tampered with

product_name: Aveeno Clear Complexion Salicylic Acid Acne-Fighting Daily Face Moisturizer with Total Soy Complex, For Breakout-Prone Skin, Oil-Free and Hypoallergenic, 4 fl. oz
review: I have been using this stuff for 5 years and I promise that you can't go wrong with AVEENO products. I SWEAR BY THEM! I use this twice a day along with the lifting and firming cream and it keeps me looking amazing I'm 35 and I honestly do not look it. I LOVE THIS STUFF! If you wash your face with Koirajic Acid (think I'm spelling it right) but it's the skin brightening/whitening bar (an orange color bar) ANYWAYS, if you wash your face twice a day and rub the Aveeno Lifting and Firming Cream over your face and then for a finishing touch rub the Aveeno Clear Complexion Daily Moisturizer; you will be great! My mom uses this stuff every eight weeks to keep her skin refreshed and it works AMAZINGLY! We have eczema and psoriasis, so the best thing is this stuff doesn't break out our skin at all and it also has a little sunscreen skin protectant in the product so It creates a flawless touch to SMOOTH HEALTHY AGELESS SKIN! Feel free to try these products and I promise you won't regret it!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
review: GREAT product, very impressed with how it just helped my skin to go from dry to soft. Don't need a lot and the scent smells lite and clean. I do trust SOLiMO products and I just added another one, Mahalo (thanks) from Honolulu Hawaii- where your skin can go dry!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
review: One of the pumps came broken

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
review: I like the the lotion feels on my hands. But when I took the tape off the top of the lotion the top came off. I cant dispense the lotion without the top on I cant get the lotion to pump out.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
review: Goes on wet (not greasy), and takes a while to absorb (15-20secs).Works okay as a lotion for dry skin. Not as good as the Avenno or Lubriderm brand in my opinion.And this baby-powder-like fragrance to it. Sort of pronounced when applying, goes away after 30secs or so once it gets full absorbed in your skin.I like how there's a sticker on the cap. Prevents spills during transit to youExpiration date up top. Plain simple design on bottle.  Affordable price for quantity you're getting

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
review: The things I take into account when ordering lotion online are the price, the smell, how moisturizing it is, how thick, how greasy it is, and how quickly it absorbs into the skin.This lotion is very affordable, the price feels fair and 16 oz will take me a little while to go through. The smell is faint, but it smells like something my grandmother would use, it does go away after a few minutes though. I would consider this lotion to be very thin and not super moisturizing, as a daily use lotion for summertime when my skin isn't losing that much moisture, I would continue to use this, but I wouldn't recommend this if you have dry skin. Finally, this product isn't super greasy which is nice, and it absorbed in a reasonable amount of time.Overall, I wouldn't recommend this if you're looking for a product for severely dry skin but I would recommend this product as a good alternative to several name-brand lotions as a lightweight lotion for daily use.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
review: Great for in between hand washes but not much else. After an hour, you're feeling dry again. With mineral oil as the second ingredient (behind water-which means it's the most  abundant ingredient besides water) anyone with super dry skin will generally have issues staying moisturized. Mineral oil has to tendency to draw moisture from the deeper layers of your skin and hold it in the surface layers. Makes your skin feel wonderful for a short time until the surface starts drying out. Then you need to reapply. Great for the manufacturers as they sell more since your using more. My advice is to find a lotion with higher quality ingredients. This doesn't have them.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion with Vitamins B5 & E, 16 Fluid Ounce (Pack of 4)
review: Solimo Extra-Dry Skin Lotion arrived broken: the top of the pump is completely broken off and unusable.The lotion itself is very good: it's not thick or gloopy, goes on smoothly and leaves a silky feel and a subtle floral fragrance, neither of which is unpleasant. It does not feel greasy or sticky, and absorbs relatively quickly. I noticed improvement in my dry skin in just two uses.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: For 6 bucks this is ridiculously small. However, I really enjoy the Hempz lotion, and wanted a travel size version for my purse. I figured this would be a good investment since I can just refill it with my larger bottle.Awesome formula, and I am in LOVE with this grapefruit raspberry scent.And no, I did not intentionally match my nail color to the bottle for this review.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract

It fits perfectly in my crossbody purse. This lotion is a saving grace for dry hands, I promise! This keeps my hands soft as a baby‚Äôs bottom! The scent is fragrant, but it is not too strong. It‚Äôs a sweet smell.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Packaged nicely. Smells great!

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: This is the first time I've tried this brand and I'm hooked. I'm going to age myself and say that the scent reminded me of the Strawberry Shortcake dolls I played with as a child. I used to just sit and smell those for hours, and when I opened the bottle I just wanted to sit and smell it the same way. I made all the members of my family smell it, too. My daughter loves the smell just as much as I do. Another thing I think is great about this lotion is the fact that it absorbs into my skin quickly and doesn't leave my skin feeling oily. I have more oily skin to begin with, and with most lotions I have to wipe it off because it doesn't absorb completely. This lotion has a creamy texture that isn't oily and it leaves my skin feeling smooth and smelling great all day.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I received this product today with a broken lid... i can‚Äôt figure out how to get ahold of the seller to get a replacement

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I was skeptical about buying this lotion because of the negative reviews I read. I am so happy I did, the size is decent and honestly perfect for traveling which I do every single day. There's nothing more annoying than lugging around a 12 oz lotion with you in your purse. Aside of the good size for traveling, the scent is so refreshing. In my opinion it's more of a grapefruit than it is raspberry but it's so delicious. If you enjoy the scent sweet pea from Bath and Body Works, you'll definitely like this scent. Now to review the actual product, it is extremely moisturizing and I am a die hard lotion fanatic. I am using lotion after every single time I was my hands. My hands naturally get pretty dry especially after I do my hair every morning and expose my skin to different hair products. Even using a dime size amount was enough to fully moisturize my hands. This lotion itself is very soothing for my skin and this little bottle will definitely last me considering what little amount you need. I always saw the bigger bottles at Ulta and never purchased them because of the price and I was never able to try this brand until now. I now understand the price, its quality lotion and with such an amazing refreshing scent. Not for nothing, I received the product 2 days after I ordered it and I could not be happier!!

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Ok first off I love Hempz lotions in general. Pretty much everyone I've own was great. I was skeptical at trying this scent since I had no idea if it would be overpowering or just right.Best I can say is it has this fresh baby powder mixed with raspberries scent. You get a very mild hint of the grapefruitEither way this lotion smells yummy and if your a fruity person you'll  like this scentIt's not overpowering and just like all the other Hempz lotions just a different scentOnly thing I wish is that Hempz would make there pumps get every bit of the lotion out of the bottle

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Why I love the hempz lotion so much! These are my sons knees. The first pic I took on the 9th... the second pic I took tonight(5/13)! They are already starting to look better! Y'all I have taken this boy to the doctor and gotten medicated ointment and stuff to put on his knees and it didnt help. The lotion helped my elbows so much I told my son to start using it!  So far it is helping and I hope it clears it up completely!

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I have used hempz lotions for years, though not this ‚Äúflavor‚Äù. The smell is wonderful. Didn‚Äôt feel as moisturizing as other formulas though I did however try everything I could think of to get this off my skin.I immediately experienced burning and stinging on application. No amount of hand or dish soap or aloe took the intense burn away.Two days later after the first and only application, I have what look and feel like chemical burns on my hands.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: It arrived early! I ordered it just yesterday!  But anyway this lotion smells very good it‚Äôs super moisturizing I got it for my dry skin I get during the summer. Fantastic. Only problem is the liquid exploded a bit out of the bottle.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Absolutely loveeee Hempz products. Their lip balm is amazing and recently I‚Äôve been purchasing their moisturizers and this one is by far my favorite scent ever. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, all the others smell delicious but this one is my number 1!!! Definitely going to repurchase

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I think this is the best smelling lotion I've ever had, honestly. I can't get enough of it! Very glad I went for the 17oz size instead of the travel size. It helps that my boyfriend loves the Grapefruit & Raspberry scent, too!

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Okay, so I'm slightly a strange person. I buy my lotions and things to match different rooms decor. So, I had originally bought pomegranate for my bedroom and didn't like the smell so much. This raspberry one however, is AMAZING. Didn't think I'd be able to top my beloved vanilla plum (it matches my purple bathroom Lol) but I might actually like this one a little more than that one!

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: I've never tried Hempz before or anything of similar hemp ingredients. I was offered Hempz 17oz bottle of "Sweet Raspberry Punch & Champagne Limited Edition" and thought I might give it a try.Nice bottle, easy open, easy pump no issues there (type 1 plastic recycle if you care about that AND made in the USA, also of note). First thing you're going to notice is the scent. If you like your lotion to definitely have  a fragrance this will please you (as long as you pick a fragrance you like). I tend to be more sensitive to floral scents and I suppose this being berry and whatever champagne is supposed to smell like it didn't bother my sensitivity but it will smack you in the nose with scent. I would not recommend wearing this with other fragrances. I count this particular feature as a good thing because I'd think someone buying lotion partly for the scent wants to smell it. This particular fragrance is heavy on the fruity smell and more of a candied raspberry as opposed to anything sharp.In applying it to the skin it is light, not greasy feeling but does feel like there is a moisture "barrier" as they might call it after it is all rubbed in (doesn't hold up too well to hand washing but it's not a hand cream so I give that a pass). Since it is classified as a body moisturizer per the bottle I wouldn't expect it to be heavy and it rubs in fairly quickly. I would not call this a heavy duty lotion and if you need something that's going to be for dry skin I might not start here myself, but I think it would be perfect for anyone with normal skin and you will also smell nice.The height of the fragrance lasts quite a while (for me it was at least an hour), and even after it fades if you were put your arm up to your nose or even walk past someone who hasn't smelled it yet, it will still be noticed. I haven't come across a lotion in my lifetime that will have a scent that will last all day and frankly that's ok with me as long as the fragrance doesn't go stale, and this one didn't. My only warning for you would be if you work in an environment that discourages heavy scents this is NOT the lotion to buy. I think it's a good product, and will be best for people who want a well fragranced, non greasy, not heavy body lotion.

product_name: Hempz Blushing Grapefruit & Raspberry Creme Herbal Body Moisturizer Lotion - Fruit Body Cream - Pure Hempseed Oil, Shea Butter, Ginseng, Natural Extracts, Vitamins A, C, and D, Cucumber Extract
review: Really great stuff! Thick and lush and moisturizing. I adore the scent of this lotion and wish you could smell it through the photo! It‚Äôs a super unique scent and even my husband commented on it. It‚Äôs a huge bottle of lotion and will last a long time due to how thick the product is. The dispenser works perfectly and it arrived well packaged and protected with no leaking. Great value for the price. Hempz always makes quality products with great ingredients. Can‚Äôt recommend enough!

product_name: Lubriderm Daily Moisture Body Lotion with Shea + Enriching Cocoa Butter For Dry Skin, Clean, Non-Greasy and Dermatologist Developed brand, 16 fl. Oz
review: I like the lotion but they send it with a broken top

product_name: Lubriderm Daily Moisture Body Lotion with Shea + Enriching Cocoa Butter For Dry Skin, Clean, Non-Greasy and Dermatologist Developed brand, 16 fl. Oz
review: Been using¬†Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Lotion For Dry Skin, 18 Fl. Oz¬†daily for a while now, and this lotion is better in terms of results as it leaves my hands way softer than any other lotions I've used before. The only thing to keep in mind is that the application may be a bit off putting as it goes on wet (but not greasy), and it takes a minute or so for the lotion to soak into your skin. After that, your skin will feel silky soft to the touch and non-stickyThe Cocoa Butter fragrance is pronounced compared to Avenno where it's very neutralIt lotion does work for the entire day as long as you don't deep clean/wash your hands with soap and water, or take a bath/showerOverall, if you don't mind your hands getting wet and waiting a minute for it to dry, it will provide amazing results

product_name: Lubriderm Daily Moisture Body Lotion with Shea + Enriching Cocoa Butter For Dry Skin, Clean, Non-Greasy and Dermatologist Developed brand, 16 fl. Oz
Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion with Soothing Oat and Rich Emollients to Nourish Dry Skin, Gentle & Fragrance-Free Lotion is Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 18 fl. oz
review: When I got this, top pushing part was separated from body.Smell is not that I expected.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: Its a lightweightgel like texture. Its not greasy or sticky. My skin loves it. I have combination skin. Its perfect in the warmer months. I need something a little bit thicker on winter months.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: I‚Äôve been looking for a daily moisturizer to wear under makeup in lieu of my 7 Daily Effects go-to. I wanted something lighter feeling that absorbed a bit better than Olay. This gel-like moisturizer definitely was lighter and absorbed well; however, I felt a little tighter around the eyes‚Äô fine lines. In fact, my fine lines in the outer corners seem more like crevasses. Maybe my skin is going through withdrawals from Olay, but I‚Äôm going to keep using this gel for a couple of weeks to give it a fair chance. I haven‚Äôt been spending any time in the sun, so I only gave three stars. . . pending further review. I do love the cooling feeling I get when first applying it in the mornings.Stay tuned....

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: **** Beware you may have an allergic reaction****I just wanna say I don't understand the good reviews on this. I have used every single moisturizer under the sun. I dont really have "sensitive skin" either. All the ones that come in Ipsy bags and tons from drug stores. Even the cheap dollar tree moisturizer and NOT A ONE has ever made my face turn into a tomatoe. And my eyelids swell. It was awful. Skip this product at all costs!!!! It clearly did not moisturize.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: I have been looking for this for awhile after getting a smaller version from a family member. I use this twice a day.  I love the way it feels very refreshing. I've had this product now for about 2-3weeks and my face feels way better. I will definitely buy more when i finish this one.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: It‚Äôs a tiny container but a little bit goes a long way. I have combination dry skin, so I have to add a little extra on the dry areas but it works well all around.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: I liked it. There wasn‚Äôt much scent in it, which I enjoyed. And the gel itself seemed to melt down on my skin, and smooth out any dryness that I had. It didn‚Äôt leave my face feeling sticky which I kinda expected from a gel, so that‚Äôs a plus as well.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: I‚Äôve tried dozens of facial moisturizers and this is my favorite. Cool and non greasy. Seems to create a glow

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: It is a really light weight cream, very refreshing and smells good. I use it on nights. Recommend it!

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: Lo que pedi

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: I love this stuff! It helps with my face so much.  I pair it with tea tree oil treatment for the flaky parts of my skin. I purchased them bith at walgreens and couldnt be more happier. My face feels so soft and supple. I used to love makeup and when my skin got so bad,  it started showing through my makeup.  I wore none, but now my face is great and im not ashamed of my natural skin and my makeuo applies flawlessly .  i recommend using this after you wash your face , before makeup,  after showers,  and before bed.  Amazing.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: I have combo skin and this is hands down the WORST product I have ever put on my face.  It felt great when I put it on.  It felt nice and light.  I put it on in the evening before bed, and when I woke up, my ENTIRE forehead was covered in blemishes.  I used about a half of a pea sized amount.  For someone that RARELY gets a single blemish at all, I am absolutely mortified.  So now, here I am trying to clear them up.  I am a makeup artist, so having clients see my face this way is not good.  Had to give it a star, because it wont let me give zero stars.  Absolutely horrible.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: Makes my face smooth and cool. Seem to be working well. Item came on time and in the package advertised.

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: I have used the product before and really like it, but it definitely looks like someone else already tried to open it

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: It's been about a year and a half since I buckled down on skin care. I'm a 41 female, and grew up in the time when washing your face with noxema or using ponds to clean your face instead of bar soap was considered, "skin care," at the time. Shortly followed by olay for sunscreen and moisturizer.No dig on those who use olay still. But the regiment was a bit lacking.Last year I jumped at a change at another brand's skin care set that was on sale. The cleanser and exfoliate was great. The night time moisturizer cream was great. The day time moisturizer...aeeeeeaaa. Well, it left my face sticky AND greasy and was too heavy for me. I ended up becoming a cat-hair magnet anytime I used it after washing my face. Yuck!I was looking to try something new, since I stopped using the daily and started using the "nightly," both morning and night after cleansing. Saw this had a lot of decent reviews, and I finally had some extra cash. It also says it's for normal to combo skin and I do have combo (oily nose and brow, dry cheeks.)This moisturizer arrived in perfect condition. The safety seal on the outside as well as the inside was unbroken and whole.PROS:- Being a prime member meant that I ordered it 3 days ago and it arrived yesterday.- It IS very light and yet SUPER moisturizing without being greasy. I washed my face and tried this last night after getting it and my skin absorbed it quick, my face felt moisturized, not dry, my T zone didn't feel remotely oily or greasy. Bonus points: not a single cat hair stuck to my face.- Very, very very light and cooling/refreshing. It looks and reminds me of aloe vera lotion. Using it on my face gave it a cooler sensation but without that tingly/harshness of anything other natural evaporation (like, you know how some stuff has mint or tea tree oil and it gives that tingly cooling sensation? Not this!)- A little goes a long way! I took my index finger and lightly touched the gel. I dabbed my finger on forehead, nose, both cheeks, chin and neck then rubbed it in and it was the perfect amount to cover ALL those areas. With my night-time cream I had been using, I would have to dip both fingers before dotting, and sometimes go back a third time because of drier cheeks.- Light, very light scent. The scent is refreshing and very 'natural'/'nature' smelling. If strong scents trigger migraines or nausea or strong scents cause issues for you, this may not do so. However, I am NOT allergic or triggered by perfumes and added scents, so take that bit of advice with caution for you very sensitive skin/scent people out there.- Price!! It is actually a few bucks cheaper than my other basement bargain beauty brand (e.l.f.) and as someone who's in debt up to her eyeballs and previously retail part-time employed and recovering, finding a beauty product that is affordable without making my face explode is VERY important. This cream fits those needs perfectly.CONS:- The only con I have is howwww smallllll this container is. If it weren't for the fact that I have used it twice so far and I KNOW that only a tiny bit goes a long way, I would have been a bit disappointed by how small it is.That's the only down side to this moisture cream so far to me, the size.I am only the second day in using it, so if during the week things change and my skin reacts unexpectedly, I will definitely come back to edit and update. So far? HIGHLY RECOMMEND this!

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: I‚Äôm obsessed with this product. My skin is extremely sensitive so I usually only put on organic coconut oil, for fear of breaking out. However we have well water which is extremely harsh on my skin. So the coconut oil couldn‚Äôt keep up with my dry skin. I decided to try this product and I‚Äôm never going back. I no longer use coconut oil on my face, only this product. My skin has gotten so nice, soft and flawless I no longer wear foundation. I put this on twice a day, morning and night. It smells great and a little goes a long way. I‚Äôm still on my first bottle and I‚Äôve had this product for almost 3 months now. I highly recommend this product

product_name: Garnier SkinActive Moisture Rescue Face Moisturizer, Normal/Combo,  1.7 oz.
review: The smell is good , feels fresh and smooth on skin but the quantity is not as expected. This is my first time using gel based moisturizer I used and still use olay and just to show the quantity check the pictures and they both got delivered same day.

product_name: AHAVA Essential Day Moisturizer, Normal to Dry Skin, 1.7 Fl Oz
review: El producto me lleg√≥ "reventado" , en malas condiciones , ya que todo el borde de la tapa y su interior estaban llenos de crema que sal√≠a del interior. No logre encontrar la fecha de vencimiento, pero creo que la crema lleg√≥ vencida porque tiene una textura semi granulada y porosa, muy diferente a las otras cremas Ahava que he comprado anteriormente. Realmente una decepci√≥n ya que siendo de esta marca y de este valor, esto no deber√≠a pasar.

product_name: AHAVA Essential Day Moisturizer, Normal to Dry Skin, 1.7 Fl Oz
review: There are two big flaws with this product! I was so excited to use this that I immediately ripped it open as soon as I washed my face. After the stench of pure baby oil hit me and the stinging stopped, I examined the package to find that this, in fact, didn't have the "against animal testing" anywhere on the packaging or container. I'm sending it back immediately.

product_name: CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream for Dry Cracked Hands | 3 Ounce | With Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: I purchased this after reading reviews about its quick absorption. I struggle to keep my hands moisturized because I write and draw a lot and the greasy feeling of most hand creams makes it difficult to hold a pen and other things after application. I have used other Cerave products and I know they are a reputable skin care brand, so I had high expectations. I can confidently say that this product is wonderful. The consistency was unexpected‚Äîless of a cream, more of a gel/lotion that spreads easily. It does have the typical greasy feeling immediately after applying, but within 5 minutes the feeling I get from other hand creams was completely gone and my hands were super soft. It is also unscented which is great for me in terms of using at work in an office space. I will be purchasing again‚Äîthis is my new favorite hand cream!

product_name: CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream for Dry Cracked Hands | 3 Ounce | With Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: They changed their formula for Therapeutic Hand Cream and it‚Äôs very drying now. I‚Äôve used this particular lotion for about three years now and was really happy with it.  I hope they change back; the old version wasn‚Äôt that greasy anyway and was much more moisturizing.

product_name: CeraVe Therapeutic Hand Cream for Dry Cracked Hands | 3 Ounce | With Hyaluronic Acid and Niacinamide | Packaging May Vary
review: Overall solid hand moisturizer for the price and no terrible smell.

product_name: Vaseline Men Healing Moisture Body Lotion For Dry Skin Fast Absorbing Absorbs in Just 15 Skin For Moisturized Skin 20.3 oz 3 count
review: Their product is fine, but Vaseline touts a ‚Äúsmart pump‚Äù that is one of the dumbest industrial designs I‚Äôve seen. The pump is shaped like a ‚ÄúT‚Äù, so it‚Äôs very easy to mistake which side the dispenser is on. So you hold your hand out, push down...and moisturizer squirts out the opposite direction.

product_name: Vaseline Men Healing Moisture Body Lotion For Dry Skin Fast Absorbing Absorbs in Just 15 Skin For Moisturized Skin 20.3 oz 3 count
review: Originally bought this lotion because it smelled really good. The smell lasts a solid 4-6 hrs depending on what your getting into. I happen to have dry skin and this lotion works really well. The fast drying non greasy qualities are great. The bottle is huge for the price and lasts me 2-3 months. I've bought this one about 6-7 times in a row now, Its def my go to. Would highly recommend. I'm glad I found this lotion.

product_name: Vaseline Men Healing Moisture Body Lotion For Dry Skin Fast Absorbing Absorbs in Just 15 Skin For Moisturized Skin 20.3 oz 3 count
review: Love the Vaseline brand of lotions. This one has a great scent, that my wife really loves. Feels great on my skin and it's not very oily.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow Wet Skin Moisturizer + Firming Medium to Tan ,  7.5 Oz
review: Wouldn‚Äôt buy again. Leaves really bad streaks on legs and arms. Even if you let it dry before getting dressed. Plus it has a hint of that self tanning smell.

product_name: Jergens Natural Glow Wet Skin Moisturizer + Firming Medium to Tan ,  7.5 Oz
review: The lotion was opened and leaked most of the lotion out into its packaging. I‚Äôm sure it‚Äôs a great product but having more than half the lotion wasted makes it not worth the purchase.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: They made what used to be a AMAZING product now not so GREAT by changing the Ingredient formulation!!!? They removed some ingredients In the older formula that made this lotion my go to and worked well with my acne prone skin. Instead of feeling soothing when applying it, I now get a burning sensation on my face especially around the eyes!!(warning)..I don't understand their decision for this formula change!? The old one had such high reviews. Not this new version though. I'm very dissatisfied!... I'm editing my previous comment about them removing the hyaluronic acid. What they went and did is change the form of hyaluronic acid from what they used before. The new formula includes SODIUM HYALURONIC which is a smaller molecule form. I increased my rating to 3 stars because the fact that it still gives me a burning sensation when applied, especially around the eyes. The old formula was gentle around the eyes. Whether this new form of hyaluronic acid is better or not I can't say for sure??

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: I have always suffered from extremely dry and sensitive skin. Therefore, I have to avoid irritants like fragrances and dyes and essential oils in any moisturizer. The journey of looking for the perfect moisturizer ended finally when I discovered Cerave PM lotion. For me, it is the perfect moisturizer. It has everything I need. Its lightweight ( I hate heavy moisturizers). It also has ceramides, hyaluronic acid, and niacinamide. I just love the texture and how my face feels when i apply it. I will repurchase again and again!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: This product used to work amazingly well for me, however they keep changing the ingredients!  They have so far changed the ingredients twice in the past 6 months and I thought maybe I would give cerave another chance but no.  Most people who use this product have sensitive skin and you can‚Äôt just go changing the products around on them!  Now every time I apply this lotion my skin burns seconds later!  This is ridiculous, if it ain‚Äôt broke don‚Äôt fix it.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: The best face night lotion!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: It‚Äôs not the same product. The ingredients are different and the one I got says it‚Äôs for dry skin.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: UPDATE: I left a review about the formula change on the Cerave website and it was moderated.Welp I've been duped again. First by Neutrogena,now Cerave. They changed the formula with nothing noted on the box of course. It's like a completely different lotion! Doesn't have the nice moisture rich feeling the old formula had. And smells cheap or something? The worst part is that I have rosacea and any change to what I use on my face can really be significant. I at least wish they would've noted the change on the box because now my face is doing that weird tingle that means my rosacea doesn't like it. I assume this change was made due to the new top ingredient, potassium phosphate, being inexpensive...

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: I have never suffered with acne. My skin was looking amazing until I used this lotion. Unfortunately it took me 2 months to figure out this lotion was causing me to break out. I had a variety of other product I was using- but I finally narrowed it down to this lotion as the problem. I am so disappointed bc this brand has the reputation of being gentle for all skin types. This has caused so much damage to my skin that will take awhile to reverse. Bummed out!!!

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: I absolutely loved this product before they changed the formula. This moisturizer used to be very lightweight and non greasy, as it states. New formula really changes all that and causes my skin to burn when applied. Really disappointed and will not be buying again.

product_name: CeraVe Facial Moisturizing Lotion PM | 3 Ounce (Pack of 2) | Ultra Lightweight, Night Face Moisturizer | Fragrance Free
review: Did not realize how much good this moisturizer was doing for my skin until I stopped using it for a week (used CeraVe body lotion without the niacinamide). Big mistake! Discoloration started to come back, my pores looked larger, and got two pimples on my nose. Now I'm a believer, and will never be without this stuff again.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: I had knee surgery on the 13th of Sept 2019.  I bought Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula with Vitamin E on the 7th of Oct and received it on the 9th of Oct and pictures show how it works.  I would recommend this product.  My before and after pictures.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: I love this product. Purchase it all the time at local department stores. But I was extremely disappointed to receive this via Amazon only to discover that someone decided to swipe their finger across it. Completely unsanitary and disgusting. I am a complete germaphobe and refuse to use this. I purchased replacement at Walmart and I‚Äôm going to request refund from seller. These should have a safety seal attached. Especially with all the nonsense going on today where people‚Äôs food is also being tampered with at store level.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: I go through a lot of this stuff, and purchased 3 jars in October. What I received was different than what I am used to - greasy, weird texture, smells a little different. I thought maybe they changed the formula, but I bought some at Target on sale, and it was the product I am used to. This picture is what I purchased at Target on the left, and what I purchased here on the right. I don't know what happened, but I do not recommend buying this item here. I saw a difference in my skin within a day of using the Target purchased tub, while a week of daily application of the Amazon purchases tub didn't seem to do anything. And all three tubs I purchased had the same issues.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: This is my first time writing a review. First, I want to apology if these pictures make you feel uncomfortable. Due to the pandemic, I cannot seek for medical treatment at the moment. This lotion was the beginning of my nightmare. At the beginning, it was just a little redness, then my skin started getting itchy, some of the skin started to peel off, and the red rash started to spreading rapidly all over my stomach, butt, waist and thighs, it also accompanied by a very strong burning sensation at the same time. I really do not know what to do now, everyone's constitution is not the same, I hope you can have professional advice before you ordering.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: I have used this product for years, but grossed out when I opened the package. Dirty grime all over the container.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: Great product, helps with all kinds of scars. Works well on dry skin as well.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: Received this product today. It didn‚Äôt seem right so I checked the label and it is made for distribution in Nigeria.  I have noticed that the product was moving around within the container (dried) plus there was no scent at all.  It appears to be old and or counterfeit. Started a return and received a refund. Tossing it out.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: The heading says most of it. Just want to add that there was no protective plastic, no seal, nothing to protect it from being opened and "tested." Also, same as another product I bought and have reviewed, a toddler could open it, which is scary because they'll try anything, sometimes large amounts--and this is not food, although it smells very appealing, and that's the problem. Companies are saving themselves work and money by sending items out unprotected.Ignore the part missing, it arrived looking smooth and new inside. I scooped out some to try before giving a review, no other way to do that--as opposed to The Petal Fresh "Body Butter" that I found that way, with a huge hole, missing product--air hole or someone sampled it? I don't know.As for this, if you don't mind the grittiness, use it as I did--on feet or elbows. It is far too gritty and thick for someone's face or other parts of the body you don't want mucked up, plus the clogged pores.I put on double socks after using this with the other product.So if the company sent this product safety-sealed, I could recommend it for the two spots mentioned--feet and elbows; otherwise, go elsewhere. That's my opinion, you'll have to form your own, of course.

product_name: Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Daily Skin Therapy Solid Lotion | 7.25 Ounces
review: I'm sure it will work fine but mine was as hard as a rock. I keep having to put it in the microwave to soften it.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: This company deserves to be sued.  After getting burned horribly, with blisters, I then knew why my 2 year old daughters skin was breaking into a serious rash.  This product.  Looking in to what can legally be done for recourse. I am shocked this is an ‚ÄúAmazons Choice‚Äù.  I will be taking this to a lab to see what is in it to find out what can be done for legal recourse.  For the others who had similar experiences, a class action suit seems to be in order.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I‚Äôm in love with this sunscreen. It‚Äôs light weight, goes on clear and very gentle for sensitive skin like mine. Chemical sunscreens  burn my eyes, but since this is combination sunscreen (zinc and octinoxate), it goes on gently without leaving a white cast. The smell is a little funky, but I believe it‚Äôs because it doesn‚Äôt cointain fragrance (also a plus). Highly recommended!

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: Friends:We live on a Ranch at 9000 foot altitude in the remote Sangre de Cristo mountain range of Colorado.  Without this stuff I would have had skin cancer many years ago as we have 325 days of endless blue skies and bright snow covers the ground in Winter.  It is a Privilege to live on a Ranch in a low population area.Google my name to Learn more.....Arthur Gerard Michael Baron von Boennighausen

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I like how the product does not feel greasy and provides full spectrum UV protection. It does cost more than what you would buy from the large manufacturers but think if you do a bit of reading it is worth the little extra cost.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I have pretty sensitive skin and this stuff is so light that I forget I have it on.  It is light nd not heavy at all, my wife wears it under her makeup.  Everyone needs this! Seriously.. everyone needs sunscreen so buy this!

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: dermatologists say this is a good product, but it is very unsafe. It has Octinoxate, which is an endocrine disruptor that mimics estrogen and can disrupt thyroid function. It actually enters the bloodstream. It‚Äôs found in hair color products and shampoos, sunscreen, lipstick, nail polish, skin creams.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: Tried it 3 times, and it made my skin breakout. It was very moisturizing though and not drying. Missed the return window ‚òπÔ∏è

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: Love their product which works great for my dry / combination skin. The only thing I really hate about it is the fact that they changed their bottle pump - hate it! Hoping they change it back and do something about this new one.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I love this sunscreen, ordered the tinted but instead received the clear :/Hence the 4 stars!

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I am 40 years old. People think I'm a college kid.I have never had ANY fillers or plastic surgery. This picture is not filtered in any way.Skin cancer runs in my family so I started using SPF at age 10 every single day and have continued to m whole life.The ONLY way to naturally avoid wrinkles is through using a high SPF 365 days a year with a high level of Zinc Oxide and REAPPLYING every 2 hours.There is literally no other way.Here's how to avoid wrinkles:1) Pump 3 pumps of this onto your fingertips.2) Use a 13 dot method to apply to your face ONLY.3) SPREAD (not rub) the lotion in (it will eventually sink in and the white cast will dissipate).4) Pump 3 more pumps onto your fingertips and apply 10 dots to your neck, d√©colletage and tops of hands.5) SPREAD (not rub) the lotion in (it will eventually sink in and the white cast will dissipate) .6) REAPPLY every 2 hours using the 3 pump, 13 dot method, 3 pump 10 dot - 2 dot method in order to get proper SPF protection.So, NO. "a little" does NOT go a long way unless you want CANCER or Melanoma.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I received a sample of Elta MD and liked it. I took it to a week long aquatic class and tried a different sunscreen each day. This one was light texture and neutral scent. It was smooth and didn't separate. It absorbed well and didn't leave white marks.It lasted through three hours of the morning pool session. I reapplied to my face, neck, chest, and shoulders after lunch. It lasted well in the water.

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: When I saw that this was a Retinol serum, I was expecting that Retinol would be featured as one of the top ingredients.  It's not.  Instead it is hidden way down in the middle  of the list of chemical ingredients.The fact that I can't find a percentage of Retinol for this product likely means there isn't enough to warrant such a measurement, which then in turn means that it is likely ineffective for resurfacing and brightening.  I haven't seen a difference.  Spend the money on a product that truly is Retinol based, and you will see results.

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: i really wanna try this product i‚Äôve read so much good reviews  but i got it with a damaged box. not sure if it matters because now i don't know if this product is used or not being returned by somebody else and delivered to me . idk not a big deal but not so happy about it.

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: Ya lo prob√© y la verdad desde que lo us√© me gusto mucho porque no es algo que enrojecer√° tu rostro, el frasco es un poco peque√±o pero lo dem√°s todo bien !

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: I have a few acne scars on my face that looked noticeable with and without makeup on. My skin texture at the scar sites is uneven, causing my foundation makeup to look caked on and unflattering in those spots. This serum has helped to smooth out and fade my scars. The discolored spots look lighter and less noticeable. My skin texture has actually improved, and my foundation makeup applies more evenly now.

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: Product exactly as described in original packaging. Very happy with my purchase thank you

product_name: CeraVe Retinol Serum for Post-Acne Marks and Skin Texture | Pore Refining, Resurfacing, Brightening Facial Serum with Retinol | 1 Oz
review: This is a very small one ounce bottle which seems to be the norm for retinol creams. The base lotion that the encapsulated retinol, ceramides, licorice root and niacinamide is the stand out here when comparing it to similar products. I find CeraVe products to be so smooth and non irritating. I never have break outs or reactions. As I am getting older I am not healing as quickly after a pimple and this is nice and not greasy but leaves my face feeling hydrated. I have been using this when I have redness I want to go away more quickly and I still love the CeraVe hyaluranic acid serum as my go to face lotion for dewy looking skin.

product_name: Gloves In A Bottle Shielding Lotion for Dry Skin, 8 Ounce
review: My brother who lives in Indiana was bragging on his bottle of "liquid love" - he has multiple bottles, one for work, a couple in different places at the house and he swears that he no longer has dry skin splits.  I'm in Arizona, and finger tips with splitting skin is "normal".  I've tried countless different hand lotions, creams, even liquid band aid and the splits continue to appear, take forever to heal.  Washing your hands it is uncomfortable.  At my brothers urging I purchased Glovesinabottle to test this so called "miracle" product.  Within 24 hours, I could "feel" something bridging the gap on my split finger and it no longer was painful to use when typing/washing.  I am up to Day 3 now - and it is healing rapidly. review: I've never tried anything like this before! This is a pretty cool product. After you're done taking a shower, apply this onto your wet skin. Crazy! I know. Then pat a towel onto your skin to dry off. This is sort of a time consuming thing so if you're in a rush, don't use it. It recommends using a dime size on arms and quarter size on legs, I double the amount for the best results. I have dry skin and it's even dryer when I shave my legs. I applied this onto my legs and my skin doesn't feel dry at all. It literally moisturizes my entire body! It evens leaves my legs feeling smooth and silky and the scent does linger on! It evens leave a little shine on my legs which I love!! I'm love this product and I am looking forward to trying the others!

product_name: Jergens Wet Skin Body Moisturizer with Restoring Argan Oil, 10 Fl Oz (Pack of 4) (Packaging May Vary)
review: Hands down this is the best in shower moisturizer on market. Glides on easily, very moisturizing  and fragrance is mild.  I always marvel at how much my skin glows when all the water is gone. I have given these as gifts and so many people are now sharing the same satisfaction. I take my Jergens in shower lotion all over the world since it works in all climates.  Its not sticky so perfect to use in the tropics and very moisturizing in the most artic conditions

product_name: Jergens Wet Skin Body Moisturizer with Restoring Argan Oil, 10 Fl Oz (Pack of 4) (Packaging May Vary)
review: Previous to trying this product I have used a similar product from Eucerin, a skin lotion that you are supposed to apply when you are still wet after a shower, before toweling off.  The Eucerin product sounded like a good idea but in reality it wasn‚Äôt. It stayed on the skin and came off on the towel, leaving it greasy and unfit to use again until it was washed, and I don‚Äôt wash my towels after every shower.Jergens Wet Skin lotion did better.  But not at first. It seems you can‚Äôt get away from the fact that oil and water don‚Äôt mix.  When I first applied it the cream turned sticky and gooey. Not a good initial feeling.  But by the time I stepped out of the shower and started toweling off I noticed that the towel wasn‚Äôt getting greasy ‚Ä¶ an improvement over the competitive lotion. By the time I was dry there was no trace of the product on my skin other than the coconut scent.  I mean NO trace. My skin felt exactly the same as it always does, which at this time of year is dry.I see no advantage to using this over using ordinary Jergens lotion as needed throughout the day. Fortunately, if the selling price continues to be about $3 per 6 ounce tube, you are paying about the same for this as regular Jergens lotion, so it becomes entirely a personal choice which to use but it offers no overwhelming advantage over regular lotion.GOOD TO KNOWOver and above the review of how it works, here‚Äôs some optional information you may find useful.1. Few consumer products contain more marketing hype than cosmetics and this is certainly no exception.  It promises to ‚Äúlock in hydration at skin‚Äôs peak moisture moment‚Äù. Translation? That would mean it seals in your shower water so it can‚Äôt be toweled off. A dubious claim.2. It promises to give you ‚Äúluminous skin‚Äù.  That word, luminous, I do not think it means what they think it means. According to the dictionary, luminous means ‚Äúfull of or shedding light; bright or shining, especially in the dark‚Äù.  I can assure you that my skin is not shining and I do not glow in the dark as a result of using this product.3. Jergens instructs you to dry yourself by patting yourself dry with the towel. Who does that?4. While they don‚Äôt include any specific use directions or warnings they allude to this product being only intended for use on the arms and legs.  From experience I can tell you to keep this away from your private areas and common sense would say to keep it away from your eyes.

product_name: Jergens Wet Skin Body Moisturizer with Restoring Argan Oil, 10 Fl Oz (Pack of 4) (Packaging May Vary)

product_name: Cur√©l Daily Healing Body Lotion for Dry Skin, 20 Ounces
review: Curel has changed the ingredients in this lotion as well as the name.  It is now called "Curel Daily Moisture Comforting Lotion for Dry Skin."  Even the Curel website has not completely updated the product page at this time (April 2015), as it shows the new label and ingredient list but with the old title, "Curel Daily Moisture Original Lotion."It is a mildly viscous, translucent white lotion with a very faint and inoffensive sweet floral fragrance that fades in just a few minutes.It is easy to apply even to large areas of the body.  Unusual for a lotion, it leaves a palpable but non-greasy film that improves the texture of the skin, making it feel moist and smooth.  It does do a surprisingly good job soothing itchy or prickly skin.Because it is a lotion rather than a creme, it is not the best choice for truly diseased or damaged skin, but it is an excellent choice to soothe and protect healthy skin when it is irritated.Ingredients:  Water, glycerin, distearyldimonium chloride, petrolatum, isopropyl palmitate, cetyl alcohol, dimethicone, methylparaben, ethylparaben, fragrance, sodium chloride, cetyl-PG hydroxyethyl palmitamide, butylene glycol, Butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, Eucalyptus globulus leaf extract, gelatin, Acacia senegal gum.

product_name: Neck Firming Cream, Wrinkle Cream, Moisturizer for Neck and Chest, Formula For Tightening, Lifting and Anti-wrinkle Neck Cream, Double Chin Reducer, Repair Crepe Skin
review: I like the packaging but more so I really love how this product has returned the elasticity to my neck area. Definitely left my skin feeling firmer on my neck afterwards. It helped also to brighten up neck. It has a silky consistency and it‚Äôs not sticky or greasy at all. It is a new must have in my skin care routine.

product_name: Neck Firming Cream, Wrinkle Cream, Moisturizer for Neck and Chest, Formula For Tightening, Lifting and Anti-wrinkle Neck Cream, Double Chin Reducer, Repair Crepe Skin
review: I have what are called necklace lines, and I've tried a lot of creams out there on the market. One of the things I've had to accept about these lines is that it took a long time to get them, so it will take a long time to see a really big improvement. What I like about this cream first and foremost is the smell. So many other firming creams, especially the big brand-name ones, don't smell that great, and because of this I could only use it at night. The smell on this one is light and pleasant. While I've only been using this one for a month, I have seen an improvement. I know that if I continue to use it, I will see an even better improvement. And what's nice is that because the smell is so nice, I can apply this twice a day instead of once a day like I did with previous creams. Try it out!

product_name: Neck Firming Cream, Wrinkle Cream, Moisturizer for Neck and Chest, Formula For Tightening, Lifting and Anti-wrinkle Neck Cream, Double Chin Reducer, Repair Crepe Skin
review: I have tried dozens of neck firming creams over the years...from popular brands, to celebrity sponsored, to the extremely chic and pricey.  I have to admit that this product is by far the best.  The texture is smooth and creamy, not sticky or greasy.  It seems to flow on like silk.  Plus I love that it's organic and natural too.  I haven't been using it that long but I've noticed a difference in how my skin feels and looks.  I can't wait to see more positive results.  I am satisfied with my purchase in every way.  The product is reasonably priced and in my opinion, is doing what it claims.  I will definitely purchase again.

review: The old formula (top row in the picture) used to be my number one five star body lotion selling about $39.90. I kept all the old bottles just because one day I will cut it open and dig out the remaining ones that couldn‚Äôt get pumped out.I didn‚Äôt quite like the current formula but it costs 50% lesser ($19.90). It‚Äôs also 50% less effective. I used to buy three bottles of the old formula per year and now I have to buy 3 bottles in half year for the new formula.What can I say? I‚Äôm not so happy about the discontinue; but I haven‚Äôt found another replacement either. It does work for me but now I have to apply more of it to make up the inefficiency. My skin is quite demanding when it comes to body moisturizer.The price drop is good for new customer who wants to try it out and not have dramatic dry skin.But for old customer is a turn off. So giving it one star less.
