product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay, 12-Hour Hydration with Aloe, Moisturizing Facial Lotion for Sensitive Skin - 6 Oz (Pack of 3) Packaging may Vary
review: WHAT ISN'T IN THIS SKIN MOISTURIZER FOR SENSITIVE SKIN (WITH ADDED SUNSCREEN) IS JUST AS IMPORTANT AS WHAT IS!Gentle and calming is right ... and I should know because I have super-super-super sensitive skin and allergies/asthma.  It is SO hard to get this kind of product with all the "bad" stuff removed.  GET THIS:  NO DYE  .. OILS ... FRAGRANCE ... SILICONES ... PARABENS.  And it's wonderfully NON-COMEDOGENIC, so no clogged pores!  This basically is my  "don't" wish list for all skin creams. For me, it's totally worth its  weight in gold, and its claims are true as I've found all their products to be.In California, I especially need sunscreen year-round and it's so hard to find a face product that works as a moisturizer with sunscreen, but still provides a nice canvas for foundation.  Usually, they don't blend well together.  In this case, the moisturizer is perfect for me and contains 15 SPF -- yes, that's the minimal SPF, but still workable.  Actually, I'm layering it over another OLAY sunscreen with higher SPF, and then my foundation.  Works like a charm and makes me feel "protected" at the same time.  The pump bottle has a twist lock, and the product is creamy white with great spreadability and coverage.  Not a matte finish or greasy on the skin. The more important factor for me was that nothing about it irritates my skin in any way, and yet still has decent SPF protection.  All the ingredients left out of this moisturizer shouldn't be used by anyone anyway, so the product really has universal appeal.  You need not have sensitive skin to benefit from using it.  Oddly enough, this was my second OLAY product this week that I've never used before, which is weird because I'm a long-time, loyal OLAY consumer and should know about it.  ANOTHER GREAT OLAY SKINCARE PRODUCT FOR MY REGIMEN.  This is just another example of what a class act OLAY is in the skincare industry with great products are priced far below big-name competitors.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay, 12-Hour Hydration with Aloe, Moisturizing Facial Lotion for Sensitive Skin - 6 Oz (Pack of 3) Packaging may Vary
review: This oil-free lotion is designed for sensitive skin. The zinc-oxide mineral component of this broad spectrum SPF 15 lotion is designed to act as a barrier so it can sometimes leave a white mask-like appearance but this product goes on light and smooth and absorbs well. It is non-comedogenic so it does not clog pores and the formula includes no silicones, dyes or parabens.And although there is no added fragrance the components have a light fragrance of their own but what is there dissipates quickly. The manual pump has a very small opening so when pressed a controlled amount is dispensed which helps avoid wasting product. To operate turn counterclockwise to open, clockwise to lock. The SPF protection is welcome in this facial lotion, it feels good on my skin and helps my face stay hydrated.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay, 12-Hour Hydration with Aloe, Moisturizing Facial Lotion for Sensitive Skin - 6 Oz (Pack of 3) Packaging may Vary
review: This is one of the nicest moisturizers I‚Äôve used in a long time. I have combination/sensitive skin that needs hydration without shine. This moisturizer leaves my skin looking soft and hydrated without adding a shiny film. My makeup goes on smoothly over it, and I get compliments on how my skin looks these days. It feels gentle, it‚Äôs unscented, and doesn‚Äôt cause me irritation or breakouts. I also like the addition of SPF 15 for some sun protection. It saves me a step in my daily skin care routine.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay, 12-Hour Hydration with Aloe, Moisturizing Facial Lotion for Sensitive Skin - 6 Oz (Pack of 3) Packaging may Vary
review: This is one of the best day lotions I‚Äôve tried in a while, and it‚Äôs more reasonably priced than many I‚Äôve tested along the years. The lotion not only has a small amount of SPF to protect your skin, but it also offers a bit of moisture and feels very light. The label says it‚Äôs non comedogenic, so hopefully this means I won‚Äôt be breaking out. Really nice, light lotion with some protection against the sun.

product_name: Face Moisturizer by Olay, 12-Hour Hydration with Aloe, Moisturizing Facial Lotion for Sensitive Skin - 6 Oz (Pack of 3) Packaging may Vary
review: Oil of Olay facial moisturizer 4 starsThis is a lightweight and fragrance free moisturizer. Perfect and gentle enough for sensitive skin. Contains SPF15 sunscreen for sun protection. review: I don't have a lot of redness, but I do have eczema. It's fairly creamy without being too thick. It soaks in nicely and doesn't leave a sticky residue feeling. It would def be great for those who moisturize before primer.The smell is probably the most off putting part. It doesn't smell like a granny, as others have said, but it smells very pungent like Aveeno oatmeal or spf.Overall results are that I'm satisfied with the product. It doesn't what it claims and hasn't broken me out, but the smell doesn't make me want to reach for it first.

The only negative feedback I would give is that it smells like old lady Perfume, and I have a new cystic zit forming (might not be related to this product tho)Over all a great buy, I‚Äôll take smelling like granny and a zit over my face looking like it‚Äôs on fire any day

product_name: SeboCalm Redness Relief Face Moisturizer - Vegan Hypoallergenic Soothing Rosacea or Acne Prone Anti Itch Skin Care Cream for Facial Sensitive Oily and Combination Skin
review: Designed to moisturize and soothe sensitive and red skin this light cream is contained in a manual pump 1.7 ounce bottle. For first use, press down on the pump a few times until the moisturizer is released.  The pump nozzle has a small opening so just the amount desired can be dispensed which avoids product waste. A small amount is all that is needed.In a basic skin routine this moisturizer is step three after cleansing and using a toner to help with the absorption of this light cream. The product is absorbed within a minute or two and there is no sticky or greasy residue. Fragrance is added but it is light and dissipates quickly. The cream is gentle and it temporary hydrates the skin. Cruelty-free. Very nice.

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: I have very sensitive skin and often times acne treatments will make me feel like my skin is as dry as the Savannah desert without making any of the problems better. The best ingredient in this is the hyaluronic acid, which attracts a thousand times its size water particles. This ingredient is a wonderful one to help keep my skin moisturized when using a product like this. The ceramides are also useful, because keeping the acid mantle, or the skin barrier, is crucial to maintaining healthy skin. There's very little scent to this product, which I appreciate. I'm not going to need to use this everyday, but for those who do this would be a terrific choice. Update: I just used this with my clarisonic cleansing brush in the shower, and the combination was a little too much. It really created a redness on my skin, so I won't do that combination again.

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: I have allergies and sensitive skin, so I have to be careful about the products I use. This acne face wash didn't have any adverse effects on me. I only use it once per day, though, to reduce the likelihood of a reaction.

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: 21/Jan/2020PROS+ It was not agressive for my skin.+ Scent is very subtle, but it is nice.+ Face feels very clean after use, not dry even when it says that it might create dryness!CONS- After having used several foaming cleansers, I was expecting this to foam as I applied to my face - but it never happened. It's like the cream just gets around the face with zero foaming effect.For this last issue, I am giving this 3/5 recommendation!* I will update this review if something changes as I keep using the product.* If you found this review helpful, please click below! This will help other users like you to make informed decisions before spending their money!

product_name: CeraVe Acne Foaming Cream Cleanser | Acne Treatment Face Wash with 4% Benzoyl Peroxide, Hyaluronic Acid, and Niacinamide | Cream to Foam Formula | 5 Oz
review: I have very sensitive, combination oily skin and this didn't sting my face. It's on the thinner side, and doesn't foam up much, but it does get the job done. Be warned this can stain your towels, so I recommend using one you don't mind ruining. Doesn't have a scent in my opinion. If you are sensitive to fragrences, and want a face wash that won't dry out your skin, this is a great choice. I don't recommend using this everyday though, only when you feel a breakout coming, or when you already have a breakout.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: The proof is in the pictures! You can see the DRASTIC IMPROVEMENTS in just 3 weeks! Especially considering how damaged my skin was, this product is absolutely AMAZING and WORKS FAST! My face had a bad breakout, especially on my forehead. I got this product to remove the dark spots and in just ONE week I already began to see results. By the second week it was even better! I've included a picture at the third week, and you can see just how much better my skin has become already! I used the product twice a day, everyday, for 3 weeks and the results are just INCREDIBLE. (I also included a picture sometime after the 3 week mark, but these results are not consistent with the time frame as I began to forget to use the product regularly; and thus are not reflective of the quality of this product, because it is my own fault I was not using it as often.) I am so happy, I've been recommending it to everyone! Some things to note are that you may experience mild irritation as the serum dries on your skin, you only need to apply a thin layer to the affected areas (nothing unbearable, and still worth it). Also, as the skin begins the peeling process it may actually appear darker before it comes off, but it will reveal much lighter skin if you're patient. Since your skin is peeling, you will need to moisturize and protect your skin from the sun, thankfully I was using this product over a very cloudy season on the year. The packaging has other important information you need to be mindful of, but I HIGHLY RECOMMEND. And the company is very nice, very sweet, personal customer service. I have no complaints! I could not be more thankful this product literally SAVED MY SKIN, it's a MIRACLE WORKER! I've tried so many things and nothing worked so amazing and in such a short time. It's affordable and worth every cent! I didn't just get back better skin, but confidence and happiness! TRY IT!

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: I LOOOOOVED THIS PRODUCT! - I had hyper pigmentation in a small area around my cheek. I was warned this kind of acts like a lesser at home chemical peel. They were not wrong. In two weeks my face went through horrible cracking & peeling. But the skin underneath was beautiful in the end. I cannot stress how much sunscreen you have to put on if you have to go outside. If you can stay home & put on a type of acid-free vaseline to lessen the pain of your skin cracking that would be great during the healing process. Do not peel off the dead skin until it is ready on its own! I posted pictures of the stages I went through.  It looks painful because it was!  But the end result outweighed everything else that happened!

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: I never write reviews but I have to for this product because it is so amazing. About a year ago I got horrible melasma on my upper lip. It was so dark that everyone kept saying that I had dirt on my face. I was embarrassed and would not leave the house without trying to cover it up. However, even the top of the line makeup products would not cover it. I tried every product you can think of and spend hundreds of dollars trying to get rid of and nothing worked. I came across this product and thought why not, I'll try it. Thank god I did!! In just one night I noticed how my dark spots were already fading. After a week, you can barely even notice that I had such dark spots on my lip. My only suggestion besides buying this product is use it in very small spaces and apply it with a q tip. It will darken your fingertips and make them peel. For the first week, this product makes your dark spots look worse and very dry to where you can't wear any makeup. But if you can stick that peeling process out, you will be amazed at the results!! This is by far the greatest product I have ever used and I would recommend that anyone suffering from mesalma, acne scars or dark spots buy it!!

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: My husband had dark pigment under both his eyes. The first week and a half of using this product he didn't see much of a difference, but in week 2-3 we have seen the pigment lighten and area become smaller. This product worked well and he stopped using it whe it started to make the area dry. He will start using the product again once the area is t dry again. But we would recommend this product for dark spot pigment area. (Pic on left before/ pic on right id after week 4)

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)

You have to be patient and also protect your face from  the sun, I used  glasses, sunblock and a cap, you have to do a little sacrifice not exposing yourself to the son while using this product and use small amount, I used only at night time. Good luck to everyone.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: Okay, so for yearsssssssss I had a huge insecurity about my neck due dark spots under my chin and neck area from tweezing out chin hairs /ingrown hairs. I struggled with trying to clear my skin and rid my neck from these hideous scars. I tried everything in the passed and nothing helped. Nothing would remove these dark scars from my skin. I tried other beauty products that removed dark spots on my face such as "Specific Beauty" and "Proactive"........which worked great on my face, however did nothing for removing the area needed most which was my neck. I spoke with a dermatologist who suggested laser surgery to remove the scared tissue......that cost thousands of $$$ that I just did not have. I heard about Hydroquione from a customer who posted her success story on youtube. I was skeptical, but willing to try it out, plus it was only $23.00 and I had a $3.00 coupon from Amazon. I posted the picture of "Day 1", as you can see I have a very light skin tone and the very dark drown spots were such an eyesore. I washed my face with "Biore facial baking soda powder (water activating) cleanser", which deep cleanse and exfoliates your skin. Then towel pat dry, and applied the "hydroquinone" using a rubber glove. Once the serum dried completely on my face (about 35 to 40 minutes) I used "Rosehip seed oil organic cold press" as a daily moisturizer. I faithfully committed to this routine twice a day. As you can see in my pictures from day 1 to day 14 THIS PRODUCT REALLY WORKED! My dark spots are fading after just two weeks. Pretty soon they will be gone for life. This product burns when absorbing into the skin, but it doesn't last long. For sunscreen I used "neutrogena facial suncreen". I will post my upcoming results in the next 2 weeks which will make a total of 4 weeks of using this product by that time.......stay tuned for my future results.#FeelingLikeA_BrandNewMe

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: Someone recommended this product to me and I am so glad that they did. I‚Äôve had melasma for over 5 years now and have tried just about everything. I was starting to think that nothing would work, until I found this! I‚Äôve been using it for a month now and have seen major major improvement. Just look at my pics. And, yes, there was a little dry skin and some peeling that went along with using this product. Actually, I had a few days where my face felt and looked like leather!! But, it‚Äôs a potent product people. So so worth it. Love love love this stuff. A real godsend.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: This product is essentially a mini chemical peel. Perhaps on older scars it makes a difference, mild peeling, etc, but instead of a couple dark spots from hyperpigmentation I now have what looks like a chemical burn. I HOPE the routine I've come up with  will moisture and keep me from having a nickel size scar. Came to the beach for vacation and literally wearing a bandaid on my face to keep it from burning. I keep getting hopeful as it peels.  Looks better. Then dried and peels again. Keeping a photo album so I have a general idea of any progress. This is just a slew of chemicals that shouldn't be used all at once.  I'll take the slow but steady results of plain hydroquinone instead of a chemical burn. I did have some very small spots that after a couple applications did lighten and I left it at that, not risking it.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: UPDATE: In my first review I had mixed feelings and rightfully so. I hastily gave 4 stars thinking I was on my way to great skin. Some parts of my skin were unaffected and I thought the instructions indicating darkening were normal. However, since I first tried this in December, I thought I‚Äôd peel and be done with this stuff. I‚Äôve been left with a severe burn although I discontinued using the product in December after one week. I‚Äôve been desperately trying to get rid of this damage since then with no luck. I‚Äôm forced to wear double the makeup and it can still be seen underneath. Now the summer is coming and the moment I encounter heat, my burn will be exposed. I‚Äôve tried gentle healing techniques such as cocoa butter to help to heal it, but I think this is permanent 3 months later. My skin was a good shape before, I just wanted to even it out, now I hate to be in the house, much less outdoors. In the photo, I applied manuka honey to the scar.Whooo. I have a lot of mixed feelings about this product. Do this on the weekend and never before special occasions!!  I think it‚Äôs good for certain skin types, but be warned, there‚Äôs a possibility you‚Äôll suffer from irritation, dryness or burns! I have skin made of titanium and it‚Äôs been through procedures such as laser hair removal, so I‚Äôm accustomed to some kind of skin trauma. With that said, I wanted to even up my side burns, chin, neck and one seriously annoying dark spot on my forehead. The skin surrounding the forehead spot is lightening around the spot, but the spot only got darker. I‚Äôm guessing this will take longer to work and needs to be applied with more precision. As for the rest of my face and neck, I noticed the peeling and was amazed that this was a thin layer of skin coming off!!! The shadow on my sides and neck are slowly peeling away. There is some irritation but I‚Äôm a champ and added some aloe Vera gel to combat the tight, dry skin. I highly recommend concentrating this product only wear needed and going light until one can determine their pain or irritation threshold.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: When I took off the lid tonight, a significant amount of reddish brown fluid leaked out. This product was clear.  It appeared to have had some sort of chemical reaction that caused it to force the fluid out and change the color and smell. Amazon refunded it and told me to throw it away. It‚Äôs already a very caustic  substance, and, to be fair, it did work to reduce spots-with a lot of redness and scabs. I would not re-order this.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: This product made my skin breakout in a rash in multiple areas, as well as gave me acne.  Definitely will stop use.  If you have sensitive skin you should avoid this product - live with the scars instead.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: Update:I am still using this product and my melasma is almost completely gone!! My skin is healthier and brighter! Just try it!!Update: I have gone down to using this just once daily my skin no longer peel or burns after applying it but I am still seeing results. My melasma is now barley visible and easily covered by makeup!!!I will say I was very skeptical about using this product But it has only been 10 days since I purchased this product and I am already seeing mild results! I have severe melasma all over my face. It started when I was in my early 20's and nothing I have done or any of the products I have tried (including prescriptions) have helped, at all! I am hoping that this product will continue to work. I have actually already ordered another bottle in fear that they would not have any available when I need more. I have been using it twice daily, applying a good moisturizer/sun block and experienced a very mild burning sensation when applied. Within 3 days of using this product my face began to peel leaving visibly lighter/healthier skin!

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: I've been using this since 12/7/17 and today is exactly 8 days later. And it's definitely working.  My skin did get irritated and is dry and peeling pretty bad. Basically it's a chemical peel. It burns when I apply it and for me looked bad before it got better. I but warm wet compress on the area to loosen the peeling skin. After scrubbing my face it feels very smooth. I do apply a moisturizer to help the roughness before the skin  completely peels off.  You can see a bit of the dryness in my picture. I had just scrubbed with a warm wet rag to get the peeling skin off. I will update. 4 stars for now because of the discomfort when using this product, but 5 stars for the results though.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: Ok so I figured I would put my review in hopes of it helping someone else or whether they want to purchase this or not... I have tried so many things but unfortunately nothing worked..... until NOW! After my third and final pregnancy my hormones went crazy and I developed this sunstache if you will. I felt so terribly ugly and constantly self conscious, I had zero hair there but it was always so dark like a 5oclock shadow. I saw this product and figured what the hell what do I have to lose.Day 1-4 It started out like just this clear serum I let dry on my face and then go about my day. I always applied with a qtip every morning and every night. Score bed. Days 2, 3, 4 looked like madness and yes it burned like someone had a lighter to my face. I literally sat there with a fan but was determined as I saw the wonderful results everyone else had. I stopped use after my morning application on day 5 because my skin was just so raw and I figured I would let it peel, heal, and reveal. The new fresh skin is sooooooo much lighter. I am a freak and still see a few spots that I could continue but I will go to once a day usage now.The final picture is day 7 and it still has another day or two of healing and last bits of skin to flake off but my gosh I am so impressed. I feel like my girly self again.Ladies, this does suck, but patience and dedication to just continue and when it gets to the point of super shitty and your skin is peeling and raw you should stop and let it heal and be amazed at the difference it will make. I am so thankful for this product because between my husband and I there‚Äôs only room enough for one mustache in this house! Best of luck to everyone

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: I was very skeptical to use this product because I didn‚Äôt think it would work for me. Nights 1-3 got a little red, and night 4 was stinging a little So I took that night off. Then the next six nights I used it and my skin got very red, and irritated looking. But it never hurt. Then the last two nights it scabbed up pretty good so I took the last two nights off and by day 12 to 13 which is today I went to use a light scrub to clean off the peeling skin lightly,  expecting to put more solution on the new skin. But low and behold, the melasma dark spot came off!  Sidenote on day four I got some crepeing  of the skin. I thought it would be permanent but it  only lasted a few days, ended up going away because I put lots of moisturizer over my skin every day and extra moisturizer  in the last two days (I used Oil Olay 7 effects)Love this product!!

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: ¬†I loved this product. I could only use it once a day due to my schedule however i saw results within 3 weeks. It gave some moisture to my skin but not much. It helped clear up some of my acne for awhile there along with a steady diet of water. I don‚Äôt feel it brightened my skin too much but the acne scars are a lot less noticeable i can finally go out without makeup and not be worried about it looking terrible. I added a video from when i started and pictures of it currently. Granted this is after 2 months of use but once daily although it is recommended for twice daily.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: We went on vacation to Costa Rica, and despite liberal sunscreen, I ended up with a very dark freckle on my upper lip.  I particularly didn't like the location of it, so I gave this product a try.  It took a few weeks of gradual peeling, but one day a peel of super-dark skin came off and that was it for the freckle!  It was like it just had to work it's way down to the right layer.  It wasn't overly unpleasant because I was only doing that one spot, but if definitely worked as advertised and I am super happy with the result.  Before and After pics attached.

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: I purchased this product to help fade the acne scars on my face. I applied the product to the areas using a q-tip and was burned only a few seconds later. The areas of skin that I applied the product to instantly turned a pinkish/whitish color. I felt so much burning. I rinsed the product off of my fave as fast as I could and later applied aloe Vera. The next day, my forehead is still red and inflamed, and there are areas on my chin that are scabbing really bad. My skin is worse now AFTER trying this product. I‚Äôm so upset :(

product_name: 2% Hydroquinone Dark Spot Corrector Remover For Face & Melasma Treatment Fade Cream - Contains Vitamin C, Salicylic Acid, Kojic Acid, Azelaic Acid, Lactic Acid Peel (1oz)
review: First of all, I was not paid to right this review. Second, it truly works!I have had a sun spot/liver spot for years. It has only gotten larger and darker. I have tried multiple products and nothing made any difference what so ever. I read the reviews and saw the pictures and had hope this might work. I am over joyed!!!! My photos speak for themselves.A representative also, emailed me a couple of days after I received and asked how I liked it and if I had any questions. At that point I had not really seen much difference but I was using a very tiny amount and once a day. The rep asked if I was using twice a day asked suggested I be patient. But also said to contact them with any concerns or questions. And emailed a few days later again to ask if product was working and if I had any questions.My first photo is on June 4, 2019. Second photo June 20, 2019. Last photo is June 23, 2019. I am going to use a few more days then take a break for a month as suggested.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: I actually ordered the original, red-packaged product (Alpha Hydrox Foaming Facewash) and was sent this instead. I could tell immediately that it smelled different, which wasn't a good sign. Hoping it would work the same regardless,  I used it for a couple of weeks. Although I didn't see horrible breakouts on my sensitive, combination skin, there was definitely an increase in blemishes, and my oil level was less controlled than it had been for years of using the old stuff. I didn't keep the boxes, but a quick search enabled me to show the differences between the ingredients. I hope Alpha will bring back the old foaming facewash product, which reliably cleansed and controlled oil without drying out or irritating. This is too gentle and aimed at all skin types, whereas the other was recommended for oily skin; this isn't a proper replacement.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: I use this product when I was in my early 20s For radiant skin. My mother used it for wrinkles. .I didn't realize the company changed the name. I've been searching for it for years. I used to buy it at Rite Aid here in Pittsburgh.  It's a Wonderful product! Makes my skin look flawless again! But this time I use it for fine lines . Takes about a week to see results..I use it all over my body too.. I can't help myself. I'm addicted.. my skin is radiant soft and young looking. My only complaint is the increase in price. This pic is my skin with no make-up. How old do I look ?  Love it!

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: Okay, I've only had this cream one week but I wanted to give the progress so far.  I took some pictures this week to show my skin. I'm going to update it in about 3 weeks - that way it will be a better review but here's what I like so far.1. The way it makes my skin feel - SO soft - I tried another alpha hydroxy cream for more money and less product and it made my face feel tight and like I had a mask on.2. It tingles and has dried out some of my skin around my chin- but that's because it's working - you cannot expect better skin without it first exfoliating - I also have been using their liquid soap for a week so that might also be an affect.3. My complexion looks brighter and lighter - I am NOT a fan of tanned skin - especially when my natural skin color is pale - despite my ignorant attempts as a teenager in Long Island, NY to bake myself - my skin is still pretty decent - about 15 years ago, I was diagnosed with Vitiligo - basically your skin's melanin thinks it's its own enemy and starts to attack itself.  Resulting in patches of white skin througout your body.  Luckily, this only happened on some parts of my body and NOT my face. But? My face darkened permanently - it looked like I was wearing tanner all year long. I HATED it. I really struggled with this because I once had a "peaches and cream" complexion - seriously, I was told this and took pride in it.  So for years, I tried some skin products that claimed to lighten my skin but then I read that they were bad for me internally. So, I stopped, I read skin peels or lasering helped but I felt too poor and too scared to try. I started to read that Vitiligo was related to a compromised immune system and the best way to combat it was through diet, exercise, stress management etc. Okay so long story short - I'm now nearing 50 and except for some slightly darker areas on my face (mostly on the sides of my face hear my eyes and barely noticeable) my complexion is looking really nice again. Healthier eating, exercise, meditating, vitamins etc. have helped. This product though? DEFINITELY is making my skin look smoother and creamier - I am super excited to see how much better it looks in 3 more weeks.4. The price is awesome - yes, a few reviews state it's overpriced now and or less product for your money but come on...have you seen the prices of AHA's out there? And the quantities? And more importantly do they work?5. Ialso  just ordered their body cream and eye cream - so now I have 4 of their skin care line!  If you notice in my pictures - my eyes when I smile have some lines that I would like to soften and hopefully the eye cream will help with that.  I'll review that as well in a few weeks.Anyway, I've found the AHA product that works for me - this is it. Thank you so much Alpha Skin Care line.P.S. now if only there was a way to prevent sagging...that's my biggest aging factor - I've tried some videos online to combat it but haven't stuck with them - please contact me here if you have any suggestions.  Thanks!

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: Love everything about this cleanser.  I use it with my cleansing facial brush.  I have sensitive skin and suffer from eczema.  This does not dry out my skin and works well enough to remove the daily grime on my face.  This has helped ease the redness on my face and have been using this cleanser for over a year now.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: The kit has a nice assortment to try each alone and all together. The base lotions/cleanser that the active ingredients are suspended in are very nice for this price. The cleanser does not foam up, but it‚Äôs not nonfoaming either. I posted a pic of the slight foam from washing my face. The exfoliation is great for aging skin and brightens the dullness that can happen. Best part is that it is not only an American company, but it‚Äôs made here too. I feel much more confident in the purity and quality.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: I love this skin care kit. The kit consist of the refreshing face wash, essential renewal lotion and essential facial moisturizer.The refreshing face wash was really gentle on my skin. I didn't bother my sensitive skin at all and I'm a fan.The renewal lotion scared me when I read the directions because it says it makes your skin sensitive to the sun for one week after use. I followed all the directions (put sunscreen on for a week afterwards) and have had no issues so far.The essential facial moisturizer is my FAVORITE. It makes my skin so soft. I put it on at night and when I wake up in the morning, my face feels so soft but not greasy. I hate face lotions that make me feel like I dunked my face in grease. This is not that type of moisturizer which makes it a 10/10. If you are looking for a skin care line that is gentle on your skin, this is your skin care line.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: Because get my free delivery I but it with body lotion, i hope it good

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: This body wash is pretty moisturizing and effective in making your skin smooth.  The scent is quite pleasant as well.  My only complaint is one of the bottles arrived spilled and leaked out 1/4 of the product and made a mess in the box for my other items.  Wish they could package it better.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: I had high hopes for this set of facial products . I first used the facial wash and it did wonders on my skin. It removed all of the dirt and oil and it left me feeling clean and refreshed. Then I tried the Renewal lotion, after a couple of seconds after applying it I started feeling an odd sensation. I asked my husband to come and look at my skin because of the feeling I had. There was rising heat and irritation and I became worried. At first he said he did not see anything, and then in a matter of seconds he saw that my face was getting red. I then went right into the bathroom and rinsed off my face. We then saw that my face became red and it burned for about 45 minutes, then it stopped. I did not use the last product, the moisturizer, after the burning incident.. I was too afraid. I would take care if you plan on ordering these facial products, especially if you have sensitive skin. I personally would not recommend them.

product_name: Alpha Skin Care Essential Renewal Lotion | Anti-Aging Formula | 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) | Reduces the Appearance of Lines & Wrinkles | For Normal to Dry Skin | 4 Oz
review: I bought this kit for my 16 year old son thinking it would be similar to a three step regime many of us used previously, but this is honestly so much better.My son has seen excellent results by using this regime twice a day - in the morning - when he gets up, and at night - prior to bed.The Refreshing Face Wash, in the largest bottle with a green label, is an excellent face soap that is not too heavy or thick, lathers well and most importantly rinses completely from the facial pores without fail.The Essential Renewal Lotion, the mid sized bottle with a red label, replaces what many of us remember as an alcohol based astringent in our regimes.  Instead of the drying effects of an astringent this lotion contains 10% Glycolic Alpha Hydroxy Acid (AHA) which aids in evening skin tone, fighting acne, removing any remaining oils or dirt leaving the skin soft and feeling ultra clean.The Essential Facial Moisturizer, the smallest bottle with a blue label, is an excellent facial moisturizer that is light and won‚Äôt clog pores. By utilizing Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamins B, E and Aloe Vera this lotion protects the skin and heals blemishes by hydrating the skin and providing the vital nutrients it needs.This kit ended up working so much better than I‚Äôd anticipated. I‚Äôd planned on buying him what I always saw as my ‚Äútried and true‚Äù method but I‚Äôm so glad I decided to give this a shot - I believe you will be as well.This is a product I would definitely recommend.‚≠êÔ∏èAs with all Drew‚Äôs Reviews, if I discover something new about this product - good or bad - I will UPDATE my review.  I believe in creating detailed, complete reviews because, like you, I depend on them when I am shopping.  If you found my review HELPFUL - please click ‚¨áÔ∏è below!‚≠êÔ∏è

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: This item doesn‚Äôt have a lot number or expiration date. My face has broken out ever since using this. I didn‚Äôt put two and two together until I got a new one from my dermotologist. See photo. The one that is from my dermotologist has a lot # and expiration date.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I bought this per my dermatologist‚Äôs recommendation to work as a sunscreen and moisturizer for my rosacea, and it made me break out horribly. I used it 1-2 times per day for a week or two and felt it might be making me break out, so stopped with the hope I could at least use it on vacation as a sunblock. When I did this, applying multiple times per day, I thought I had gotten sunburned, when in actuality my face was just red, swollen, and pimply from this lotion - it all subsided a day or two after I stopped using it. I switched to normal Coppertone and had no problems with burn or breakouts after that. I have never had a reaction to any product as severe as I did this one, which is odd considering it is supposedly designed for sensitive skin types, so beware!

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I really like this SPF cream. First of all it doesn't smell 'perfumey' - it might have a hint of suntan lotion smell, but it's really faint. Second this cream is NOT GREASY and disappears fast - even though it has 9% zinc oxide. Third it has 46+ SPF with 7.5 Octinoxate to slow burning. I've finally had to admit that I need a strong SPF; given past brushes with melanoma and the sincere desire to not have the hide of an alligator. And while not inexpensive, this is far less than the cost of a lot of the better-quality moisturizers for men. You usually get exactly what you pay for and this is worth every penny. Finally, my better half tells me that this company doesn't test on animals. I believe that's a good thing. ;-)WARNING:  Many buyers have received fake products from other sellers.  Buy only when sold and shipped by Amazon!  The authentic product will have a flat sloping pump top that is shown in the attached photo.  The fake products have a rounded top.Pros:‚Ä¢ Non greasy formula that easily absorbs into skin‚Ä¢ Odorless and transparent‚Ä¢ 9% Zinc Oxide provides long lasting protection‚Ä¢ 7+% Octinoxate to reduce burning by dispersing UVB rays‚Ä¢ Tested reliable 30+ SPF‚Ä¢ UVA/UVB sun protectionCons:‚Ä¢ More expensive than drug-store brands

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I emailed EltaMD regarding the validity of the product, here is their response as of yesterday, 9/22/15I give it 3 stars because of my skepticism, but I love the product I have received, assuming it's legitimate.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: This is 2nd time that the pump does not work.I had to break the top to get to the cream and use my fingers to get the cream.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I can't attest to the efficacy of the product, just posting to say, I had negative reactions to it. I have just crested the high side of mid-40s and really wanted to find a good daily sun protectant to guard against [further] aging. This was so well-reviewed, I chose it over the next closest contenders, Roche-Posay products (which I usually love).Unfortunately, the first week of using it, I began to get tiny bumps on my face (not visible to the naked eye, but easily perceived with fingertips when washing or applying moisturizer). I had also been using a new 'flavor' of body lotion, so I went back to my basic tried-and-true products to let everything calm down for a bit, and try to definitively eliminate the culprit.After two weeks, I again applied this on two successive days when I'd be out in the sun for an extended period. On Day 1, once I'd gotten outside and had started perspiring, my neck began burning, then itching maddeningly -- I was only outside in my yard gardening, so ran inside and I washed it thoroughly off my neck.  My face seemed okay, so I left it there, and applied the product again to my ears and face (no neck) on Day 2 when heading out for a long weekend walk.This time, again once I'd gotten outside and started perspiring, the product started burning and itching around my eyebrows and general eye area.  I washed it off as best I could at the next public water fountain.The next day, I began to show itchy, painful swollen patches on my face, ears, and throat (the latter pictured as best I could, but it was difficult to shoot an area I couldn't see!)  This time, there had been no other 'new to me' product used, nor was there anything else that I carefully applied to ears/face/throat, all areas that then became rashy....So alas, not a product I can use, and alas for the waste of a significant amount of money. >:/  I've used other physical sunscreens in the past (eg Badger) without any issues, so it must be some substance in the cream besides that causing the problem.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: After reading all the previous previews, I wanted to leave my experience. The packaging cake well sealed. I have purchased EltaMD products before from my dermatologist so I‚Äôm familiar with the packaging. My order came in and as you can see from the pictures it is well sealed. The batch number from the box is the same batch number in the bottle. Today is my first day using this specific product so I will come back and give an update on my review. I order the non-tinted version since I was worried about it being to thick and clogging my pours. I‚Äôm excited to use this. I have rosacea and hormonal acne.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: Used once. Caused reaction on face and  broke out in hives. (See picture) Im unsure what ingredient would have caused such a severe reaction. Discontinued use and swelling and hives went away within 24 hours. Be careful.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I honestly really liked this stuff because it‚Äôs not oily at all and made my face feel great but after only 2 days of usage I broke out in a rash all over my face. I originally thought the sunscreen just didn‚Äôt work very well because my face was red, but I did not get sunburnt, just a rash. I don‚Äôt have sensitive skin whatsoever and have NEVER gotten any type of rash on my face nor my body. Hoping I‚Äôll somehow be able to get my money back since I only used twice and broke out. :(

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I used this every day for about 2 months on my face and neck. I put it on under my skincare and under my makeup. It comes in a small plastic bottle with a pump. It comes out as a thick white liquid, about the consistency of a moisturizer.This is what I can share about the product.Pros:- Does what it is made to do.- Light scent, not overpowering sunscreen smell. Still scented though.- Does not leave skin oily.- Does not cause breakouts for acne-prone skin.- Does not cause makeup to come off, as it does not dry down to be oily.Cons:- The amount of product you get versus the amount of product you get. The bottle is quite small.- It does have a very very slight white cast to it. So if you have darker skin, and you will not be wearing makeup, it may be noticeable.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: This item came already opened. I could tell as soon as I looked at the bottle, as it had a little bit of the product around the opening (see phot). When I pumped it, the product immediately came out - with a new product, it would require several pumps before anything came out. From now on I'm only getting from Costco or my dermatologist. It's such a bummer to return this, as I know the product will just go in the bin, but I can't believe they thought they could sell me opened goods.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I ordered my second EltaMd sun screen and the first time I got the genuine article the second time I wasn't so lucky, I was sent what I can assume is a fake product as the color of the recipient had bright red stripes (original is a darker shade) and the lettering are smaller and less pronounced compared with the original, the pump wasn't working very well and the product was bright white with practically no smell (original the product is more cream like in color and has a very distinct sun block sent). Not purchasing this product from Amazon again. That was 50 plus dollars down the drain if I include shipping costs.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: This product is excellent, and my favorite, hands-down, which is why I continue to purchase it despite the flawed dispenser. I have purchased this three times on Amazon, and each time there comes a point when the sunscreen begins to leak out of a(n initially sealed) hole in the bottom. I simply store the dispenser upside down, and hold it upside down when I pump it out. It's still more convenient than dealing with driving to my very busy dermatologist's office to buy it there, but may be a dealbreaker for some of you.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I have purchased this product three times and each time i have made sure it says it is CLEAR facial sunscreen. When it arrives it is tinted a light tan color!!  We want to use it for the entire family on their faces but many do not want to use a tan tinted face sunscreen. It is deceptive when it says clear face sunscreen and it comes with a color. This is my one big issue.I like the product. Just not the beige tinting.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: The item arrived in a state shown in the pictures. I have ordered this product several times, and this is the 2nd time that the it arrives like this.Would like to be issued a refund.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I picked it up from an amazon store so it wasn't tossed or anything. Then to open it and find that the box had been crushed or mishandled led to further suspicion. Upon further investigation, I found that some of the sunscreen had been pumped inside the lid. I no longer feel comfortable with applying this to my face as it seems to have been tampered with. Unfortunate, since it was 33$ that I probably won't get back.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I have been using this product for years with no problems.  I use the tinted version, which evens my skin tone but makes my skin look very oily.  This oiliness is new. It has happened with the last two bottles purchased here.  Gives a moderate sunscreen...I have to apply it frequently, especially outdoors.  The new bottles made my eyes burn terribly.  I couldn't figure out what was going on until I saw my eye doctor and he said I was having an allergic reaction to something getting into my eyes,  not a seasonal allergy problem.  I live in the south and love the outdoors, so I sweat a lot. My dermatologist recommended this sunscreen, but I think I'm going to ask about an alternative.  Something has changed in the formulation, and it is not an improvement.  You can see my red eyes and increased bags from the reaction.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: I love this product and give the lotion all the stars! BUT my issue is with the packaging. I would say, every other time I use a new bottle - the pump/applicator breaks shortly after opening and it no longer pumps out lotion which leaves me with a useless bottle that I can't get lotion out of. This has happened multiple times and is so frustrating. I usually have to remove the entire pump applicator and resort to accessing the lotion that way which sucks. Again, i love the content but wish the bottle and applicator were more efficient and useful.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: When I received this product it had exploded all over the cap. The product itself works with my skin just fine but receiving the product in this shape left a bad taste in my mouth. I will no longer purchase from this seller.

product_name: EltaMD UV Clear Facial Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 46 for Sensitive or Acne-Prone Skin, Oil-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 1.7 oz
review: Delivery:I gave this product three stars because some of the contents of the bottle were inside of the cap. Product is either used or damaged during shipment, although I believe it can't be the latter since the cap is undamaged. I would return it if i didnt need this sunscreen today.Product:Now let's talk about the fun part: Elta MD's clear sunscreen with niacinamide! If you're acne-prone or have acne marks/hyperpigmentation you want niacinamide on your face. Unless of course your face doesn't like it (patch test just in case).Acne marks/hyperpigmentation on your skin grow darker in the sun. This product protects you from the sun AND lightens the mark as you wear it! Niacinamide is MAGIC.Application:If you have very oily/normal skin, I suggest applying this on a bare face. If you have any dry patches or your skin is tight (like me) moisturize first and let that sink in. Now you can put EltaMD clear on. Wait 15 mins before applying your makeup. Be gentler than usual when you apply your makeup so the sunscreen stays in place.*2hrs later*As you've probably read before, sunscreen needs to be reapplied throughout the day. With this sunscreen it's easy to reapply with your makeup on. When it's time to reapply I first press drops of grapeseed oil on dry patches on my skin and let that sink in. Then you apply the sunscreen with small tapping motions rather than rubbing it in to keep your makeup in place. I spritz myself with some hydration tonic by blissoma and I'm good to go!

product_name: CeraVe Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum | 1 oz | Hydrating Serum for Face with Vitamin B5 | For Normal to Dry Skin | Paraben & Fragrance Free
review: The Good: This "serum" really feels more lotion-like and could potentially be used on its own, unlike most hyluronic acid serums that are really about hydrating the skin, but need something to seal in that hydration besides it. It feels smooth on the skin and if you want to pare down the amount of products, this could potentially work.  When I realized all the ingredients in this (more down below), I switched to using this only in the morning, and right before my moisturizer and SPF, and haven't had a problem.The Bad: However, I typically like to use a separate moisturizer instead of a product like this. Dimethicone is the fourth ingredient, so there's a good amount of it in here, and as a result, if you add any other active products to your skin after this serum, it will be harder/take longer for those to penetrate the barrier you've just applied to your skin. In addition, the fifth ingredient is Alcohol Denat, aka denatured alcohol, which can damage your own skin's barrier. It's designed to allow the other ingredients in the formula to penetrate deeper. In general, I try to avoid skincare products with denatured alcohol in them. But your mileage may vary.The Bottom Line: I'm a big fan of Cerave products (their cleansers and most of their moisturizers are holy grail status for me), but this would be at the bottom of my list. I just don't think I'd get another one, so this would be a pass for me.

product_name: CeraVe Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum | 1 oz | Hydrating Serum for Face with Vitamin B5 | For Normal to Dry Skin | Paraben & Fragrance Free
review: This serum absorbs quickly into my skin, without leaving it feeling greasy. I like that it‚Äôs fragrance free and leaves my face looking and feeling smoother and more hydrated. This softens the appearance of my fine lines around my mouth and on my forehead. I use this twice a day, under my regular moisturizer.

product_name: CeraVe Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum | 1 oz | Hydrating Serum for Face with Vitamin B5 | For Normal to Dry Skin | Paraben & Fragrance Free
review: I really like this product. I wouldn‚Äôt call it a serum because it has a light-lotion consistency, but I don‚Äôt care a bit. It‚Äôs silky smooth, feels great on my skin, doesn‚Äôt irritate it and definitely moisturizes.What you see in the picture is one pump on the back of my hand, but I need two to cover my face and neck. I wish it was packaged in a tube rather than a pump because with pumps I‚Äôm never able to get all the product out and it‚Äôs more plastic than necessary going into a land-fill.

product_name: CeraVe Hyaluronic Acid Face Serum | 1 oz | Hydrating Serum for Face with Vitamin B5 | For Normal to Dry Skin | Paraben & Fragrance Free
review: I‚Äôve become a huge fan of CeraVe products over the last year.  Their face cleanser has made a huge difference on my face.  I figured this serum was worth a try.I‚Äôve tried other hyaluronic formulas before, but they never felt quite as good as this one.  I always needed to follow them up with a standard moisturizer after, despite the fact that they were supposed to be moisturizing.  I don‚Äôt have to do that here.  This is a nice rich formula!  My poor dry face feels so much better.

product_name: Mustela Skin Freshener, Freshen Skin and Style Hair, for Baby, with Natural Avocado Perseose, 6.76 Ounce
review: My baby has very curly hair so I need some type of detangler or leave in conditioner to style his hair. I‚Äôve tried many ‚Äúorganic‚Äù creams and sprays and so far this has been the best of them all. It‚Äôs really light and doesn‚Äôt leave my baby‚Äôs hair with a stick or gel like texture. Just keeps his natural soft hair texture but nicely styled (trust me when he wakes up it‚Äôs really staticky). The only reason I didn‚Äôt give 5 stars is because of its smell. It has a pleasant smell but very strong, they should cut down on the perfume for sure and/or give more of a light baby bath sort of scent.

product_name: Mustela Skin Freshener, Freshen Skin and Style Hair, for Baby, with Natural Avocado Perseose, 6.76 Ounce
review: My baby's neck is always red, which troubles me a lot. My friend introduced this style to me. I think it works very well, spray it on for a while

product_name: Mustela Skin Freshener, Freshen Skin and Style Hair, for Baby, with Natural Avocado Perseose, 6.76 Ounce
review: The liquid came out of the bottle, through the baggie it was shipped in & doused the other items that were in the same Amazon box.

product_name: Mustela Skin Freshener, Freshen Skin and Style Hair, for Baby, with Natural Avocado Perseose, 6.76 Ounce
review: Aroma muy rico y suave

product_name: Mustela Skin Freshener, Freshen Skin and Style Hair, for Baby, with Natural Avocado Perseose, 6.76 Ounce
review: This smells fresh. Not a baby powder scent. It isn‚Äôt strong. I use it to tame my sons curly hair after shower. He doesn‚Äôt seem to be bothered by the scent. Anyone who holds him, gets a whiff of his hair and ask me what‚Äôs in it. I also use it on his skin. It‚Äôs a really good price for what it‚Äôs worth. I‚Äôm def reordering this spray

product_name: Mustela Skin Freshener, Freshen Skin and Style Hair, for Baby, with Natural Avocado Perseose, 6.76 Ounce
review: Love mustela and this has a great scent. I had no problems the first time I used it on my daughter but the second time she developed a rash.

product_name: Mustela Skin Freshener, Freshen Skin and Style Hair, for Baby, with Natural Avocado Perseose, 6.76 Ounce
review: I‚Äôm in loveeeeee with this fragrance, I used this colony 8 years ago with my first baby and do not hesitate to buy it now with my second baby, the smell is magical and compared to other brands and prices has nothing to envy, the best thing is that they are products that do not alter anything in  the baby.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser Bar | 2 Pack (4.5 Ounce) | Soap-Free Body and Face Cleanser Bar | Fragrance Free and Non-Irritating
review: I don't generally write reviews, but I could not stop adding one now because j know there are a lot of ladies out there suffering from KP and fretting. I would want to thank all the ladies who took their time and cared to add their review. If not, I would not have attempted to buy Cera Ve. After a week of use, I could feel a lot of difference on my bumpy skin. Nothing had made me happier to see my skin now. Thank you, Cera Ve.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser Bar | 2 Pack (4.5 Ounce) | Soap-Free Body and Face Cleanser Bar | Fragrance Free and Non-Irritating
review: These CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser Bars are gentle and fragrance-free which makes them ideal for cleansing sensitive skin. Each bar is shorter but thicker than a regular bar of soap and they lather well and rinse cleanly, leaving no greasy residue or irritation. I find them to be as moisturizing as other soaps.  I think these soaps are comparable to Dove for Sensitive Skin. They are perfect for the whole family.

product_name: CeraVe Hydrating Cleanser Bar | 2 Pack (4.5 Ounce) | Soap-Free Body and Face Cleanser Bar | Fragrance Free and Non-Irritating
review: I purchased one bar at Walmart for a little under $5. It smells like a long time drug store but very moisturizing.I am presently using prescription strength Retin A on my face and experiencing some burning and peeling on my neck. I usually use dove sensitive but someone told me about cerave. It has helped.ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Face Moisturizer Lotion with SPF 15 Sunscreen & Alpha Hydroxy Acid, Anti Wrinkle Cream with Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Alpha Hydroxy, Vitamin C, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5, 2.5 fl.oz
review: This packaging is almost identical to another Neutrogena face cream I have been buying for years, but this product on right - see photo, is a DIfFERENT PRODUCT with an awful perfume scent. The product on the left is the one that is lovely, goes on easily, you never feel it on your skin, no scent.  Are they too cheap to bother with new packaging for a different product?  Are we supposed to read thru every label to find the difference? Returning it.

product_name: Neutrogena Healthy Skin Face Moisturizer Lotion with SPF 15 Sunscreen & Alpha Hydroxy Acid, Anti Wrinkle Cream with Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Alpha Hydroxy, Vitamin C, Vitamin E & Vitamin B5, 2.5 fl.oz
review: I first purchased this at Walgreens, and fell in love with it. product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: I bought this body wash as a last ditch effort to make my keratosis pilaris (kp) a little less noticeable. Mine is honestly the worst I‚Äôve seen in person. Severe ingrown hairs all over my body to go along with the ‚Äúgoose pimples‚Äù that all kp sufferers have. I have only used it once so far, applied using a body brush attachment on a spin brush... and wow! Gentle smell, nice lather, a d I could actually see that my skin looked calmer and less red even after using a spin brush on high speed. Actually improved the appearance of my KP in one go, which, in my 20+ years trying to manage it, is the best and quickest results I‚Äôve gotten. I will post another update as I use this wash more. The picture I‚Äôm posting is a side by side of my calf before and after using this body wash. (The scabby looking dots are from where I have semi recently removed ingrown hairs, aka goose pimples gone rogue) Hope this helps!!!! I don‚Äôt usually write reviews but KP has been wreaking havoc on my skin for so long with nothing working, except this so far!

product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: I have kp and ingrown hairs all over my legs. I literally have been struggling with this for a few years and nothing has worked until I tried this. I‚Äôve been using it at least 4 times a week on my legs for about a month and the results are insane. I‚Äôm going to make sure I never run out. This product along with tend skin have been miracle workers. I use it al over my body but my main problem area is my legs. Now they feel smoother than they ever have and even that is enough for me. It‚Äôs still a process but my legs are way better than they were. The pictures say enough. I‚Äôll continue to use it hopefully I‚Äôll have clear legs soon enough :))

product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: I suffer from keratosis pilaris on my upper arms and I decided to try this brand after reading reviews. Unfortunately, I used this shower gel and the lotion every day for almost a month and there‚Äôs been no change. It‚Äôs so embarrassing and I hate to wear tank tops or tshirts. I was so disappointed in this brand and I won‚Äôt be buying Cerave again. Don‚Äôt waste your money, it doesn‚Äôt work.

product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: The picture is just after day one, my bumps seem to have gone down, and are disappearing... so far so good.

product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: I bought for my KP and in one use it SIGNIFICANTLY made my KP less noticeable almost non existent in some parts of my legs. And this is only from one use to I can‚Äôt wait to see it go away fully with regular use. 100% recommend I use this and after use the sa cerevae cream

product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: Past year I've gotten acne on my chest. Since I was a teen I've had issues with acne in my upper back, sometimes shoulders.Used this once a day for 2 months and say a very visible difference. It helped a ton and I've tried so many things over the years.It doesnt hurt to try it, I'd be surprised if it doesn't help.

product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: After my 10th or 11th time using the bodywash and skin cream I did not notice any change in my KP. Dark dots are still present,  I'm not saying the other reviews are incorrect/wrong, but I am saying there's no change for me personally.

product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: I am in my 30‚Äôs and for the last several years I‚Äôve had ‚Äúchicken skin‚Äù on the back of my upper arms. (I know. I‚Äôm sorry. It‚Äôs gross) They‚Äôre stubborn little bumps, not pimples, that do not go away. I‚Äôve tried exfoliating, acne washes, moisturizers, etc... NOTHING worked. It‚Äôs so embarrassing, especially if someone touches my arms.Last night, I used the CeraVe body wash for rough and bumpy skin for the first time. It didn‚Äôt feel any different than my usual body washes while I was scrubbing so I really wasn‚Äôt expecting to see results - especially after one use. After showering, my skin felt soft but I could still feel the bumps. But, Oh. My. Gosh... when I checked this morning, the backs of my arms are so much smoother. It hasn‚Äôt completely taken the bumps away yet but there is a huuugely noticeable difference. I can only imagine how much of a difference I‚Äôll see in a week or two.Quick note - also, it has no smell so I was able to use my usual body wash on the rest of my body without the two smells combatting.

product_name: CeraVe Body Wash with Salicylic Acid | 10 Ounce | Fragrance Free Body Wash to Exfoliate Rough and Bumpy Skin
review: Cerave is my favorite drugstore brand for skincare. I have recently developed bumpy skin along back of my upper arms, back and chest area. It's gotten worse to where it's making me self-conscious, the number of little bumps covering those areas. Cerave is my go to drugstore brand for skincare so I decided to try this. I wasn't too impressed with the size bottle for the price but i got this for 50% off with subscribe and save to try it. If it worked then I'd gladly pay the $10 regular price in the future. It comes in a plastic bottle (as shown) with flip top cap dispenser on top. Product comes out as a clear gel and completely scent free. It lathers up so nicely. I added pictures of my loofah and back scrubber lathered up with the wash so potential buyers can see how well it does suds up. I've been using this for about 2 weeks and it is helping with my bumpy skin. There are less and more scattered than before starting this body wash. I use this specifically for my bumpy skin area and use my normal soap for rest of my body (as this is a little more costly and wasteful to use it on parts that are already smooth and bump free. That will make this bottle last longer. Idk if it is much more effective than other washes specifically designed to treat the same thing but it works. I do love that it is scent free, clear from dyes or harsh chemicals and made by a brand that knows skincare. Plus cerave products are formulated to not harm skin barrier and that's important to me. I recommend trying this if you have skin problems. Sign up for subscribe and save to get an intitial discount if promotion is still going on. If you aren't excited about the price, try a less expensive product with same active ingredients because it should work the same. You might not get the same gentle wash though. I like this product and will continue using to keep bumpy skin at bay

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Lotion with SPF 15 - Fragrance-Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 4 fl. oz Bottle
review: UPDATE: OUCH! Upon my forth time using this moisturizer, I woke up with some nasty red bumps on the sides of my face. Face is very tender and itchy. Looks like not so good for sensitive skin afterall.Prior Review: I have used this moisturizer twice (at night only) so far. It is not greasy like many other Eucerin products, which is great. It also dries a bit more matte than similar moisturizers I have used such as Burts Bees Radiance. I will update on it's anti-wrinkle performance after I use for a month. Although it says you can, I do not plan on wearing under makeup as when I did a quick test, it made my powder clump.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Lotion with SPF 15 - Fragrance-Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 4 fl. oz Bottle
review: I don't think it's a new product.

product_name: Eucerin Q10 Anti-Wrinkle Face Lotion with SPF 15 - Fragrance-Free, Moisturizes for Softer Smoother Skin - 4 fl. oz Bottle
review: I was scared to order this as some received fake products. But mine is the legit Eucerin, which contrary to the other review, is still produced with the same bottle and packaging as it has been. It says made in Mexico, but again, it‚Äôs legit Eucerin. It‚Äôs virtually fragrance free, but I have an overly keen sense of smell, so there is a very light suntan-lotiony smell‚Äîtho most won‚Äôt be able to notice it though and the lotion itself is white (see pic). I tried it on my hand and left it for several hours to be sure it was the real deal, and it is! No rash, no burning, no stinging. I‚Äôd say one can order with confidence and if it comes smelling strong or is yellow-tinted, return it because it‚Äôs a fake. I hope this helps because it‚Äôs an awesome face lotion at an excellent price (a dollar and some change cheaper than at the most popular big box store).
