product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: In two weeks of use my skin's condition has improved drastically! I have sensitive dry skin and react to E V E R Y T H I N G but this lotion has done wonders adding moisture and clearing up/brightening my complexion.Use as first step after cleansing or straight out of the shower.It's quite rich but fast absorbing and since the bottle is quite big I'm generous with my use (I even apply it to my body).Smell is a bit odd at first and hints of Sake are quite prominent BUT it fades off in a few seconds after application and I got used to it after the first day.I'm no way near to finishing it but already ordered the second bottle.Must buy!!!Note: I have a small zit not at all caused but reaction, it was caused by chocolate+period.

product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: Im 35 years old and my face hasn't look this good. No filter whatsoever. Super moisturising and gentle. It cleared my eczema prone dry skin. No alcohol. I will probably use this till my old age!

product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: This stuff is amazing! I have severely dry skin. I drink a lot of water and I pretty much bathe in lotions but no matter what I do I always feel tight, dry, and raw. I've been upgrading my skincare routine when my kids dumped out an entire brand new bottle of hydrating toner which was pretty freaking expensive. I searched hydrating toner on Amazon hoping to temporarily replace my original toner until the end of the week and found this one. First off, holy cow! I didnt realize it was such a huge bottle. It's very hydrating. With three applications I get a slight tacky/sticky feeling which I don't normally get with other hydrating toners. Of course my skin absorbs it and the feeling is gone. My skin is brighter, softer, smooth. No flaking, no cluster dry skin bumps, just beautiful smooth skin. For $15 which is a steal I am ecstatic and will definitely continue to buy.

product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: Ingredient list (although not found on bottle): Water, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Rice Ferment Filtrate (sake), Glutamic Acid, Arginine,Leucine, Ceramide 3, CERAMIDE 6 II, Placental Protein, Arbutin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Glycine soja/Soybean Protein,Maltitol,  Methyl gluceth-10, PEG-6 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Sodium styrene/acrylates copolymer, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Phenoxyethanol, Methylparaben, FragranceFor reference, I have sensitive, acne and clog prone skin. I was looking to replace my toner (thats what this is, a hydrating toner) but I was looking for something light with ceramides.This have a very runny, watery toner. The pump is handy, but it spurts out everywhere and can be a bit messy. One pump is more than enough for my face and neck. I've even started using it on my body before lotion, just because the bottle is huge!I've never smelled or drank sake, so I can't say it smells like that, but to me, it smells like silicone or rubber. Not exactly pleasent, but I don't mind. I pat this on immediately after cleansing and no matter how dry, tight, or irritated my skin feels one pump of this and my skin is soft, plump and happy. My skin is less irritated and somewhat softer after using this for a while.I've even used this right after cleansing and not used a moisturizer afterwards. I did notice my skin got a little more oily than usual after a while, but otherwise this by itself was more than enough moisture. Not to mention, for the price you can't get any better than this!Pros: HUGE BOTTLE!Makes my skin much softerAdds a lot of hydration, without cause acne or clogging my poresHelps with redness and irritation (especially when I over exfoliate)Cons: Doesn't smell the bestPump is messy

product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: Love that this is super sized! I can decant in to a smaller bottle for travel if necessary.  Product is a thin watery consistency with a slight but pleasant scent and is my first "skin" applied of a moist face.

product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: Now that I‚Äôve tried this I will never be without it. It‚Äôs more of an essence than a toner, which suits me perfectly. I apply with a cotton round immediately after washing my face am and pm, and apply HA right over it, letting it settle a bit before moving on in skin regiment. Makes my skin glowy and never looks or feel dry. I put some in a spray bottle and use it for everything: spray into my face and pat in, use to wet a makeup brush for eye makeup, and I also use it as a setting spray. My makeup stays in place all day and my face looks so hydrated and healthy. You get such a massive supply it‚Äôs something I can‚Äôt imagine doing without.

product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: Pros: sells sake-y and yummy, cute packaging, nice moisturizing tonerCons: noneMy Skin Type: combo/dryMy Age: 20-30My Environment: hot and humidShipping: primePackaging: product came wrapped in a plastic layer and the pump was locked inGenuine? (Y/N): YesDetails: A high moisture toner that is fun to apply. My skin is not sensitive so it didn't hesitate to soak this stuff up! Secure packaging is one of my favorite things in a product, and this has IT! Will be using this as part of my daily routine. (Pro Tip: this product can also be used on hair!)TL;DR~ it's cute and worth it, get it. :*

product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: UPDATE: I‚Äôve been using this for 2 months now & LOVE ‚ù§Ô∏è IT!!! My skin drinks it up & I definitely feel a difference now when I don‚Äôt use it. I wasn‚Äôt prepared to love it quite as much as I do, & really just wanted to try this prior to trying a different well known Asian Beauty toner, one that has Hyaluronic Acid, but now I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll be trying the other one. I like this one too much to be without it. And that‚Äôs huge since I always seem to be on the lookout for the next best thing. I feel like I found it in this product. And I do think it‚Äôs helping with skin brightness, although I use lots of brightening skincare products and therefore it‚Äôs difficult to know for sure which is responsible for how good it looks right now. I just know I was fighting a purge from a salicylic acid product & you can barely see I ever broke out at all. The red spots have lightened dramatically in just a month (& it was BAD).ORIGINAL REVIEW: I‚Äôve been using this for 10 days & so far I like it. I can‚Äôt say I love it, because I don‚Äôt see a huge difference yet. Truth be told, I must‚Äôve already had moisturized skin, because I haven‚Äôt even seen a change in that.However, I‚Äôm happy to not have any negative side effects either. I thought for sure I‚Äôd show signs of fungal acne, but so far I‚Äôve avoided that. I do think this is a great carrier for essential oils I recently started using on my face. Just a drop or two of tea tree oil helps acne, or a drop or two of lavender, frankincense, or Rose Otto has allowed my face to gain those added benefits. And I DO see a difference from those when mixed in with this.Also, I don‚Äôt have a problem at all with the pump mechanism. It arrived tightly wrapped so it was safe during transit. And it‚Äôs held up just fine for my use, so that‚Äôs certainly positive.I intend to continue using this for as long as I see no negative effects. But at this point, I‚Äôm not sure I‚Äôd repurchase it. I have to see if my skin becomes brighter or more supple over time before deciding.

product_name: Sake High Moisture Skin Lotion Toner By Kikumasamune for Women 16.9 Oz Lotion, 16.9 Ounce
review: Amazing!!! I already had the hada labo lotion and I wanted another hydrating product (I use both as toners before adding a cream lotion) for my skin care regimen. I ended up loving it more than the hada labo lotion! It‚Äôs a great price for what you get. The bottle is huge! In the picture you can see it‚Äôs a large bottle. There is a slight sake smell that goes away almost immediately after you put it on. I put on usually 5-7 layers since it drys fairly quick. This will definitely be a staple in my skincare regimen from now on.

It's a good texture and it sinks in well, but I think this would suit oily skin more.

review: I initially bought the moisturizing product‚Ä¶ It was recommended to me by my daughter‚Ä¶ It works very well then I saw this and thought I‚Äôd try it and I put it on my recently washed face with the other Cetaphil wash product and leave it on at night time when I sleep wake up in the morning use the Cetaphil wash and then moisturize with the Cetaphil cream so all three these products work in tandem‚Ä¶ I love them and they‚Äôre way cheaper than some of the expensive stuff that‚Äôs out there‚Ä¶ I recently had somebody/Pt asked me what do I use on my skin explain...I told her and she asked how old I was and said nearly 60 and she goes oh my god no way so yes the stuff is wonderful

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I‚Äôm not sure how I feel about this product. It‚Äôs very watery. I have to use several pumps to cover my neck and face. The pump comes out really fast and can splatter. There is no scent, so that checks out as advertised. I don‚Äôt think it caused me any worse breakouts than I already get so it does not clog pores. I think it does moisturize decently. I would wear this one at night since it has no SPF. I still plan to use it since I bought it. However, I think I will stick with Neutrogena in future purchases.

product_name: Cetaphil Daily Hydrating Lotion with Hyaluronic Acid, Basic , 3.0 Fluid Ounce
review: I use this following the Cetaphil face wash morning and night and my skin stays hydrated and looking smooth with no makeup. Lipgloss and hydrated skin is a win!

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: This product is amazing and is the first sunscreen product I‚Äôve found to not cause my rosacea skin to break out. However - something is seriously wrong with the last two bottles I have received from amazon. I saw a couple of other similar reviews. The consistency is all wrong (been using this product for several years so I can tell) AND the worst part of all is it smells strange! The replacement bottle wasn‚Äôt quite as bad smelling as the first which was unbearable but still bad enough that I want to return. Smells musty/plasticy/old if I had to try to name the smell. Consistency is kinda runny and the tint/lotion seems runny and separated.  Seems to still be protecting me from UV but putting it on is probably one of the more unpleasant parts of my day. Bummed because I‚Äôd rather use amazon - but not with these issues. Prob order from Dermstore instead.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs Amazon or the manufacturer, but I ordered 2 bottles at different times and the color was different. Texture is the same. See my picture. The lighter color is just like the original bottle I purchased from my dermatologist. The darker one, that came recently, is way too dark for me -I‚Äôm a pale redhead. I guess I need to pay the higher price at the derm‚Äôs office to be assured of an authentic product.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: My dermatologist recommended this and I couldn't love it any more!!! It has a little bit of tint that provides just the smallest amount of coverage to even out my skin tone and problem areas. It blends in so easily, I can haphazardly throw it on without worrying about streaks. This is the only thing I've been wearing most days in terms of makeup. It's honestly my new favorite product just because it makes my life easier.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I have used this Ulta MD product for over two years and have had no issues until my most recent purchase from Amazon.  The canister holding the product felt very light when it arrived compared to previous orders.  Now, 13 days later it is completely empty.  Normally, one pump canister lasts me nearly three months.  Something was not right with this particular container, how do I file a formal complaint and inquire if I can get my money back or a replacement? I can‚Äôt seem to get anyone to respond from Ulta MD or Amazon which is extremely frustrating.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I do place my higher price neck cream on first....but this tinted sunscreen moisturizer is great! It leaves a slight color on the face so I add a little blush and off I go.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I normally love this sunscreen (I've even recommended it to a lot of people), however, they changed the bottle and the pump doesn't work. I tried to return it but it was past the 30 day return date (I don't like to run out so I buy it in advance) so I guess I'm stuck with a $28 bottle of sunscreen that won't come out.  I included a pic of what I can get out with 5 pumps. Maybe it's a fake product. I don't know.  Guess I'll be looking for a new brand.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: I have been looking for pregnancy safe products as I undergo IVF and this product meets the mark. I am SO happy with it.I had to toss my foundation because it has unsafe chemicals and this is the perfect replacement. The color is enough to slightly tint your skin and give you glow,  but dont expect much in the way of coverage. If you can find a way to get used to it, this is an amazing alternative to foundation.I highly recommend this.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: This tinted sunscreen is my only make up. I use it every day and love it. I use a serum and eye cream first but this is my defense. It goes on light and is a bit wet at first but soaks in beautifully and feels great throughout the day. Highly recommend.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: Burned the skin around my eyes, and stung my eyeballs and caused them to water. Even after washing the product off my face, skin is still red and irritated.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: Love this product. I do not love this product from Amazon! The color was way too orange and burned my face and neck. I would buy elsewhere.

product_name: EltaMD UV Daily Tinted Face Moisturizer with Hyaluronic Acid for Dry Skin, Broad-Spectrum SPF 40, Fragrance-Free, Dermatologist-Recommended, 1.7 oz
review: My husband and I are both survivors of Melanoma and other skin cancers.We use this EltaMD UV every morning.

product_name: Brickell Men's Deep Moisture Body Lotion for Men, Natural and Organic Protects and Hydrates Dry Skin, 8 Ounce, Scented
review: Bought this for my husband to use. After using for a few days,  he broke out in a rash everywhere but his face. (where he didn't use this lotion) He has no allergies that we are aware of.

product_name: Brickell Men's Deep Moisture Body Lotion for Men, Natural and Organic Protects and Hydrates Dry Skin, 8 Ounce, Scented
review: I‚Äôm glad I came across this line skin product for men. It‚Äôs all natural, sophisticated and work great, I‚Äôve tried a few of their product and finally decided to get the body lotion and I was not disappointed. It smells great and it does the job. My skin never felt or looked better, and as a bonus it looks nice siting in my bathroom.

product_name: Brickell Men's Deep Moisture Body Lotion for Men, Natural and Organic Protects and Hydrates Dry Skin, 8 Ounce, Scented
review: My initial goal was to find a cleaner body moisturizer to use on the daily basis as I‚Äôm trying to escape the grasp of chemical-driven formulas. At first, I was skeptical about the investment as I have mildly sensitive skin; however, this was my first choice and I couldn‚Äôt have made a better decision. Although the unscented product has a slight scent, it‚Äôs nothing that‚Äôll turn you away from using it on the daily. I noticed a vast difference in the health of my skin after only one post-shower use. After several uses, my skin has been noticeably softer than before and stays hydrated!

product_name: Brickell Men's Deep Moisture Body Lotion for Men, Natural and Organic Protects and Hydrates Dry Skin, 8 Ounce, Scented
review: This lotion goes on thick and absorbs as you spread it onto your skin. A little goes a long way. Skin stays soft throughout the day, no need to reapply. Light fragrance that is not overpowering and does not alert the world that you just used a moisturizer. Once I tried the sample, I had to buy a bottle. Great product.

product_name: Brickell Men's Deep Moisture Body Lotion for Men, Natural and Organic Protects and Hydrates Dry Skin, 8 Ounce, Scented
review: So I like this lotion a lot I‚Äôm just confused as to why I‚Äôve gotten two completely different colored lotions lol

product_name: Brickell Men's Deep Moisture Body Lotion for Men, Natural and Organic Protects and Hydrates Dry Skin, 8 Ounce, Scented
review: I use it when going out for the night or for work which is a light lotion which I like, I only enjoy a heavier lotion for at night to moisturize while I sleep. It absorbs quickly and doesn't leave you feeling oily like other lotions can tend to leave but it all depends on the usage as well. The smell from the lotion to me is pleasant but not overdone which is also nice.The only thing at the moment is the price of the lotion for the size bottle you get is steep for the 8oz which is my only complaint.If this was a 10-16oz bottle I could see it being more reasonable.

product_name: Maui Moisture Volcanic Body Wash 19.5 Ounce Moisturizing Body Wash Formulated for Rough Dull Dry Skin Normal Skin Combination Skin, with Aloe Vera Juice and Coconut Water, Silicone Free
review: This is hands down the best body wash I have used. The scent is just addictive but it‚Äôs subtle at the same time. And the nice bubbly lather of the soap is great as well. I also like the silver like color of the soap. I do recommend this!!!

product_name: Maui Moisture Volcanic Body Wash 19.5 Ounce Moisturizing Body Wash Formulated for Rough Dull Dry Skin Normal Skin Combination Skin, with Aloe Vera Juice and Coconut Water, Silicone Free
review: This is the product is the only thing I used to wash my body and I regret it. It was all great at first and then half way through the bottle I noticed my body beginning to react badly to this product. At first I thought it was my diet, or maybe something on my clothes but anytime I've used it since I have gotten an irritated feeling all over. Definitely won't buy again

product_name: Dial Moisturizing Lotion, Skin Therapy with Himalayan Pink Minerals, 12 Ounces
review: Concerning the actual product, the lotion is fine. The scent is not overwhelming and the consistency is not that thick which makes it nice to use on the face without skin feelining heavy and clumpy, not fully setting in. It goes on smoothly and settles nicely on the skin BUT my issue is that I received a malfunctioning product. Rather, THE COMPLETE ABSCENSE OF A CRUCUIAL ITEM, THE PUMP! Somehow I was sent a version without a pump on the twist top and the top itself will not click in. I twist and twist but the top never actually closes and that is where my rating comes in. It is ONLY because the lotion is decent that my rating is neutral. Delivering such an item that is malfunctioning and missing pieces is something I feel should have been noticed immediately. How I was sent such a product is beyond me. How the pump is not even included in the bag is humerous considering the item was already in a plastic bag which I am assuming someone at least oversought.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: This product arrived in the packaging as shown in the picture. First of all, I'm surprised that there isn't a cap for this bottle or any sort of protection throughout the shipping process. More importantly, this wastes some of the product that I paid money for.As far as the product itself goes, the lotion is very good and works as advertised. This is the only reason I'm not rating Cetaphil's wash one out of five stars.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Is a super thin lotion, kind of smells funny almost like Elmer‚Äôs glue. Don‚Äôt get around eyes bc it burns. Otherwise i haven‚Äôt had many problems with the product

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: My package came with the plastic wrap cut on both sides !! I am considering this an open item!! .. I can‚Äôt trust this enough to put it on my face .. it could have been refilled!! Was waiting to try it

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: SPF 30, 4 fl oz lasts me 5/6 months, usually worn under makeup

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: It was delivered to me like this so therefore it looses a star hopefully it‚Äôs the right product and not a sack

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: It‚Äôs great item, but this is what i found when i opend the package (unfortunately) .. :(

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Good product i use it before

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Very disappointed. The cap was not in its original box or the shipping box. It's not what I paid for.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: I am acne prone so I was looking for a new moisturizer BC I was using the basic cetaphil moisturizer for my face. I bought it at Walmart for $15.00. At first it worked ok but as a few months ago my skin began to break out in these small bumps on my cheek areas which I never had, I mean thousands of them that are filled with white stuff that looks like the product. I thought it was bc I got off my birth control and was caused by some sort of hormonal balance. I went to my dermatologist and they prescribed me medication for my face. Something told me to look up reviews and there it was! Many others with the same issue! I thought this would help a person with skin issues like me! I wish I could get a refund and have them refund my copay :/They deserve no stars!!!

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Package all broken and open

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Uhhh I just received the item and it literally came like this and damaged.. I am so confused..

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: After another facial sunscreen made my face break out, I‚Äôve been on the hunt for a Non-cosmodegenic facial sunscreen. Not just ‚Äúoil free‚Äù not just ‚Äúfor acne-prone skin‚Äù I wanted it to say ‚ÄúNon-cosmodegenic‚Äù on the bottle. Well as it turns out only a handful of facial sunscreens for acne prone skin are labeled Non-cosmodegenic and most of the ones that are cost $30 and up, which just doesn‚Äôt work for me. The only other budget-friendly one was cerave and it was only SPF 15 and was the same price point as this one. So I bought this one and love it so far. It is super lightweight and rubs in completely matte (see photos). You can‚Äôt even tell you‚Äôre wearing sunscreen. I only needed about a dime size amount to cover my face and neck. So far, no breakouts! I purchased for daily use so I will update on how that goes over time.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Really Pleased with this.Wears nicely under makeup with no chalky appearance. Purchased it to go along with my morning regimen.Highly suggest it for oily skin.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: I am in disbelief as to how horrible this product has been on my skin. I have oily skin but I haven't had acne issues for years. But three days into using this cream and my face is full of breakouts and acne. I DO NOT see any matte finish, neither do I see any kind of oil control.In conclusion, if you have oily skin, don't get this product. I have used both Olay moisturizer with spf and Aveeno's moisturizer with spf - both of them worked well for me, guess I shouldn't have switched.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: came in with the expiration date and serial number scratched off so i don‚Äôt know if the serial number matches the one on the box and if the product is already expired. also it does NOT make your skin matte , it does the same thing any other face moisturizer with sunscreen would do.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: It's not the worst thing I've used and it will work for now, but it really does smell strongly like sunscreen and basically applies the same way. If you didn't know any better you'd think it was just sunscreen, not moisturizer with SPF in it. I was hoping I could use it everyday as my face moisturizer but I have to apply this, wait for it to dry, and put on another layer of normal moisturizer. I don't know if this messes the SPF up or anything but I have to do it in order to be able to apply makeup afterwards. Oh well. If it IS fine to do it that way, then I think it is fine. Just really wanted to replace my other moisturizer all together.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: I haven‚Äôt use this one. It came with damaged packaging. I am shocked that there is no seal at all. Make me feel like I bought a very cheap stuff.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: My dermatologist recommended this moisturizer because I have oily skin. This product has worked wonderfully on my face. It actually seems like my face is less oily after using this product.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: Best sunscreen I have used on my acne-prone face.  As an African American, I like that it does not leave a white film after application.  It smoothly goes on too, or should I say, into my skin.

product_name: Cetaphil Cetaphil PRO Oil Absorbing Moisturizer With Spf 30 Broad Spectrum Sunscreen, 4 Ounce
review: sold expired product

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: I‚Äôm telling you what! Another mom on facebook said something about dove baby products so i decided to give them a try. Everett has such sensitive dry skin like her dad and we‚Äôve been battling this full body eczema rash for over a month now (gave her oatmeal baths, breastmilk baths, lathered her in other lotions, coconut oil... I‚Äôve tried everything) i bathed her in this Dove sensitive baby wash then lathered her up in the lotion before bed and her rash is gone! Seriously no dry patches anywhere on her body üôåüèªüôåüèªüôåüèª and she‚Äôs super soft nearly 24 hours after application

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: Finally! A lotion that works for my baby. I tried baby eucerin, aveno baby, cetaphil baby oil, coconut oil, musela, cerave, and more!!!This lotion is not too thick but not too thin which is great. My daughter is very senative and this lotion seems to finally be soothing her eczema skin!!

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: This lotion is great - we've used it for our 3 year old daughter over the past year.  After her bath time, we use this lotion for her since she has sensitive skin.  After using this lotion for some time, her skin is always so soft and she smells like a little flower, even through the next day.  The scent is subtle and isn't overpowering, which is a huge plus when you have a sensitive baby.  We will continue to use this lotion - it's proven to be a great addition after a soothing bath.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: I haven‚Äôt removed the seal on the bottle, and there is no leakage, but the bottle is only 3/4 full at best. Not very pleased but I guess it is what it is. Will try the lotion and see if it worth the price tag.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: One bottle came in a little damage from im assuming shipping but it was wrapped good with paper in box i love it perfect sizes

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: I love Dove products. So this is perfect for my baby. Before I was using Other brand but my baby skin was getting dry. But after using Dove i am happy

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: The bottle arrived broken.  There is no pump on the bottle, and clearly there needs to be a quality control check before the items go out.  Yes I checked the box thoroughly, it did not break en route.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: Product is great but I did not order a lotion. I received a lotion instead if body wash.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: As you can see in photo that the bottle is only a little over half full yet the top is sealed. False advertising as there is only half the amount in the bottle. I am asking for a refund.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: This baby lotion works well and is made by a brand I trust and use in myself (I have been using dove bar soap on my face and body since I was a teenager). This lotions lives up to the great Dove name.  I like that it is fragrance free, pH neutral and hypoallergenic.  It does not irritate my 7 month olds sensitive skin, it goes on easy and absorbs quickly without any greasy feel.  I feel like it keeps my baby's skin moisturized well.  I like to use if after my baby's bath.  The bottle is nice, it sits up in its own and has a flip top that is easy to own.  Bye bye dry skin, hello soft baby skin.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: I hate the fact that this doesn't  have an once of smell.  But its a good buy for someone  with sensitive  skin.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: New bottle, came today and there only seems to be 3/4 in it, If that.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: Love this lotion. Sensitive skin this a go to lotion. Absolutely find its affordable. Would say glad I've found this plus many more of the Dove products.

product_name: Baby Dove Face and Body Lotion Rich Moisture 20 oz
review: Please Note: This is Fragrance Free  When you think of baby lotion, many of us have those fond memories of that fresh smellling lotion. Many of our little ones need the lotion, but have sensitive skin. This is perfect for us. A little goes a long way though. Be careful when you take that first squeeze! I ended up with enough for two arms and a leg! As for the fragrance free - yes, I miss it, but I am grateful there are sensitive skin lotions to use now.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: A heads up: The tube of product that I received must have undergone a re-design. The box notes "new" and the tube does *not* look the same as the one shown in the product photo. The part about "3 essential.... B5" is not on my tube. It is on the box the tube comes in. I have emailed Cerave and am waiting for an answer as to if there is any difference in formulation, but I don't believe there is. I thought I had gotten the wrong product until I check around online.I have combo skin: lightly oily in t-zone but dry everywhere else on the face - which is why I needed this.My skin is sensitive to anything harsh and it has not reacted badly to this.I would suggest doing a spot test by applying to a small area for a week or two before using all over.  I also suggest making sure to wear a good sunscreen while using this and going out into the daylight.I like the applicator tip because it allows me to dispense the product in small increments.The way I use this is to moisten my face so that it's a bit damp & then applying this by patting small dots of it around the dry areas of my face. I let this dry and then I apply my regular moisturizer.Someone once suggested to always apply face serums & moisturizers in the order of thinnest  to thickest.I also find that using my fingers to apply by lightly pat or tap the face treatments help them absorb better. That's just something that works for me.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: I used this a few times, maybe twice and the metal top began to rust and discolor the serum.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: I use it at morning following with a spf 50 sunscreen. At night, I use retinol. This combination can contribute to anti- aging, and anti- oxident. Also very gentle product with a non-greasy formula. Good quality with affordable price. Really love Cerave brand.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: The serum itself is ok, non-irritating, although it turns parts of my face a bit orange...for some reason. I used it every two days for a week and saw no particular difference. Nevertheless, the packaging itself leaks for some reason, which is bad for a vit c serum as it shouldn‚Äôt be exposed to light and air.Although it may just be just my tube.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: I bought this product hoping to even out my skin tone. I had some mild acne scars and sun spots. As you can see  from my before and after photos, after two weeks of use it has dramatically lightened my dark spots. I couldn‚Äôt be happier with this product. I recommend it to everyone.I‚Äôm someone who has facial psoriasis/eczema and I‚Äôm always wary about adding anything new to my facial routine. But I took a leap of faith considering CeraVe is so gentle on the skin. I‚Äôm so glad I did. I‚Äôll be buying this for the rest of time. HIGHLY recommend.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: It's too late to return this product since it's been over a month that purchased through Amazon.  But I can't use it anymore.. I don't understand why it's turning red on the outside of the applicator.  From first using the product it the serum was a white color and not it turned a yellow orange color. For this reason I've stopped using it.  I'm disapointed because I like most  of the CeraVe product.  I wish I could get my money back.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: Cerave is one of the VC products affordable to me as I am a graduate student living paycheck by paycheck. I bought it a month ago. It is not harmful to me and also improves my skin.First of all, it does not cause any side reaction on my face (I did do a patch test before applying to the whole face though). I guess 10% is on the lower end. I use my fingertips to massage it on my face. It absorbs really fast and also moisturizes my skin.I also noticed my skin tone become a bit more even, not very much though. My skin is still yellow, which becomes brighter and firmer. Especially the T zone is less oily.Well I don‚Äôt know if it is really the vitamin c in it or the hydronic acid that is working. But it is at least not harmful.That said, I do have one complaint.I really like the airtight tube and the cream inside it has not discolored so far. But the serum does change a little once you squeeze it out. You can see from my pic that the edge of the cream becomes orange, different from the original white to yellow, indicating the oxidation of vitamin C (it is within half a minute after I pump it out). It is even more so if my palm is wet.  I know vitamin c is very reductive, which is exactly the reason it can be an anti-oxidant. But I did not know it gets oxidized so easily.  Even though the part oxidized is small and I don‚Äôt know about other brands, I still hope this formula may be improved.Overall,  I will make a second purchase to see the effect in the long run and will definitely keep vitamin c in my skincare routine.

product_name: CeraVe Vitamin C Serum with Hyaluronic Acid | Skin Brightening Serum for Face with 10% Pure Vitamin C | Fragrance Free | 1 Fl. Oz
review: Vitamin C applications to the skin are becoming more popular. I have tried several. The antioxidant properties of vitamin C help fight free radicals and damage caused by UV radiation. The result is anti-aging action for younger-looking skin!" CeraVe Vitamin C Serum goes on smoothly. It is non-greasy and fragrance free. It does leave my skin feeling smooth.

review: This is definitely a knock off. The bottle has slight differences to the one I bought in store but I figured I‚Äôd try it anyway. The consistency is oilier than the real one. review: Okay no joke guys!! I almost never write reviews unless I absolutely hate it or love it and thankfully... I LOVE IT. Look at my skin!! I‚Äôve been dealing with hormonal acne (or what I thought it was) for 10 months and now a week later after switching from CeraVe foaming face wash to this product, my skin is healing! I haven‚Äôt had a breakout this entire time... that‚Äôs crazy. Plus, it smells friggen amazing and it‚Äôs semi moisturizing, I find my face kinda tight afterwards but I just end up putting Biatmin C moisturizer on. If you‚Äôre struggling like I was, give it a shot! Nothing to lose :)

review: My absolute favorite moisturizer, great for sensitive skin. A little goes a long way though so don't over pump, it's better to need to get more than to have way too much on your hand or face. Good for around the house or a quick run to the store or something.Box was alittle dinged but bottle is fine and that's what matters. üòä

review: Wonderful grapefruit smell n feels light on the skin. Not at all sticky. I like switching up acne lotions cuz if I stick w one for too long, it stops being effective. So I rotate acne lotions every few weeks.

product_name: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 45, for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 3 oz
review: I bought this after a fairly satisfactory experience with the elta MD Clear UV SPF 46 for sensitive skin. I purchased this one because the other has gone significantly higher in price, and thought that since they are both EltaMD line, it couldn't be too bad.Overall, as a sunscreen, it does its job. Now if you're think about getting this, please read that line carefully "For Oily to Normal skin." This means it is NOT at all suitable for dry skin. I have dry and sensitive skin, even though I don't get reaction from the sunscreen, it's very very flaky on the skin. And this is AFTER applying lotion AND argan oil as a base.The picture quality is not very high but around the mouth area, you can see the white flakes. And yes, it has a rather strong white cast, but is not staining or anything.So overall, I would recommend it if you are short on budget with other EltaMD products or you do have oily skin.

product_name: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 45, for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 3 oz
review: My favorite sunscreen. It is the only sunscreen that dries matte and doesn‚Äôt leave me feeling like a greaseball. However, be prepared to receive your product smashed since its bit packaged very well.

product_name: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 45, for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 3 oz
review: I can‚Äôt believe that this happened. I bought this couple months ago, and finally I opened the box to take a look how much it‚Äôs inside. So I put it next to my table lamp, and it‚Äôs only half of the package. I don‚Äôt know why this happened, but it‚Äôs ridiculous that I paid the regular price and get only half of the product. You guys can see that the seal it‚Äôs still on it. THAT‚ÄôS CHEATING ON CUSTOMERS.

product_name: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 45, for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 3 oz
review: I‚Äôve been using it for a couple of weeks now. Too early to say much about it but I felt a bit of change on my skin. Definitely has helped with how my skin feels, I live in a sunny place so sunscreen is a must. Nothing bad about so far. Definitely will be purchasing another one.

product_name: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 45, for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 3 oz
review: I have heard great things about the EltaMD line and was disappointed to learn that this sunscreen had citric acid (AHA). It was advertised as sensitive enough to be used in conjunction with photosensitizing medications which implies medication like Tretinoin and Benzol Peroxide. An AHA in a sunscreen described as being safe for  photosensitive skin is counter productive and can lead to allergic contact dermatitis (which I did get).

product_name: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 45, for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 3 oz
review: The sunscreen itself is perfectly good, but I bought SPF 45 and they shipped me SPF 30..that‚Äôs the only thing I‚Äôm complaining.

product_name: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 45, for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 3 oz
review: I bought this SPF for my daughter she is a teenager oily pro/acne skin and she love it me too I used sometimes it's light. I can used with all kind of makeup!!

product_name: EltaMD UV Shield Full-Body Sunscreen Broad-Spectrum SPF 45, for Oily or Acne-Prone Skin, Dermatologist-Recommended Mineral-Based Zinc Oxide Formula, 3 oz
review: Arrived perfectly, very light, goes on smoothly without being too thick, no color and is unscented.My dermatologist recommended and so far I am very happy.

product_name: Stretch Patch Cellulite+ for Normal Skin Lotion Infused Hot Patch for Cellulite 6 Sheets per Pack
review: I was skeptical because I tried so many cellulite products after my weight loss. It came in a resealable pack and I was quite surprised how large the mask is. I applied it to my backside and wear yoga pants over it and it stayed in place all day long.It is very hot, so it will take some time to get used to it, but...I've seen a difference after the first day, which is pretty amazing. I tried some of their other products as well the stronger formula, I strongly recommend it.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Fragrance-free Hydrating Body Gel Cream, 16 Ounce
review: I have extremely dry skin and I have to put lotion on every day to avoid pure misery. But I hate a greasy feel. This stuff makes my skin feel better than lotion, and really plumps it in a way that lotion doesn't. The  only thing I dislike about this product is that it‚Äôs hard to get it all out. See photos. The only way I could get the last amount out was to cut the container in half and scrape it out. I got more than 4 oz out from 2 bottles that totaled 32 oz. to me, this is too much waste and too much hassle and/or risk to get it all out.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Fragrance-free Hydrating Body Gel Cream, 16 Ounce
review: This is the only lotion I now use. It feels like water on my skin. I swim a lot and immediately after showering off the chlorine, I apply the lotion. My skin feels really smith and moisterized.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Fragrance-free Hydrating Body Gel Cream, 16 Ounce
review: The Neutrogena Hydro Boost Body Gel Cream has the perfect balance of lightweight texture and intense hydration that I like; the formula is quite basic, with hyaluronic acid too low on the ingredient list, but it's still a great body moisturizer.The cream has a gel lightweight texture, easily absorbed into the skin, surprisingly softening and smoothing. I can get dressed almost immediately. There's a slight silicony finish (giving the smoothing effect), like a slip, but nothing greasy.I have very dry skin, with dermatisis like patches sometimes, but I also have keratosis pilaris on my arms, chest and back. This body gel is moisturizing enough for me, without causing me any breakouts. I don't think it would be emollient enough for severely dry skin, but it's a formula I think most other skin types would benefit.I avoid fragrance in skin care; it's both because fragrance is an irritant, and because I don't like to smell like the products I use (I'll apply perfume if I really want to smell like something). So I'm really glad Neutrogena offers a `fragrance free` version of this.The packaging is very practical, the bottle comes with a pump that dispenses the right amount each time once you learn how much each body part needs.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Fragrance-free Hydrating Body Gel Cream, 16 Ounce
review: Super happy with this product! I hate lotions that feel sticky, heavy, or are too thick to fully sink in. This lotion is the complete opposite! Lightweight & melts into your skin right away. I don‚Äôt notice any fragrance. Perfect for summer but I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll continue to use it in winter & fall as well.

product_name: Neutrogena Hydro Boost Fragrance-free Hydrating Body Gel Cream, 16 Ounce
review: I love this lotion! Affordable and skin quenching. I've been draining the bottle!

review: I just received the 6 pack of Solimo Diabetic skin cream, it‚Äôs a little thick for the pump that comes on the bottle, but finally got the lotion to come out.  I am hoping it does a great job like Gold Bond.  Will give another review after using for a week or two.  Thanks for the great delivery service

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Diabetics' Skin Moisturizing Lotion, Fragrance Free, 13 Ounce (Pack of 6)
review: The lotion package arrived in what seemed like perfect shape and it the bottle did not appear to be damaged by shipping. I just decided to use the lotion last night and after a few pumps without any real force the spout broke right off. Picture attached. Now I have doubts that the bottle came broken from the factory and the spout was basically sitting in place. Unfortunately, this means I have to discard the entire bottle as I am not going to risk the contents being contaminated. Luckily it's not much of a monetary loss. I feel it is important to write this review so the manufacturer can look for any product defect in the bottle itself. I'd like to add that the lotion itself was as described, non-greasy and fragrance free. It does absorb easily into the skin. I would have been happy with the purchase had it not been for the defect in the plastic.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Diabetics' Skin Moisturizing Lotion, Fragrance Free, 13 Ounce (Pack of 6)
review: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this lotion! I would give it more stars if I could. First of all, I‚Äôm not diabetic.. so you‚Äôre wondering why I purchased this lotion? Because I was told by my niece who is a RN that the best moisturizing lotion you can buy for dry skin is a diabetic lotion. Boy she wasn‚Äôt kidding. I have several different lotions on my night stand and not one of them feel as nice as this one..  it truly is very moisturizing. It‚Äôs a thicker lotion, but not heavy and glides beautiful on the skin and absorbs right away. There‚Äôs no greasy residue what so ever. It‚Äôs also fragrance free.  I can honestly say my skin felt awesome all day. I have severely dry skin and I have eczema. This lotion takes care of both. I can‚Äôt say enough good things about this lotion. I‚Äôd HIGHLY recommend!!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Diabetics' Skin Moisturizing Lotion, Fragrance Free, 13 Ounce (Pack of 6)
review: Not just for diabetics! Anyone with very dry skin will appreciate the Solimo Duabetics‚Äô Skin Moistuirizing Lotion!  It comes to you in a very handy convenient pump bottle.  The ‚Äúbest used by date‚Äù is a year and a half away!  Plenty of time to enjoy this size bottle.Each and every Winter, my husband suffers from dry skin. He is not a diabetic, but Winter is harsh on his skin. He often refers to this as his ‚ÄúWinter Itch‚Äù.  He has used another leading brand for the last couple years and he was more than surprised that this worked just as well - if not better!The Solimo brand skin moisturizer has a light fragrance andIs not heavy or greasy. I use it on my hands to help protect them fromevil pots and pans I have to wash. Let‚Äôs face it, there are many elements that candry out our skin. Do everything you can to protectIt.This product is also helpful for the elderly. Their skin begins to loose elasticity and keeping it moisturized certainly helps. I will be purchasing this for my mom to use on her hands and arms.Absolutely nothing to dislike. I have been swayed by many Solimo brand products. I have made the switchfrom other leading brands because I have seen that many have identical ingredients and a better value.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Diabetics' Skin Moisturizing Lotion, Fragrance Free, 13 Ounce (Pack of 6)
review: The Good:-Moisturizes well-Scent is clean-Great value-Not greasyThe Bad:-The pimp needs to be primed a lot before it worksThe Bottom Line:I really like this lotion for its moisturizing capability and non greasy feel. The smell is clean. My mother in law has diabetes and she really likes it. The bottle is a large bottle for a great price. Overall I would recommend.*If you found my review helpful, please let Amazon know by clicking the helpful button below!**Disclosure: I received a sample product from the Amazon Vine program for an honest and unbiased review.
