review: This lotion has the softest vanilla fragrance it is just the right consistency, I love it so far!

product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
review: The Cancun Collection Kale Firm & Smooth body lotion leaves my skin soft and silky. It is a light moisturizer, so does not feel thick or sticky after applying. It is made with natural ingredients, and has a very nice vanilla scent that lasts. Overall, a good quality moisturizer that I have been using daily.

product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
review: Unfortunately, I just can‚Äôt get past the smell of this in order to keep using. It‚Äôs not a disgusting smell, just more of natural scent that‚Äôs off-putting. Also, the bottle is kind of deceiving- you think it‚Äôs an oval type bottle, but it‚Äôs flat and there‚Äôs not a lot in there.

product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
review: Good results for all day.  I can use it in the winter/coll dry weather and still be comfortable without the excess of a butter cream.  The scent is tropical, but very little and I like it that way.

product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
review: Applied the lotion around eleven this morning and the scent is still radiating from me at ten this evening. My skin also still feels hydrated and soft. Very long lasting lotion. Four Stars ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è!!!

product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
review: It smells like perfume. I haven‚Äôt noticed a huge difference with my skin yet but I only have been  using it a few days. The lotion isn‚Äôt thick but lightweight and smells so good!

product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
review: Yes, the bottle shape should not matter but there is something viscerally appealing about the thin oval shape--and the contents are also special. This 6.8 ounce bottle of body lotion is paraben, silicon, sulfate and phthalates-free and is hydrating. It contains sweet almond oil, vitamin E and kale‚Äîsomething I am unfamiliar with as a personal care product component but I‚Äôd prefer its inclusion over chemicals.The lotion is absorbed within a few minutes and is highly fragranced with a blend vanilla, coconut and a perfume component. Subjectively I think the scent smells great which is good because the lotion is heavily scented and it takes a long time to dissipate. The bottle has an inner foil seal to ensure it is fresh and untouched. Cruelty-free‚Äîexcellent.

product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
review: Kale is superfood and packed with tons of benefits, I eat it at least few times a week and omg!!! Now I can have kale in my body lotion!? This is absolutely great! It‚Äôs fast absorbing, non greasy, skin is silky smooth after use and smells like marzipan! I‚Äôm very much so impressed with this body lotion and it‚Äôs stands out among the competition. Kale in a lotion, unbelievably fantastic idea!

product_name: Kale Firm & Smooth Body Lotion - Superfood Infused Firming Body Lotion with Kale. 6.8 fl.oz, Anti-Aging Moisturizing Lotion For All Skin Types
review: Omg this is the BEST smelling lotion ever!! Totally smells just like Victoria's Secret Dream Angels Heavenly!!! Bottle is unique looking. Moisturizes well and did I mention it smells GREAT???!!

product_name: Olay Quench Shimmer Body Lotion, 20.2 fl oz (Pack of 2) Packaging May Vary
review: Great price but both pumps aren‚Äôt pumping. Returning for a refund. Thank you

product_name: Olay Quench Shimmer Body Lotion, 20.2 fl oz (Pack of 2) Packaging May Vary
review: Smells very clean and fresh. Gives skin a nice shine. Very light shimmer.Picture was taken with flash.

product_name: Olay Quench Shimmer Body Lotion, 20.2 fl oz (Pack of 2) Packaging May Vary
review: Opened up the boxLotion everywhere..yes it easily comes off when you wipe off (that product is lost).Both bottles were not closed.Hard to see in the picture

product_name: Olay Quench Shimmer Body Lotion, 20.2 fl oz (Pack of 2) Packaging May Vary
review: Arrived earlier than I expected... packaging was perfect.. I love the lotion.. sweet fregance.. have been using this for a while this my 4 bottle.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: I barely write reviews for products that buy but I had to on this one. I purchased CeraVe Itch Relief Moisturizing Lotion and received it yesterday. Last night after my shower, I used the lotion on areas where I experienced itchiness and dryness after shower. After I went to sleep, in the middle of the night, 5 hours after putting the lotion on my body, I started to feel excruciating itchiness and bumps all over my body. I couldn‚Äôt stop scratching it. It became so unbareable that I woke up knowing something was wrong. It was the lotion that I used. I quickly washed it off and my body was red and had bumps. Never buying this product again

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: The delivery come in bag instead of small box so it‚Äôs make it easy to damage

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: I was excited to try this because I love Cerave products. A new medication I‚Äôm taking is causing increased itchiness and this seemed like a good lotion to try. Unfortunately it caused an allergic reaction on some areas it was used, but not all. It became very red and itchy so this won‚Äôt work for everyone. I‚Äôll stick with the Cerave moisturizing products in the blue containers as those have worked well for me.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: The itch that sometimes persists after a bout of shingles is called "postherpetic neuralgia", but I call it the itch from hell.  I came down with a severe case two years ago on the upper left side of my face and scalp, and I have a persistent itch partially relieved by large doses of gabapentin, but when that's not enough, I apply either the lotion during the day, or the cream, which seems to last longer at night.  According to my dermatologist, Pramoxine is non-sensitizing as Lidocaine can be; so now I can still get numbed on my next drilling date with the dentistThe photo is from day 5 of shingles.  It looked much worse a week later; photo too gross to post here.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: My wife sometimes have an itchy legs especially after shaving her legs, we are not sure what causes it. I found this lotion that can really moisturize the skin and also get rid the itchiness. I bought this for her, she tried it right after she shaved her legs and it didn't itch anymore. It is amazing how it works fast too! I have an allergy to cats and dogs, we do have one cat, one time he just scratch me on my hand and then I feel an itch from it. So, I put a bit of lotion at the part of my hand that was scratched, it did easily get rid of the itchiness after few minutes.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: I was looking forward to receiving this amazing moisturizer today as I'd run out of my last bottle and couldn't find more on store shelves. It arrived on time, bottle broken, lotion all over. Returning the mess that I received in hopes of better luck tomorrow.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: A couple of itchy patches periodically flare up now and then and this lotion effectively soothes and hydrates. It is also effective on the center of the back which during the winter seems to get particularly dry and itchy in the dry cold winter months.The lotion is rich but not heavy and it is quickly absorbed without leaving a greasy or sticky feel. Although there is no added fragrance a light chemical scent exists which is created from the components used in the formula which dissipates within 10 minutes or so.The manual pump dispenser can be partially pressed to release a small amount so it can be used as needed without product waste. Turn clockwise to unlock the nozzle and counter clockwise to lock. And, to estimate shelf-life the expiration date is 21 months in the future, but dates will vary.  An excellent product.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Lotion for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Lotion with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: A new & improved Cerave. We used Cerave in the past, especially when some of my kids had eczema as babies. I appreciated the no scent and moisturizing functions it gave our skin. This one has an added benefit that it contains pramoxine, which provides a numbing effect to itchy and painful skin. It almost acts like hydrocortisone but without any steroids. Which is such an improvement to over-the-counter anti-itch remedies. Plus this lotion is also moisturizes dry skin. Which is very welcome right now in our wintry dry weather here in Texas. I'm grateful that this has a stopper at the neck of its pump (see pic 01). Such a great solution for preventing a mess from accidental pushing of the pump.Exceedingly recommended.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: Normally love CeraVe products, and maybe the other products in the line are good retinoids, but the sunscreen (mineral and chemical) based cause this to be really hard to blend into skin and comes off sometimes looking like dandruff! Other comments have said similar things, so I don't think it's something I'm doing incorrectly. Definitely don't use if you have facial hair. I'll go back to hado labo for sure. Might use the night cream for the evening though

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: Don‚Äôt buy ..I purchased this cream I only used 3time and it was gone! They probably sent me a bottle that was returned by another costumer ..I wasted my money

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: I used it 3 times and had the same issue with the pump that others have described. The neck of the pump is not connected with the tube inside so the product can not come up. I love other CeraVe products but I could not use this one because of the packaging.I contacted Amazon and they issued a refund with no problem.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: CeraVe Skin Renewing day cream is a nice, easy to apply face cream that also includes sunscreen rated SPF 30. Even if you dare to worship the sun, you still need to protect your skin from the damaging rays and this will help with your face and moisturize your face all at one time. The bottle is nice looking, not just a tube you squeeze stuff from. It glides on your skin and hours later, you can still feel it protecting your skin and moisturizing. It is almost like a barrier on my face. It doesn't feel greasy but you can feel it on your face. I like that it is non-irritating for sensitive skin which I have. This cream has ceramides, which is all the rage today. I always use products on my face and this may end up being my go to skin care product for daytime.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: I was really looking forward to this product because of anti wrinkle, retinol, and SPF. I typically have combination/oily skin. 1. This product left my skin feeling super dry. 2. It leaves a horrible white, flaky residue on your face!!! WTH.  Very disappointed. Will not buy again

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: Awesome product. Horrible pump. See pictures... not sure if maybe mine is defective but there is no way to get the cream out of the container. The pump does nothing. I have a full container and have to smash it on my hand to get the cream out and it‚Äôs so thick it barely moves.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: I am a huge CeraVe fan.  I have been using their products for quite awhile.  Last fall I purchased two other CeraVe face creams, one with hydrolic acid and Vitamin C serum.  I should have stuck with those.  I needed a good day cream with Retinol.  If you look at the product (see pictures) you can see it is super thick.  Hard to spread evenly over your face.  Next, after it drys it looks like your skin is flaking or peeling.  I have to wipe it all off in order to put on my makeup.  What is the point in using this when I want a moisterizer to use under my makeup.  I think the only time I will really use this now is at nightime.  Would not recommend for a day cream.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: Open opening this product, I found I wasn't able to get any of the lotion to come out of the pump.  Taking off the top didn't help either.  The lotion is thick/creamy and doesn't flow out of the hard container.  Banging it on the counter yielded very small amounts to come out.  Poor product design, and complete inability to actually use product warrants a single star.  I will contact them and hope for a return.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: The CeraVe came without the tube that attaches to the pumper.  Therefore, I am unable to dispense the product.  I thought it may have come off and was down in the bottle.  It was not.  Please advise.......return product or send me the tube.

product_name: CeraVe Anti Aging Face Cream with SPF | 1.76 Ounce | Anti Wrinkle Retinol Cream and Face Sunscreen | Packaging May Vary
review: I am a big fan of CeraVe and have been for several years now. I hate to say I didn‚Äôt love this product. To be fair, I have never found a face lotion with sunscreen that I have liked. This one can just be added to the list. I feel like these products end up being more sunscreen than lotion and I am not getting any moisturizing benefit from them.  This lotion did not leave my skin shiny, I really like the pump, but overall it left my skin feeling dry.I have combination oily/flaky skin that is prone to breakouts. I need something that moisturizes well so that my skin doesn‚Äôt produce as much oil to clog my pores. So these fairly dry sunscreen products don‚Äôt tend to work well for me. I use¬†CeraVe Moisturizing Facial Lotion PM, 3 Ounce¬†day and night and have had better results with that. Obviously I am missing out on the sunscreen benefits, but a girl can only do so much!I attached a picture of the back of the box for anyone looking for inactive ingredients.

product_name: Lubriderm Daily Moisture Lotion for Dry Skin, Enriched with Nourishing Shea Butter, Vitamin B5, and Calming Lavender Jasmine, Non-Greasy 16 fl. oz (Pack of 3)
review: SCENT IS GREAT

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I‚Äôm a busy fair skinned lifeguard, so my job has exposed me to a fair amount of different types of SPFs. Asian sunscreens, expensive sunscreen, all kinds of chemical and mineral sunscreens you name it, but nothing has ever beat this stuff. After an 8hr shift, I still look the same as I did before it.The finish is matte, not sticky, so my hair doesn‚Äôt stick to my face when the wind blows. It also doesn‚Äôt smell too strong or transfer onto anything. It holds up really well against sweat and doesn‚Äôt break down in the light so it lasts so much longer. In the winter, it‚Äôs thick enough to protect me from wind burn without being uncomfortable. My skin is dry, and my eyes sensitive, but this sunscreen doesn't give me any trouble.When it‚Äôs hot and I‚Äôm sweating a lot, I‚Äôll re-apply about every hour, but regular conditions, I can get away with touching up every two to three. The two sun screens I always wear at work are ‚Äúthis‚Äù for my face, neck, and upper body, and the beach defense SPF 70 for my legs. I find that these two have the same strength but each have a different finish on the skin.Here‚Äôs a picture of me a few years ago on July 18th to show you how well this works for me! Keep in mind that my genetics play apart in this as well:)

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I spent a total of 90 min outside after applying this product. As you can see from the picture it did not protect me from the sun.  Previous years I have used Neutrogena age shield for faces with awesome results.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I absolutely love this product so I decided to order it to bring my total up to get free shipping. I was finishing an old bottle so I let my new one sit on my dresser for a week. As soon as I tried to uses it, it had a yellow liquid with black speck come out. The expiration is 2020/08. This is not the same quality product as in stores.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Was out on the river for 12 hours. Reapplied 9 times. Was still very burnt. Also wore a wide brimmed hat.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Micro mini but I guess it serves its purpose.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: Didn‚Äôt worked so well on my dad‚Äôs dark skin...

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I have ordered two ,but just received one. Please check it and deliever one for me as soon as possible. Thanks!

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I have sensitive skin and felt I needed to review this product, which caused a severe rash on my neck and face that lasted 5 days. Not worth it.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: It took me a few times to figure out what was happening, but I realized after i last went to the pool and used this sunblock, that it gives me massive dry, red, and painful patches on my face, mostly around my mouth and on my chin and makes me look like I have a bright red goatee. It happened right before I had my license renewed last time, so I have this lovely picture of me with a bright red circle with open scabs around my mouth for the next ten years until time to renew again. I have used various sunblocks before, and have never had this problem with anything other than Neutrogena. Their facewashes do similar things, but not nearly as bad, and i have never in my life had problems with sensitive skin. But this stuff is just so harsh. It is terrible.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I LOVED THIS SUNSCREEN...but...I had an allergic reaction to it. I put it on my face and neck in the morning and after sweating (where it did run into my eyes) my neck broke out in a rash and the skin around my eyes started to itch. I was so excited to use it and the feel of it felt great when applying it. But unfortunately my somewhat sensitive skin didn‚Äôt agree.

product_name: Neutrogena Sport Face Oil-Free Lotion Sunscreen with Broad Spectrum SPF 70+, Sweatproof & Waterproof Active Sunscreen, 2.5 fl. oz
review: I love this stuff and it works great but one of mine exploded in the box during shipping.  Maybe try not to put heavy items of top of these tubes when packing.

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: This isn't fragrance free ultra calming facial moisturizer I ordered. It smells really strong so I'm unable to use. I will leave at work for others to use and find someplace else to get what I need . So frustrated. I love the fragrance free facial moisturizer. Wish I would have received what I ordered.

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: Product arrived open with cap missing. I'm not putting something on my face that's been opened. Returning for refund. Dissappointed.

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: I tested on my arms, and I have severe rashes. It's not for the sensitive skin.

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: I've dealt with acne my entire life. I'm 31 now and it was getting frustrating. I started using a bar of sulphur soap based on a friend's recommendation and then decided to try it this lotion too, during the day. I wasn't even looking to clear my skin, just keep it moisturized. I was using regular Aveeno lotion at night. When I ran out of that, I started using just this, both day and night. After a couple of months, I noticed that my skin was consistently clear! I think this lotion is what I have to thank for that. I get a couple of zits around my period still but that's all! It's even cleared up some acne scarring I've had.As someone who has been tried all kinds of expensive prescriptions, creams, and regimens with little success over the past 20 years, I am pleasantly surprised to find the answer in an affordable product that's easy to purchase and makes my skin feel great. I recommend you try it, really try it until you use a whole bottle, and see what it does for you What do you have to lose?Added some before/after pics. It was hard to find a picture of my skin looking bad because I'd avoided taking pictures. No longer the case :)

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: I used a Aveeno products for YEARS. Back in the day I used to use the SPF 30 version. They discontinued that, so I bought this one at Target. I put on the product before bed and woke up the next morning with raised abrasions and my face stinging and itching like crazy! This is NOT for sensitive skin! Do not use it. Now I know it‚Äôs this for sure because I was struggling with a reaction like this on and off for 2 months. (Thought it was something else causing the reaction.) didn‚Äôt use for a couple weeks and put it on last night cause my face was dry.. boom. It‚Äôs been this all along! It takes about a week for my face to calm down and it literally burns, itches and flakes! Went right into the trash. Never again. This is NOT good for you. I repeat! NOT GOOD FOR YOU!

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: This product says ultra-calming. But I found it was the opposite for my skin. It caused redness on the sides of my mouth and around my nose. It made my skin burn and left red marks for a few days.  Do not recommend.

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: I am using this in combination with the ultra calming foaming face cleanser and I love them both.  It seems to be helping with my dry /sensitive skin.

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: This leaves a nice light feeling to your skin and has a light scent to it but I put it on several times and my skin still felt tight and dry no matter how much I used. I recommend Aveeno Smart Essentials for sensitive skin on the dryer side.

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: Box was opened

product_name: Aveeno Ultra-Calming Fragrance-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Sensitive, Dry Skin with SPF 15 Sunscreen, Calming Feverfew & Nourishing Oat, 4 fl. oz
review: I have suffered from eczema and sensitive skin for more than 19 years. I decided to try this moisturizer because it was cheap and I wanted to get rid of the flakiness on my face, but as soon as I put it on patches of painful dry, red spots appeared on my cheeks, chin, and neck. My face feels 10x more worse than before!! Although I have sensitive skin I've never had a bad allergic reaction like this before. I would rather go back to my old $47 moisturizer than ever touch this again!

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Daily Moisturizing Oatmeal Lotion, Fragrance Free, 18 Fluid Ounce
review: This really is a cheaper generic replacement for Aveeno daily moisturizing lotion.  It pretty much is the same stuff. Works fairly well for moisturizing my skin. It Absorbs quickly. Has a little bit of oil feeling but not bad at all.  Has very little scent to it. Very neutral. The one big disadvantage I do not like about this lotion is it does contain ‚Äúpetroleum‚Äù which I try to avoid.  Your skin is your biggest organ that you have and the whole point of this lotion is to absorb into your skin. I prefer more natural and healthier moisturizer ingredients to put on and into my body. Personal preference. I also had pump issues as one of the other reviewers also stated that the top pump was really hard to get open. I literally had to take the top off and get out of pair pliers to hold the bottom from rotating while I got the top pump part unscrewed to where it would work.  What should have been a simple task literally took a couple minutes to get this product to pump right.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Daily Moisturizing Oatmeal Lotion, Fragrance Free, 18 Fluid Ounce
review: For years I've been using¬†Aveeno Daily Moisturizing Lotion 18 oz. This Amazon brand is just as good. Almost identical. Same (almost no) smell, same non-greasy feel, same list of ingredients, and feels the same on my skin. Bottle looks good, dispenser works the same. So quite happy with this. And on closer inspection, the (same) active ingredient is stronger in the Solimo (1.3% vs. 1.2%) than the Aveeno, and the actual oat product is listed higher in the ingredients. So . . . it may be marginally better!Oh, and really liked how it was shipped -- with a little tape over the top of the dispenser to stop it opening in transit. Nice touch. Hope this quick review helps you.

product_name: Amazon Brand - Solimo Daily Moisturizing Oatmeal Lotion, Fragrance Free, 18 Fluid Ounce
review: First, I had no issues with the pump.  I use the Solimo Daily Moisturizing Oatmeal Lotion Skin Protectant when I wash my hands, which is generally after I clean house, do the dishes or come in from the garden. I like the feel of it; no greasy feeling.  I've only used it on my hands and arms.  If you're looking for a nice moisturizer Solimo Daily Moisturizing Oatmeal fits the bill.

product_name: NIVEA Essentially Enriched Body Lotion - 48 Hour Moisture For Dry to Very Dry Skin - 16.9 fl. oz. Pump Bottle
review: My product arrived broken

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
review: Used this for one year before it was taken off the shelves!So happy to find it here.It makes my skin feel dewy and smooth. I LOVE IT..BOUGHT 3

product_name: Clean & Clear Morning Burst Hydrating Gel Face Moisturizer with Cucumber & Green Mango Extract, Oil-Free Daily Facial Moisturizer for Acne-Prone Skin Care, Non-Greasy & Non-Comedogenic, 3 oz
review: I bought this on a whim to mix up my skincare routine and I wasn't disappointed. I have combination skin so I can't really handle heavy creams/ moisturizers. When I saw that this product is gel-based, I was excited.The product has a gel texture that's feels great on the skin. It absorbs quickly and leaves my skin feeling moist but not drenched/oily. It has a lovely watermelon scent. I have sensitive skin and was happy to see that this product didn't break me out.The size was a bit disappointing, but that was the only negative.Overall, a great buy that I will definitely repurchase.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Cream with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: My wife has dry skin and itching due to it whenever temperature drops. When it became severe this time, and when it was clear her moisturizer wasn't helping her, we bought CeraVe. She's been using this for more than a month and is happy with the product. Itching did not subside in 2 mins as it was mentioned in the product. But over the time, using it multiple times a day, she has got a definite relief. It doesn't smell unpleasant, but a mild scent would have been good. Overall, we are happy with the product.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Cream with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: Ok. This is the situation. I have eczema and the itch sometimes is hard. So I begin to use this cream recommended by my dermatologist. The first two or three days the effect of this cream on my legs was good. The itch was gone and gone for hours, maybe for 12 hours. After three days of using this cream over all the legs I felt an itch on parts of my legs that I never felt before, and parts under the treatment of this cream. After three days I feel my skin irritated, after maybe five days is itchy, and after the week is just... You can see the photos. These are part my legs right now. So, I have a new itch and more red skin. Maybe the cream is good for the treatment of the itch of the eczema and the relieve of that itch is for hours. But, after using this continously, after days, you should be careful because the skin can be irritated and with a new itch. For now I decided to suspend the cream until at least an improvement on this new itch and the appearance of my skin. I can't use shorts until weeks or one month maybe?

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Cream with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: I have stubborn eczema on my left hand middle and ring finger, and my right middle finger. My massage therapist recommended this moisturizer, said it would be a game changer. I went to the drugstore and purchased it (HOLY MOLY IT‚ÄôS EXPENSIVE!). Day 1 was awesome - I literally couldn‚Äôt believe the results - My hands were almost healed in a day. The itching was gone in two minutes, as promised. THEN...they got worse. Fast. I developed really painful subcutaneous pus-filled blisters and couldn‚Äôt bend my fingers. This cream is definitely responsible, because I put it on a dry spot on my neck, and developed a rash there, where I don‚Äôt get rashes. Now my hands itch 10x worse, and now hurt. I will be returning this horrible product.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Cream with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: Wintertime with dry heat produces dry skin for me that creates chronic itch.  The CeraVe Cream worked for me.  Shortly after receipt we applied a small amount to the area on my back with an itch.  Shortly i had relief.  Manufacturer claims based on testing with 34 people the itch was gone within two minutes.  I did not time this.  The manufacturer also claims eight (8) hour relief.  It did not last that long for me.  After a shower a larger amount will be applied and that may be the key.  Update..... It took about thirty minutes for the itch to stop.  Four hours later some of the affected areas did start to itch again.  Still i consider that success.Recommended = Four Star ‚≠êÔ∏è  Thank-you for looking at my review.  If you found of value please click on the Helpful Icon

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Cream with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief has 1% pramoxine hydrochloride as the active ingredient.  Pramoxine hydrochloride is a topical anesthetic and CeraVe is a thick cream which is easy to apply.There are a number of inactive ingredients.  I was struck by the disclosure that there was a clinical test involving 34 patients.  While that is a small study, it is admirable that it is listed right on the label since most products are not as transparent as to whether there even were any studies.  There have been many studies worldwide on the active ingredient that can be found on a search so the 34 patient clinical study must be for this particular combination of active and inactive ingredients. Looking at the list of inactive ingredients, most of the leading ingredients are similar to that found in many moisturizing creams.Anyone who suffers from notalgia paresthetica or acute dermatitis can well understand that chronic intense itching can reduce one‚Äôs quality of life.  Having a product that can help alleviate the itch is a necessity.CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief worked very quickly to help calm the itching of my notalgia paresthetica.  I put it on before bed and was happy to find that it still provided some relief the next morning.  I am more than happy with the effectiveness of this product and do recommend it to anyone who is suffering from intense itching.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Cream with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: I really like this cream. They should call it the magic winter cream. My skin gets so dried, cracked, and itchy in the winter. A little bit of this takes that all away! I like how big the container is, how moisturizing it is, and how it makes the itch go away. There's some sort of scent to it. I can't tell if it's a medicated type scent or how to describe it. It's not overwhelming and goes away pretty quickly after you use it. The biggest thing I don't like is that it's a little greasy. You really have to rub it in and then kind of wait for it to dry. It was frustrating at first, but now I've gotten used to it. If you have itchy, dry winter skin, I highly suggest you try this.

product_name: CeraVe Moisturizing Cream for Itch Relief | 19 Ounce | Dry Skin Itch Relief Cream with Pramoxine Hydrochloride | Fragrance Free
review: When we have itching for whatever reason we want to solve it quickly but most of the time we do not take into account that it is really best for the skin in addition to the itching.  This cream is what I will always have in my medicine cabinet.  Relieve itching and at the same time restore your skin.  It is also indicated for sunburn.  If you are going to camp you must take it and it is very effective, it has no odors or feels greasy on your skin.  Safe and high quality ingredients.  It is really worth investing in it.

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 2) Bottles, Paraben Free
review: Beware, this lotion is not original. As soon as I pumped it out I noticed that the consistency and color of it was different, and had a tacky feeling when applied to the skin. I always bought mine from Walmart but for months I couldn't get it because it was always sold out so I decided to buy this. After a bottle and 1/2 later  my skin become very dry, itchy and I believe i started getting hives on from it  so I stoppted using it and my skin started healing. The real Amlactin lotion has a thick consistency and off whitish color and when you apply it you skin internally feel moisturized and no after small. I wish I can get my money back but unfortunately I throw out them out because my return window was closed.

product_name: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 2) Bottles, Paraben Free
review: See pic for lactic acid percentage and rank in ingredients line.This is exactly what my winter skin needed.  Honestly, I‚Äôm going to use this year round since soft skin isn‚Äôt seasonal!! Thank you to you tuber Graceful Beauty for turning me into this!

review: Something is very very wrong with this product. I have gotten a sample from my dermatologist and I have also purchased my own from my local pharmacy. This product should be a liquidy white consistency. And I mean it should be very very white. It also has a particular smell like medicine. The texture of it on your skin is also very particular. What Amazon sold to me is yellow and thick and texture and has no smell at all. It doesn‚Äôt feel the way it should on the skin. This is just very wrong. I have a chronic skin disease and I cannot use this unknown product on my skin for fear of what it may do. I will be calling for a refund and going to my local pharmacy to purchase the real deal.
